Based on automata learning, we automatically reconstruct the NAS protocol state machine to study implementation-specific artifacts and their security implications. We design and implement a reliable UE-to-MME interface for testing the MME from the perspective of a user device. This method allows testing of fully functional core networks without modification. Based on a prototype implementation, we test two open-source projects, one commercial MME implementation, and one MME in an operator's test network replicating the live LTE network. We expose several bugs, including crashes in three of the four implementations, potentially leading to network outages.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动网络是我们数字生活的重要组成部分，需要足够的安全措施。4G和5G网络标准复杂且难以实施，这导致在过去几年中发现了一些实施问题。因此，我们的目标是加强测试的自动化，增加测试覆盖率，以发现问题和潜在的安全漏洞。在本文中，我们探索了4G/LTE协议状态机的主动自动机学习。我们重点关注LTE的移动性管理实体(MME)，它是通过NAS协议处理所有用户注册和认证的主要核心网络元素。基于自动机学习，我们自动重建NAS协议状态机，以研究特定于实现的工件及其安全含义。我们设计并实现了可靠的UE到MME接口，用于从用户设备的角度测试MME。这种方法允许在不修改的情况下测试全功能核心网络。基于原型实施，我们测试了两个开源项目，一个商业MME实施，以及一个在运营商测试网络中复制实时LTE网络的MME。我们暴露了几个错误，包括四个实现中的三个崩溃，这可能导致网络中断。
papers.title_zh: LTE网络中自动机重构的挑战

papers.title: Orbit-based authentication using TDOA signatures in satellite networks
papers.authors: Eric Jedermann, Martin Strohmeier, Matthias Schäfer, Jens B. Schmitt, Vincent Lenders
papers.abstract: Given the nature of satellites orbiting the Earth on a fixed trajectory, in principle, it is interesting to investigate how this invariant can be exploited for security purposes. In particular, satellite orbit information can be retrieved from public databases. Using time difference of arrival (TDOA) measurements from multiple receivers, we can check this orbit information against a corresponding TDOA-based signature of the satellite. In that sense, we propose an orbit-based authentication scheme for down-link satellite communications in this paper. To investigate the properties and fundamentals of our novel TDOA signature scheme we study two satellite systems at different altitudes: Iridium and Starlink. Clearly, many challenging questions with respect to the feasibility and effectiveness of this authentication scheme arise; to name some: how many receivers are necessary, how should they be distributed, and how many consecutive measurements do we need for the TDOA signatures. We address these questions by a full factorial experimental design using a simulation framework, we developed for that purpose. Besides a deep understanding about the effects of the major factors on the authentication performance, we find that in adequate configurations, even under a versatile attacker, the orbit-based authentication scheme is able to achieve low false authentication rates well below 1% at false rejection rates of about 2%, for both, Iridium and Starlink satellites.
papers.abstract_zh: 考虑到卫星在固定轨道上绕地球运行的性质，原则上，研究如何将这一不变量用于安全目的是很有趣的。特别是，可以从公共数据库中检索卫星轨道信息。使用来自多个接收器的到达时间差(TDOA)测量值，我们可以对照卫星的相应TDOA信号来检查该轨道信息。在这个意义上，本文提出了一种基于轨道的下行卫星通信认证方案。为了研究我们新颖的TDOA签名方案的性质和基本原理，我们研究了两个不同高度的卫星系统:铱星和星链。显然，出现了许多关于该认证方案的可行性和有效性的挑战性问题；举几个例子:需要多少个接收器，它们应该如何分布，以及我们需要多少次连续测量来获得TDOA特征。我们通过使用模拟框架的全因子实验设计来解决这些问题，我们为此开发了一个模拟框架。除了深入了解主要因素对认证性能的影响之外，我们还发现，在适当的配置下，即使在多用途攻击者的情况下，基于轨道的认证方案也能够在大约2%的错误拒绝率下实现远低于1%的低错误认证率。
papers.title_zh: 卫星网络中使用TDOA签名的基于轨道的认证

papers.title: OutletSpy: cross-outlet application inference via power factor correction signal
papers.authors: Juchuan Zhang, Xiaoyu Ji, Yuehan Chi, Yi-Chao Chen, Bin Wang, Wenyuan Xu
papers.abstract: Trade secrets such as intellectual properties are the inherent values for firms. Although companies have exploited strict access management policies and isolated their networks from the public Internet, trade secrets are still vulnerable to side-channel attacks. Side-channels can reveal the computing processes of computers in forms of various physical signals such as light, electromagnetism, and even heat. Such side-channels can bypass the isolation mechanism and therefore bring about severe threats. However, existing side-channels can only perform well within a short-distance (e.g., less than 1 meter) due to the high attenuation of signals. In this paper, we seek to utilize the built-in power lines in a building and construct a power side-channel that enables remote, i.e., cross-outlet attack against trade secrets. To this end, we investigate the power factor correction (PFC) module inside the power supply units of commodity computers and find that the PFC signals observed from an outlet can precisely reveal the power consumption information of all the connected devices, even from the outlets in adjacent rooms. Based upon this insight, we design and implement OutletSpy, a power side-channel attack that can infer application launching from a remote outlet and therefore enjoys the stealthiness property. We validate and evaluate OutletSpy with a dataset under different background APPs, time variations and different locations. The experiment results show OutletSpy can infer the application launching with 98.25% accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 知识产权等商业秘密是企业的固有价值。尽管公司已经利用了严格的访问管理政策，并将其网络与公共互联网隔离，但商业机密仍然容易受到旁门左道的攻击。侧通道可以以各种物理信号的形式显示计算机的计算过程，如光、电磁、甚至热。这种旁路可以绕过隔离机制，从而带来严重的威胁。然而，由于信号的高衰减，现有的侧信道只能在短距离内(例如，小于1米)运行良好。在本文中，我们试图利用建筑物中的内置电力线，并构建一个电力侧信道，使远程，即跨插座攻击商业秘密成为可能。为此，我们研究了商用计算机电源单元内的功率因数校正(PFC)模块，发现从插座观察到的PFC信号可以精确地揭示所有连接设备的功耗信息，甚至可以从相邻房间的插座观察到。基于这一认识，我们设计并实现了OutletSpy，一种能够推断应用程序从远程出口启动并因此享有隐秘性的功率侧信道攻击。我们用一个数据集在不同的后台应用、时间变化和不同的地点下对OutletSpy进行了验证和评估。实验结果表明，OutletSpy能够以98.25%的准确率推断出应用的启动。
papers.title_zh: OutletSpy:通过功率因数校正信号的交叉插座应用推断

papers.title: Recurring verification of interaction authenticity within bluetooth networks
papers.authors: Travis Peters, Timothy J. Pierson, Sougata Sen, José Camacho, David Kotz
papers.abstract: Although user authentication has been well explored, device-to-device authentication - specifically in Bluetooth networks - has not seen the same attention. We propose Verification of Interaction Authenticity (VIA) - a recurring authentication scheme based on evaluating characteristics of the communications (interactions) between devices. We adapt techniques from wireless traffic analysis and intrusion-detection systems to develop behavioral models that capture typical, authentic device interactions (behavior); these models enable recurring verification of device behavior. To evaluate our approach we produced a new dataset consisting of more than 300 Bluetooth network traces collected from 20 Bluetooth-enabled smart-health and smart-home devices. In our evaluation, we found that devices can be correctly verified at a variety of granularities, achieving an F1-score of 0.86 or better in most cases.
papers.abstract_zh: 尽管用户认证已经得到了很好的研究，但是设备到设备的认证——特别是在蓝牙网络中——还没有得到同样的关注。我们提出交互真实性验证(VIA)——一种基于评估设备间通信(交互)特征的循环认证方案。我们采用无线流量分析和入侵检测系统的技术来开发行为模型，捕捉典型、真实的设备交互(行为)；这些模型支持重复验证设备行为。为了评估我们的方法，我们制作了一个新的数据集，其中包含从20个支持蓝牙的智能健康和智能家居设备中收集的300多个蓝牙网络轨迹。在我们的评估中，我们发现设备可以在各种粒度下正确验证，在大多数情况下达到0.86或更高的F1值。
papers.title_zh: 蓝牙网络内交互真实性的重复验证

papers.title: Remotely controlling TrustZone applications?: a study on securely and resiliently receiving remote commands
papers.authors: Shengye Wan, Kun Sun, Ning Zhang, Yue Li
papers.abstract: Mobile devices are becoming an indispensable part of work for corporations and governments to store and process sensitive information. Thus, it is important for remote administrators to maintain control of these devices via Mobile Device Management (MDM) solutions. ARM TrustZone has been widely regarded as the de facto solution for protecting the security-sensitive software, such as MDM agents, from attacks of a compromised rich OS. However, little attention has been given to protecting the MDM control channel, a fundamental component for a remote administrator to invoke the TrustZone-based MDM agents and perform specific management operations. In this work, we design an ARM TrustZone-based network mechanism, called TZNIC, towards enabling resilient and secure access to TrustZone-based software, even in the presence of a malicious rich OS. TZNIC deploys two NIC drivers, one secure-world driver and one normal-world driver, multiplexing one physical NIC. We utilize the ARM TrustZone-based high privilege to protect the secure-world driver and further resolve several challenges on sharing one set of hardware peripherals between two isolated software environments. TZNIC does not require any changes or collaboration of the rich OS. We implement a prototype of TZNIC, and the evaluation results show that TZNIC can provide a reliable network channel to invoke the security software in the secure world, with minimal system overhead on the rich OS.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动设备正成为企业和政府存储和处理敏感信息工作中不可或缺的一部分。因此，远程管理员通过移动设备管理(MDM)解决方案保持对这些设备的控制非常重要。ARM TrustZone被广泛认为是保护安全敏感软件(如MDM代理)免受受损富操作系统攻击的实际解决方案。然而，很少有人注意保护MDM控制通道，这是远程管理员调用基于TrustZone的MDM代理并执行特定管理操作的基本组件。在这项工作中，我们设计了一种基于ARM TrustZone的网络机制，称为TZNIC，旨在实现对基于TrustZone的软件的弹性和安全访问，即使存在恶意的rich OS。TZNIC部署了两个NIC驱动程序，一个安全世界驱动程序和一个普通世界驱动程序，多路复用一个物理NIC。我们利用基于ARM TrustZone的高特权来保护安全世界驱动程序，并进一步解决在两个隔离的软件环境之间共享一组硬件外设的若干挑战。TZNIC不需要对富操作系统进行任何更改或协作。我们实现了一个TZNIC的原型，评估结果表明TZNIC可以提供一个可靠的网络通道来调用安全世界中的安全软件，并且在富操作系统上具有最小的系统开销。
papers.title_zh: 远程控制TrustZone应用？:安全和弹性接收远程命令的研究

papers.title: RIP StrandHogg: a practical StrandHogg attack detection method on Android
papers.authors: Jasper Stang, Alexandra Dmitrienko, Sascha Roth
papers.abstract: StrandHogg vulnerabilities affect Android's multitasking system and threaten up to 90% of Android platforms, which translates to millions of affected users. Existing countermeasures require modification of the OS, have usability drawbacks, or are limited to the detection of certain attack versions. In this work, we aim to develop a generic, efficient, and usability-friendly attack detection method, which does not require OS modifications and can be employed by apps installed on any vulnerable Android platform. To achieve our goal, we analyze StrandHogg attack techniques and develop two countermeasures, one using Machine Learning and the other one using ActivityCounter - a reliable attack indicator, which we could synthetically engineer. Our first approach achieves an average F1 score of 92% across all attack variations, while ActivityCounter shows superior performance and efficiently detects all attack versions without false positives. ActivityCounter is the first solution without practical limitations, which can be easily deployed in practice and protect millions of affected users.
papers.abstract_zh: StrandHogg漏洞影响Android的多任务系统，并威胁到高达90%的Android平台，这意味着数百万受影响的用户。现有的对策需要修改操作系统，具有可用性缺陷，或者限于检测某些攻击版本。在这项工作中，我们的目标是开发一种通用、高效、易用的攻击检测方法，它不需要修改操作系统，可以被安装在任何易受攻击的Android平台上的应用程序所采用。为了实现我们的目标，我们分析了StrandHogg攻击技术并开发了两种对策，一种使用机器学习，另一种使用ActivityCounter -一种可靠的攻击指标，我们可以综合设计。我们的第一种方法在所有攻击变体上实现了92%的平均F1分数，而ActivityCounter表现出了卓越的性能，并且可以有效地检测所有攻击版本，而不会出现误报。ActivityCounter是第一个没有实际限制的解决方案，可以在实践中轻松部署，保护数百万受影响的用户。
papers.title_zh: RIP StrandHogg:一种实用的Android strand hogg攻击检测方法

papers.title: Security analysis of IEEE 802.15.4z/HRP UWB time-of-flight distance measurement
papers.authors: Mridula Singh, Marc Roeschlin, Ezzat Zalzala, Patrick Leu, Srdjan Capkun
papers.abstract: IEEE 802.15.4z, a standard for Ultra-Wide Band (UWB) secure distance measurement, was adopted in 2020 and the chips that implement this standard are already deployed in mobile phones and in the automotive industry (for Passive Keyless Entry and Start). The standard specifies two different modes---LRP and HRP. Whereas the security of LRP mode has been analyzed, there is no publicly available security analysis of the HRP mode, which is used in different chips like NXP Trimension SR150/SR040, Samsung smartphones, and U1 chip deployed in Apple iPhones. In this work, we perform the first open analysis of the 802.15.4z HRP mode. Our analysis reviews possible attacks on HRP and assesses strategies that an HRP receiver could implement. We show that in realistic deployments, despite countermeasures, HRP is hard to configure to be both performant and secure. If a distance missdetection rate is set to less than 10% (in benign scenarios), the probability of a successful distance shortening attacks ranges from 7% to over 90%.
papers.abstract_zh: 超宽带(UWB)安全距离测量标准IEEE 802.15.4z于2020年获得通过，实现该标准的芯片已经部署在移动电话和汽车行业中(用于被动无钥匙进入和启动)。该标准规定了两种不同的模式- LRP和HRP。虽然已经分析了LRP模式的安全性，但是没有公开可用的HRP模式的安全性分析，HRP模式用于不同的芯片，如恩智浦Trimension SR150/SR040、三星智能手机和苹果iPhones中部署的U1芯片。在这项工作中，我们对802.15.4z HRP模式进行了首次公开分析。我们的分析回顾了对HRP的可能攻击，并评估了HRP接收者可以实施的策略。我们表明，在现实部署中，尽管有对策，HRP很难配置为既高效又安全。如果距离误检率设置为小于10%(在良性情况下)，距离缩短攻击成功的概率范围从7%到90%以上。
papers.title_zh: IEEE 802.15.4z/HRP超宽带飞行时间测距的安全性分析

papers.title: SELEST: secure elevation estimation of drones using MPC
papers.authors: Marinos Vomvas, Erik-Oliver Blass, Guevara Noubir
papers.abstract: Drones are increasingly associated with incidents disturbing air traffic at airports, invading privacy, and even terrorism. Wireless Direction of Arrival (DoA) techniques, such as the MUSIC algorithm, can localize drones, but deploying a system that systematically localizes RF emissions can lead to intentional or unintentional (e.g., if compromised) abuse. Multi-Party Computation (MPC) provides a solution for controlled computation of the elevation of RF emissions, only revealing estimates when some conditions are met, such as when the elevation exceeds a specified threshold. However, we show that a straightforward implementation of MUSIC, which relies on costly computation of complex matrix operations such as eigendecomposition, in state of the art MPC frameworks is extremely inefficient requiring over 20 seconds to achieve the weakest security guarantees. In this work, we develop a set of MPC optimizations and extensions of MUSIC. We extensively evaluate our techniques in several MPC protocols achieving a speedup of 300-500 times depending on the security model and specific technique used. For instance a Malicious Shamir execution providing security against malicious adversaries enables 536 DoA estimations per second, making it practical for use in real-world setups.
papers.abstract_zh: 无人机越来越多地与扰乱机场空中交通、侵犯隐私甚至恐怖主义的事件联系在一起。无线到达方向(DoA)技术，如MUSIC算法，可以定位无人机，但部署一个系统地定位RF发射的系统可能会导致有意或无意(例如，如果受损)的滥用。多方计算(MPC)为射频辐射高度的受控计算提供了一种解决方案，仅在满足某些条件时才显示估计值，例如当高度超过特定阈值时。然而，我们表明，在现有的MPC框架中，MUSIC的直接实现依赖于复杂矩阵运算(如特征分解)的高成本计算，效率极低，需要超过20秒来实现最弱的安全保证。在这项工作中，我们开发了一套音乐的MPC优化和扩展。我们在几个MPC协议中广泛评估了我们的技术，根据所使用的安全模型和具体技术，实现了300-500倍的加速。例如，针对恶意对手提供安全性的恶意Shamir执行能够每秒进行536次DoA估计，这使得它在现实世界设置中的使用变得切实可行。
papers.title_zh: SELEST:使用MPC的无人机安全仰角估计

papers.title: SigUnder: a stealthy 5G low power attack and defenses
papers.authors: Norbert Ludant, Guevara Noubir
papers.abstract: The 3GPP 5G cellular system is hailed as a major step towards more ubiquitous and pervasive communications infrastructure (including for V2X, Smart Grid, and Healthcare). We disclose and evaluate SigUnder, an attack that enables an adversary to overshadow the Signal Synchronization Block (SSB) with an injected signal at 3.4dB below the legitimate signal (prior work required 3dB above). The attack exploits the polar coding mechanism of 5G and the physical layer OFDM structure. It can be used to make previous DoS and over-shadowing attacks lower-power and stealthy, but also enables new attacks unique to 5G such as setting the cellBarred field in the 5G MIB (and blocking access to a cell). We develop techniques (e.g., phase prediction) to make the attack feasible in a practical setup, and evaluate its performance both in simulations and over the air experiments. We also introduce SICUnder, an extension of Successive Interference Cancellation (SIC) to be able to address the unique challenges that SigUnder poses and demonstrate it effectiveness relatively to standard SIC.
papers.abstract_zh: 3GPP 5G蜂窝系统被誉为朝着更加普遍和普及的通信基础设施(包括V2X、智能电网和医疗保健)迈出的重要一步。我们揭示并评估了SigUnder攻击，这种攻击使对手能够以低于合法信号3.4dB的注入信号掩盖信号同步块(SSB)(之前的工作需要高于3dB)。该攻击利用了5G的极性编码机制和物理层OFDM结构。它可以用来使以前的DoS和over-shadowing攻击更低功率和更隐蔽，但也支持5G特有的新攻击，如在5G MIB中设置cellBarred字段(并阻止对小区的访问)。我们开发技术(例如，相位预测)使攻击在实际设置中可行，并在模拟和空中实验中评估其性能。我们还介绍了SICUnder，它是连续干扰消除(SIC)的扩展，能够解决SigUnder带来的独特挑战，并展示其相对于标准SIC的有效性。
papers.title_zh: SigUnder:一种隐形的5G低功耗攻击和防御

papers.title: SNOW-Vi: an extreme performance variant of SNOW-V for lower grade CPUs
papers.authors: Patrik Ekdahl, Alexander Maximov, Thomas Johansson, Jing Yang
papers.abstract: SNOW 3G is a stream cipher used as one of the standard algorithms for data confidentiality and integrity protection over the air interface in the 3G and 4G mobile communication systems. SNOW-V is a recent new version that was proposed as a candidate for inclusion in the 5G standard. In this paper, we propose a faster variant of SNOW-V, called SNOW-Vi, that can reach the targeted speeds for 5G in a software implementation on a larger variety of CPU architectures. SNOW-Vi differs in the way how the LFSR is updated and also introduces a new location of the tap T2 for stronger security, while everything else is kept the same as in SNOW-V. The throughput in a software environment is increased by around 50% in average, up to 92 Gbps. This makes the applicability of the cipher much wider and more use cases are covered. The security analyses previously done for SNOW-V are not affected in most aspects, and SNOW-Vi provides the same 256-bit security level as SNOW-V.
papers.abstract_zh: SNOW 3G是一种流密码，用作3G和4G移动通信系统中空中接口上数据机密性和完整性保护的标准算法之一。SNOW-V是最近提出的一个新版本，作为5G标准的候选版本。在本文中，我们提出了一种更快的SNOW-V变体，称为SNOW-Vi，它可以在更多种CPU架构上的软件实现中达到5G的目标速度。SNOW-Vi在LFSR的更新方式上有所不同，并且还引入了一个新的tap T2位置以实现更强的安全性，而其他一切都与SNOW-V保持相同。软件环境中的吞吐量平均增加了约50%，高达92 Gbps。这使得密码的应用范围更广，涵盖了更多的用例。以前对SNOW-V进行的安全分析在大多数方面都没有受到影响，SNOW-Vi提供了与SNOW-V相同的256位安全级别。
papers.title_zh: SNOW-Vi:面向低级CPU的SNOW-V的极端性能变体

papers.title: SoK: assessing the threat potential of vibration-based attacks against live speech using mobile sensors
papers.authors: Payton Walker, Nitesh Saxena
papers.abstract: Existing academic research on vibration-based speech attacks has introduced interesting and intellectually appealing threat vectors with proof-of-concept demonstrations in controlled environments. The attacks presented in these studies exploit different types of sensors such as MEMS motion sensors, laser-based sensors, and some other sensors (camera, position error signal, piezo-disc) to measure the vibrations induced on an object by nearby sensitive speech. Such sensors are commonly found on mobile devices like smartphones and tablets that can be exposed to sensitive speech, revealing the significance of this potential threat. These studies have amassed significant attention in news and media and introduced concern to people about the safety of their day-to-day speech and around their personal, wireless and IoT devices. However, we hypothesize that the controlled experiments in the prior research maintain critical parameter values that are favorable to attack success (deviating from the limiting settings in a real-world scenario) and produce results that suggest a greater real-life threat level than actually exists. The contributions made in this paper are as follows; First, we provide a detailed review of 10 existing academic research works related to vibration-based eavesdropping attacks. Second, we identify key experimental parameters that can impact the success of eavesdropping in the vibration domain. Third, we build a framework to evaluate the existing literature based on the Percent Parameters in Favored Settings (PPFS) Score metric that we define. Lastly, we use our defined framework to evaluate the feasibility of the existing vibration-based speech attacks to compromise live human speech to the extent of full speech recognition. The results of our evaluation suggest that none of the existing vibration-based eavesdropping attacks have a high likelihood of successfully compromising live human speech in a real-world scenario.
papers.abstract_zh: 现有的关于基于振动的语音攻击的学术研究已经引入了有趣的和智力上吸引人的威胁向量，并在受控环境中进行了概念验证。这些研究中提出的攻击利用不同类型的传感器，如MEMS运动传感器、基于激光的传感器和一些其他传感器(摄像机、位置误差信号、压电盘)来测量附近敏感语音在对象上引起的振动。这种传感器通常出现在智能手机和平板电脑等移动设备上，这些设备可能会接触到敏感的言论，从而揭示出这种潜在威胁的重要性。这些研究引起了新闻和媒体的极大关注，并引起了人们对日常言论以及个人、无线和物联网设备安全性的关注。然而，我们假设先前研究中的受控实验维持有利于攻击成功的关键参数值(偏离真实世界场景中的限制设置),并产生表明比实际存在更大的真实威胁级别的结果。本文的主要贡献如下:首先，我们提供了10个与基于振动的窃听攻击相关的现有学术研究工作的详细回顾。第二，我们确定关键的实验参数，可以影响窃听在振动领域的成功。第三，我们建立了一个框架，根据我们定义的偏好设置(PPFS)评分指标的百分比参数来评估现有的文献。最后，我们使用我们定义的框架来评估现有的基于振动的语音攻击的可行性，以在完全语音识别的程度上损害真人语音。我们的评估结果表明，现有的基于振动的窃听攻击都不太可能成功破坏真实世界场景中的真人语音。
papers.title_zh: SoK:使用移动传感器评估基于振动的实时语音攻击的潜在威胁

papers.title: Spearphone: a lightweight speech privacy exploit via accelerometer-sensed reverberations from smartphone loudspeakers
papers.authors: S. Abhishek Anand, Chen Wang, Jian Liu, Nitesh Saxena, Yingying Chen
papers.abstract: In this paper, we build a speech privacy attack that exploits speech reverberations from a smartphone's inbuilt loudspeaker captured via a zero-permission motion sensor (accelerometer). We design our attack Spearphone, and demonstrate that speech reverberations from inbuilt loudspeakers, at an appropriate loudness, can impact the accelerometer, leaking sensitive information about the speech. In particular, we show that by exploiting the affected accelerometer readings and carefully selecting feature sets along with off-the-shelf machine learning techniques, Spearphone can perform gender classification (accuracy over 90%) and speaker identification (accuracy over 80%) for the audio/video playback on the smartphone for our recorded dataset. We use lightweight classifiers and an off-the-shelf machine learning tool so that the attacking effort is minimized, making our attack practical. Our results with testing the attack on a voice call and voice assistant response were also encouraging, showcasing the impact of the proposed attack. In addition, we perform speech recognition and speech reconstruction to extract more information about the eavesdropped speech to an extent. Our work brings to light a fundamental design vulnerability in many currently-deployed smartphones, which may put people's speech privacy at risk while using the smartphone in the loudspeaker mode during phone calls, media playback or voice assistant interactions.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们构建了一个语音隐私攻击，该攻击利用了通过零许可运动传感器(加速度计)捕获的智能手机内置扬声器的语音混响。我们设计了我们的攻击Spearphone，并演示了来自内置扬声器的适当响度的语音混响可以影响加速度计，从而泄漏有关语音的敏感信息。特别是，我们表明，通过利用受影响的加速度计读数并仔细选择特征集以及现成的机器学习技术，Spearphone可以为我们记录的数据集在智能手机上的音频/视频播放执行性别分类(准确率超过90%)和说话人识别(准确率超过80%)。我们使用轻量级分类器和现成的机器学习工具，使攻击努力最小化，使我们的攻击切实可行。我们对语音呼叫和语音助理响应的攻击测试结果也令人鼓舞，展示了拟议攻击的影响。此外，我们执行语音识别和语音重构，以在一定程度上提取关于窃听语音的更多信息。我们的工作揭示了许多当前部署的智能手机中的一个基本设计漏洞，这可能会使人们在电话通话、媒体播放或语音助手交互期间以扬声器模式使用智能手机时的语音隐私面临风险。
papers.title_zh: Spearphone:一个轻量级的语音隐私漏洞，通过智能手机扬声器的加速度感应混响实现

papers.title: Spectrum-flexible secure broadcast ranging
papers.authors: Tien Dang Vo-Huu, Triet Dang Vo-Huu, Guevara Noubir
papers.abstract: Secure ranging is poised to play a critical role in several emerging applications such as self-driving cars, unmanned aerial systems, wireless IoT devices, and augmented reality. In this paper, we propose a design of a secure broadcast ranging system with unique features and techniques. Its spectral-flexibility, and low-power short ranging bursts enable co-existence with existing systems such as in the 2.4GHz ISM band. We exploit a set of RF techniques such as upsampling and successive interference cancellation to achieve high accuracy and scalability to tens of reflectors even when operating over narrow bands of spectrum. We demonstrate that it can be implemented on popular SDR platforms FPGA and/or hosts (with minimal FPGA modifications). The protocol design, and cryptographically generated/detected signals, and randomized timing of transmissions, provide stealth and security against denial of service, sniffing, and distance manipulation attacks. Through extensive experimental evaluations (and simulations for scalability to over 100 reflectors) we demonstrate an accuracy below 20cm on a wide range of SNR (as low as 0dB), spectrum 25MHz-100MHz, with bursts as short as 5us.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全测距将在一些新兴应用中发挥关键作用，如自动驾驶汽车、无人驾驶航空系统、无线物联网设备和增强现实。在本文中，我们提出了一个具有独特功能和技术的安全广播测距系统的设计。其频谱灵活性和低功率短距离突发使得能够与现有系统共存，例如2.4GHz ISM频段。我们开发了一套RF技术，如上采样和连续干扰消除，以实现高精度，并可扩展至数十个反射器，即使在窄带频谱上工作。我们证明了它可以在流行的SDR平台FPGA和/或主机上实现(只需对FPGA进行最少的修改)。协议设计、密码生成/检测的信号以及随机化的传输时间，提供了针对拒绝服务、嗅探和距离操纵攻击的隐蔽性和安全性。通过大量的实验评估(以及针对100多个反射器的可扩展性的模拟)，我们证明了在宽范围的SNR(低至0dB)、25MHz-100MHz的频谱以及短至5us的突发上的精度低于20cm。
papers.title_zh: 频谱灵活的安全广播测距

papers.title: Toward a secure crowdsourced location tracking system
papers.authors: Chinmay Garg, Aravind Machiry, Andrea Continella, Christopher Kruegel, Giovanni Vigna
papers.abstract: Low-energy Bluetooth devices have become ubiquitous and widely used for different applications. Among these, Bluetooth trackers are becoming popular as they allow users to track the location of their physical objects. To do so, Bluetooth trackers are often built-in within other commercial products connected to a larger crowdsourced tracking system. Such a system, however, can pose a threat to the security and privacy of the users, for instance, by revealing the location of a user's valuable object. In this paper, we introduce a set of security properties and investigate the state of commercial crowdsourced tracking systems, which present common design flaws that make them insecure. Leveraging the results of our investigation, we propose a new design for a secure crowdsourced tracking system (SECrow), which allows devices to leverage the benefits of the crowdsourced model without sacrificing security and privacy. Our preliminary evaluation shows that SECrow is a practical, secure, and effective crowdsourced tracking solution.
papers.abstract_zh: 低能量蓝牙设备已经变得无处不在，并且广泛用于不同的应用。其中，蓝牙跟踪器越来越受欢迎，因为它们允许用户跟踪他们的物理对象的位置。为此，蓝牙追踪器通常内置在其他商业产品中，连接到一个更大的众包追踪系统。然而，这种系统会对用户的安全和隐私造成威胁，例如，通过暴露用户的贵重物品的位置。在本文中，我们引入了一组安全属性，并调查了商业众包跟踪系统的状态，这些系统存在使其不安全的常见设计缺陷。利用我们的调查结果，我们提出了一种安全众包跟踪系统(SECrow)的新设计，它允许设备利用众包模式的好处，而不会牺牲安全性和隐私。我们的初步评估表明，SECrow是一个实用、安全、有效的众包追踪解决方案。
papers.title_zh: 走向安全的众包位置跟踪系统

papers.title: VoIPLoc: passive VoIP call provenance via acoustic side-channels
papers.authors: Shishir Nagaraja, Ryan Shah
papers.abstract: We propose VoIPLoc, a novel location fingerprinting technique and apply it to the VoIP call provenance problem. It exploits echo-location information embedded within VoIP audio to support fine-grained location inference. We found consistent statistical features induced by the echo-reflection characteristics of the location into recorded speech. These features are discernible within traces received at the VoIP destination, enabling location inference. We evaluated VoIPLoc by developing a dataset of audio traces received through VoIP channels over the Tor network. We show that recording locations can be fingerprinted and detected remotely with a low false-positive rate, even when a majority of the audio samples are unlabelled. Finally, we note that the technique is fully passive and thus undetectable, unlike prior art. VoIPLoc is robust to the impact of environmental noise and background sounds, as well as the impact of compressive codecs and network jitter. The technique is also highly scalable and offers several degrees of freedom terms of the fingerprintable space.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种新的位置指纹技术VoIPLoc，并将其应用于VoIP呼叫起源问题。它利用嵌入在VoIP音频中的回声位置信息来支持细粒度的位置推断。我们发现一致的统计特征诱导的回声反射特征的位置记录的语音。这些特征在VoIP目的地接收的轨迹中是可辨别的，从而能够进行位置推断。我们通过开发一个通过Tor网络上的VoIP通道接收的音频轨迹数据集来评估VoIPLoc。我们表明，记录位置可以被指纹识别和远程检测，具有较低的假阳性率，即使当大多数音频样本未标记时。最后，我们注意到，与现有技术不同，该技术是完全被动的，因此是不可检测的。VoIPLoc对于环境噪声和背景声音的影响以及压缩编解码器和网络抖动的影响是鲁棒的。该技术也是高度可扩展的，并且提供了手指可打印空间的几个自由度。
papers.title_zh: VoIPLoc:通过声学边信道的被动VoIP呼叫起源

papers.title: Write to know: on the feasibility of wrist motion based user-authentication from handwriting
papers.authors: Raveen Wijewickrama, Anindya Maiti, Murtuza Jadliwala
papers.abstract: The popularity of smart wrist wearable technology (e.g., smart-watches) has rejuvenated the exploration of dynamic biometric-based authentication techniques that employ sensor data from these devices. Despite the progress demonstrated by the scientific community, research in this area has not successfully transitioned to practice, and we are yet to see a mainstream user-authentication product based on a dynamic biometric such as handwriting/hand gestures captured using commercial wrist wearables. This work undertakes an investigative analysis to further explore why that is the case. We accomplish this by studying the feasibility and practical deployability of handwriting-based authentication techniques in the literature that utilize motion sensors on-board wrist wearables. We conduct this analysis by replicating four state-of-the-art and representative handwriting-based authentication schemes that employ wrist motion data, in order to test their viability in realistic hand-writing/gesture scenarios. By using data collected from actual human subjects in an unconstrained fashion, we comparatively evaluate the performance of these schemes with well-defined usability and security metrics. Our experimental results show that some of the tested schemes perform considerably well in practice, and are promising. However, they do suffer from several practical user-dependent and technique-specific challenges that act as roadblocks towards their wide-scale adoption in mainstream applications.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能手腕可穿戴技术(如智能手表)的普及，使基于生物特征的动态认证技术的探索重新焕发了活力，这些技术采用来自这些设备的传感器数据。尽管科学界取得了进展，但该领域的研究尚未成功过渡到实践，我们尚未看到基于动态生物识别(如使用商业手腕可穿戴设备捕捉的手写/手势)的主流用户认证产品。这项工作进行了调查分析，以进一步探索为什么会这样。我们通过研究文献中基于手写的认证技术的可行性和实际部署性来实现这一点，这些技术利用了手腕可穿戴设备上的运动传感器。我们通过复制四种采用手腕运动数据的最先进且具有代表性的基于手写的认证方案来进行分析，以便测试它们在真实手写/手势场景中的可行性。通过以不受约束的方式使用从实际人类对象收集的数据，我们用明确定义的可用性和安全性度量来比较评估这些方案的性能。我们的实验结果表明，一些测试方案在实践中表现相当好，是有前途的。然而，它们确实面临着一些依赖于用户和特定技术的实际挑战，这些挑战阻碍了它们在主流应用中的广泛采用。
papers.title_zh: 写而知:基于手腕运动的笔迹身份认证可行性研究

papers.title: Z-Fuzzer: device-agnostic fuzzing of Zigbee protocol implementation
papers.authors: Mengfei Ren, Xiaolei Ren, Huadong Feng, Jiang Ming, Yu Lei
papers.abstract: With the proliferation of the Internet of Things (IoT) devices, Zigbee is widely adopted as a resource-efficient wireless protocol. Recently, severe vulnerabilities in Zigbee protocol implementations have compromised IoT devices from different manufacturers. It becomes imperative to perform security testing on Zigbee protocol implementations. However, it is not a trivial task to apply the existing vulnerability detection techniques such as fuzzing to Zigbee protocol implementations. In particular, it remains a significant obstacle to deal with low-level hardware events. Many existing protocol fuzzing tools lack a proper execution environment for the Zigbee protocol, which communicates via a radio channel instead of the Internet. To bridge the above gap, we develop a device-agnostic fuzzing platform named Z-Fuzzer to detect security vulnerabilities in Zigbee protocol implementations. Z-Fuzzer provides a software simulation environment with pre-defined peripherals and hardware interrupts configurations to simulate Zigbee protocol execution on real IoT devices. We first extend the existing protocol fuzzing framework's capabilities with a proxy server to bridge communication with the Zigbee protocol execution. Second, we generate more high-quality test cases with code-coverage heuristics. We compare Z-Fuzzer with advanced protocol fuzzing tools, BooFuzz and Peach fuzzer, on top of Z-Fuzzer's simulation platform. Our results show that Z-Fuzzer can achieve higher code coverage in a mainstream Zigbee protocol implementation called Z-Stack. Z-Fuzzer has detected more vulnerabilities using fewer test cases than BooFuzz and Peach. Three of them have been assigned CVE IDs with high CVSS scores (7.5~8.2).
papers.abstract_zh: 随着物联网(IoT)设备的激增，Zigbee作为一种资源高效的无线协议被广泛采用。最近，Zigbee协议实现中的严重漏洞已经危及不同制造商的物联网设备。对Zigbee协议实现进行安全性测试变得势在必行。然而，将现有的漏洞检测技术(如fuzzing)应用到Zigbee协议实现中并不是一项简单的任务。特别是，它仍然是处理低级硬件事件的一个重大障碍。许多现有的协议模糊化工具缺乏Zigbee协议的适当执行环境，Zigbee协议通过无线电信道而不是互联网进行通信。为了弥补上述差距，我们开发了一个名为Z-Fuzzer的设备无关的fuzzing平台，以检测Zigbee协议实现中的安全漏洞。Z-Fuzzer提供了一个具有预定义外设和硬件中断配置的软件模拟环境，以模拟Zigbee协议在真实物联网设备上的执行。我们首先使用代理服务器扩展现有协议模糊化框架的功能，以桥接与Zigbee协议执行的通信。第二，我们用代码覆盖试探法生成更多高质量的测试用例。在Z-Fuzzer的仿真平台上，我们将Z-Fuzzer与高级协议模糊工具BooFuzz和Peach fuzzer进行了比较。我们的结果表明，Z-Fuzzer可以在一个被称为Z-Stack的主流Zigbee协议实现中实现更高的代码覆盖率。Z-Fuzzer用比BooFuzz和Peach更少的测试用例检测到了更多的漏洞。他们中的三个被分配了具有高CVSS分数(7.5~8.2)的CVE id。
papers.title_zh: z-Fuzzer:Zigbee协议实现的设备无关模糊化

papers.title: 5G SUCI-catchers: still catching them all?
papers.authors: Merlin Chlosta, David Rupprecht, Christina Pöpper, Thorsten Holz
papers.abstract: In mobile networks, IMSI-Catchers identify and track users simply by requesting all users' permanent identities (IMSI) in range. The 5G standard attempts to fix this issue by encrypting the permanent identifier (now SUPI) and transmitting the SUCI. Since the encrypted SUCI is re-generated with an ephemeral key for each use, an attacker can no longer derive the user's identity. However, this scheme does not prevent all tracking and linking: if the identity of a user is already known, an attacker can probe users for that identity. We demonstrate a proof-of-concept 5G SUCI-Catcher attack in a 5G standalone network. Based on prior work on linkability through the Authentication and Key Agreement (AKA) procedure, we introduce an attack variant that enables practical, repeatable attacks. We capture encrypted SUCIs and use the AKA-procedure to link the encrypted identities between sessions. This answers Is user X present now? --- a typical scenario for IMSI-Catchers. We analyze the attack's scalability, discuss real-world applicability, and possible countermeasures by network operators.
papers.abstract_zh: 在移动网络中，IMSI捕手只需通过请求范围内所有用户的永久身份(IMSI)来识别和跟踪用户。5G标准试图通过加密永久标识符(现在是SUPI)和传输SUCI来解决这个问题。由于每次使用时都会用一个临时密钥重新生成加密的SUCI，因此攻击者无法再获取用户的身份。然而，这种方案并不能阻止所有的跟踪和链接:如果用户的身份是已知的，攻击者可以探查用户的身份。我们在5G独立网络中演示了5G SUCI捕捉器攻击的概念验证。基于之前通过身份验证和密钥协商(AKA)过程对可链接性所做的工作，我们引入了一种攻击变体，这种变体能够实现实际的、可重复的攻击。我们捕获加密的SUCIs，并使用AKA过程在会话之间链接加密的身份。这回答了用户X现在在场吗？-IMSI捕手的典型场景。我们分析了攻击的可扩展性，讨论了现实世界的适用性，以及网络运营商可能采取的对策。
papers.title_zh: 5G SUCI捕手:还能抓到所有人吗？

papers.title: A defensive man-in-middle approach to filter BLE packets
papers.authors: Ahmed Aboukora, Guillaume Bonnet, Florent Galtier, Romain Cayre, Vincent Nicomette, Guillaume Auriol
papers.abstract: In this paper, we propose an original defensive strategy in which we benefit from the use of Man-in-The-Middle attacks in order to protect some vulnerable BLE devices. More precisely, we describe a tool that uses a Man-in-The-Middle attack to implement a wireless firewall for BLE communications, that is able to block specific commands, make some services invisible on BLE devices, or to force out weak pairing mechanisms.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了一种新颖的防御策略，在这种策略中，我们利用中间人攻击来保护一些易受攻击的ble设备。更准确地说，我们描述了一种工具，它使用中间人攻击来实现ble通信的无线防火墙，这种防火墙能够阻止特定的命令，使一些服务在BLE设备上不可见，或者迫使弱配对机制失效。
papers.title_zh: 一种防御性的中间人方法来过滤BLE数据包

papers.title: A framework to test and fuzz wi-fi devices
papers.authors: Domien Schepers, Mathy Vanhoef, Aanjhan Ranganathan
papers.abstract: Over the years, numerous weaknesses have been identified in the IEEE 802.11 standard and its implementations. In order to present a proof-of-concept or demonstrate their impact in practice, researchers are often required to implement entire procedures or complex features from scratch (e.g., injecting encrypted frames with customized header flags). In this paper, we present a framework that allows researchers to more easily test and fuzz any device (i.e., access points and clients). This framework enables one to, for example, test hypothesis on new weaknesses, implement proof-of-concepts, create testing suites, and automate experiments. Our framework is implemented on top of the hostap user space daemon, and includes a language in which complex test cases can be defined (e.g., instructions to inject a sequence of user-modified frames into the network). Notably, a test case can make use of the hostap control interface, providing access to built-in features (e.g., authentication procedures, retrieval of encryption keys) and allows users to create customized hostap extensions.
papers.abstract_zh: 多年来，在IEEE 802.11标准及其实现中已经发现了许多弱点。为了演示概念验证或展示其在实践中的影响，研究人员通常需要从头开始实施整个过程或复杂的功能(例如，注入带有定制报头标志的加密帧)。在本文中，我们提出了一个框架，允许研究人员更容易地测试和模糊任何设备(即接入点和客户端)。例如，这个框架使人们能够测试关于新弱点的假设，实现概念证明，创建测试套件，以及自动化实验。我们的框架是在hostap用户空间守护进程之上实现的，并且包括可以定义复杂测试用例的语言(例如，将用户修改的帧序列注入网络的指令)。值得注意的是，测试用例可以利用hostap控制接口，提供对内置特性(例如，认证过程、加密密钥的检索)的访问，并允许用户创建定制的hostap扩展。
papers.title_zh: 测试和模糊wi-fi设备的框架

papers.title: AirCollect: efficiently recovering hashed phone numbers leaked via Apple AirDrop
papers.authors: Alexander Heinrich, Matthias Hollick, Thomas Schneider, Milan Stute, Christian Weinert
papers.abstract: Apple's file-sharing service AirDrop leaks phone numbers and email addresses by exchanging vulnerable hash values of the user's own contact identifiers during the authentication handshake with nearby devices. In a paper presented at USENIX Security'21, we theoretically describe two attacks to exploit these vulnerabilities and propose "PrivateDrop" as a privacy-preserving drop-in replacement for Apple's AirDrop protocol based on private set intersection. In this demo, we show how these vulnerabilities are efficiently exploitable via Wi-Fi and physical proximity to a target. Privacy and security implications include the possibility of conducting advanced spear phishing attacks or deploying multiple "collector" devices in order to build databases that map contact identifiers to specific locations. For our proof-of-concept, we leverage a custom rainbow table construction to reverse SHA-256 hashes of phone numbers in a matter of milliseconds. We discuss the trade-off between success rate and storage requirements of the rainbow table and, after following responsible disclosure with Apple, we publish our proof-of-concept implementation as "AirCollect" on GitHub.
papers.abstract_zh: 苹果的文件共享服务隔空投送通过在与附近设备的认证握手过程中交换用户自己的联系人标识符的脆弱哈希值来泄露电话号码和电子邮件地址。在USENIX安全大会21上提交的一篇论文中，我们从理论上描述了利用这些漏洞的两种攻击，并提出“PrivateDrop”作为苹果基于私有集交集的隔空投送协议的隐私保护插件替代。在本演示中，我们展示了如何通过Wi-Fi和与目标的物理距离来有效利用这些漏洞。隐私和安全问题包括实施高级鱼叉式网络钓鱼攻击或部署多个“收集器”设备的可能性，以便构建将联系人标识符映射到特定位置的数据库。对于我们的概念验证，我们利用定制的彩虹表结构在几毫秒内反转电话号码的SHA-256散列。我们讨论了彩虹表的成功率和存储要求之间的权衡，在与苹果公司进行负责任的披露后，我们在GitHub上以“AirCollect”的形式发布了我们的概念验证实施。
papers.title_zh: AirCollect:有效恢复通过苹果隔空投送泄露的散列电话号码

papers.title: OpenHaystack: a framework for tracking personal bluetooth devices via Apple's massive find my network
papers.authors: Alexander Heinrich, Milan Stute, Matthias Hollick
papers.abstract: OpenHaystack is an open-source framework for locating personal Bluetooth devices using Apple's Find My Network. A user can integrate it into Bluetooth-capable devices, such as notebooks, or create custom tracking accessories that can be attached to personal items (key rings, backpacks, etc.). We provide firmware images for the Nordic nRF5 chips and the ESP32. We show that they consume little energy and run from a single coin cell for a year. Our macOS application can locate personal accessories. Finally, we make both application and firmware available on GitHub.
papers.abstract_zh: OpenHaystack是一个开源框架，用于使用苹果的Find My Network定位个人蓝牙设备。用户可以将其集成到具有蓝牙功能的设备中，如笔记本电脑，或者创建可以附加到个人物品(钥匙圈、背包等)上的定制跟踪附件。).我们为Nordic nRF5芯片和ESP32提供固件映像。我们发现它们消耗的能量很少，并且可以用一个硬币电池运行一年。我们的macOS应用程序可以定位个人配件。最后，我们在GitHub上提供应用程序和固件。
papers.title_zh: OpenHaystack:一个通过苹果庞大的find my network追踪个人蓝牙设备的框架

papers.title: openwifi CSI fuzzer for authorized sensing and covert channels
papers.authors: Xianjun Jiao, Michael T. Mehari, Wei Liu, Muhammad Aslam, Ingrid Moerman
papers.abstract: CSI (Channel State Information) of WiFi systems contains the environment channel response between the transmitter and the receiver, so the people/objects and their movement in between can be sensed. To get CSI, the receiver performs channel estimation based on the pre-known training field of the transmitted WiFi signal. CSI related technology is useful in many cases, but it also brings concerns on privacy and security. In this paper, we open sourced a CSI fuzzer to enhance the privacy and security of WiFi CSI applications. It is built and embedded into the transmitter of openwifi, which is an open source full-stack WiFi chip design, to prevent unauthorized sensing without sacrificing the WiFi link performance. The CSI fuzzer imposes an artificial channel response to the signal before it is transmitted, so the CSI seen by the receiver will indicate the actual channel response combined with the artificial response. Only the authorized receiver, that knows the artificial response, can calculate the actual channel response and perform the CSI sensing. Another potential application of the CSI fuzzer is covert channels based on a set of pre-defined artificial response patterns. Our work resolves the pain point of implementing the anti-sensing idea based on the commercial off-the-shelf WiFi devices.
papers.abstract_zh: WiFi系统的CSI(信道状态信息)包含发射机和接收机之间的环境信道响应，因此可以感知到其间的人/物体及其运动。为了获得CSI，接收器基于传输的WiFi信号的预先知道的训练字段来执行信道估计。CSI相关技术在许多情况下是有用的，但是它也带来了对隐私和安全的关注。在本文中，我们开源了一个CSI fuzzer来增强WiFi CSI应用程序的隐私性和安全性。它内置于openwifi的发射器中，open wifi是一种开源的全栈WiFi芯片设计，可以在不牺牲WiFi链路性能的情况下防止未经授权的感知。CSI模糊器在发送信号之前对信号施加人工信道响应，因此接收机看到的CSI将指示与人工响应相结合的实际信道响应。只有知道人工响应的授权接收机可以计算实际的信道响应并执行CSI感测。CSI模糊器的另一个潜在应用是基于一组预定义的人工响应模式的隐蔽通道。我们的工作解决了基于商用现成WiFi设备实现反感知思想的痛点。
papers.title_zh: openwifi CSI fuzzer用于授权传感和隐蔽通道

papers.title: Relay/replay attacks on GNSS signals
papers.authors: Malte Lenhart, Marco Spanghero, Panagiotis Papadimitratos
papers.abstract: Global Navigation Satellite Systems (GNSSs) are ubiquitously relied upon for positioning and timing. Detection and prevention of attacks against GNSS have been researched over the last decades, but many of these attacks and countermeasures were evaluated based on simulation. This work contributes to the experimental investigation of GNSS vulnerabilities, implementing a relay/replay attack with off-the-shelf hardware. Operating at the signal level, this attack type is not hindered by cryptographically protected transmissions, such as Galileo's Open Service Navigation Message Authentication (OS-NMA). The attack we investigate involves two colluding adversaries, relaying signals over large distances, to effectively spoof a GNSS receiver. We demonstrate the attack using off-the-shelf hardware, we investigate the requirements for such successful colluding attacks, and how they can be enhanced, e.g., allowing for finer adversarial control over the victim receiver.
papers.abstract_zh: 全球导航卫星系统(GNSSs)普遍依赖于定位和定时。在过去的几十年中，已经对针对GNSS的攻击的检测和预防进行了研究，但是这些攻击和对策中的许多是基于仿真来评估的。这项工作有助于对全球导航卫星系统的脆弱性进行实验研究，利用现成的硬件实施中继/重放攻击。这种攻击类型在信号级运行，不会受到加密保护传输的阻碍，如伽利略的开放服务导航消息认证(OS-NMA)。我们调查的攻击涉及两个相互勾结的对手，远距离中继信号，以有效地欺骗GNSS接收器。我们使用现成的硬件演示了攻击，我们研究了这种成功的共谋攻击的要求，以及如何增强它们，例如，允许对受害者接收器进行更精细的敌对控制。
papers.title_zh: 对全球导航卫星系统信号的中继/重放攻击

papers.title: AgriAuth: sensor collaboration and corroboration for data confidence in smart farms
papers.authors: Jay Prakash, Prathmesh Thorwe, Tony Q. S. Quek
papers.abstract: This paper envisions cyber-farm systems along the lines of cyber-physical systems. It is imperative for corporates and nations to maintain health of the crops to ensure food security. In order to avoid any adversarial attack on agriculture sensors in farms, we propose a collaborative sensing based authentication protocol. It assures that the spoofing and tampering can be detected with high probability. The data collected from the experimental deployment of sensor nodes supports the solution proposed by the paper.
papers.abstract_zh: 这篇论文沿着信息物理系统的思路设想了信息农场系统。企业和国家必须保持作物的健康，以确保粮食安全。为了避免对农场中农业传感器的恶意攻击，我们提出了一个基于协作感知的认证协议。它确保了欺骗和篡改能够以很高的概率被检测到。从传感器节点的实验部署中收集的数据支持了本文提出的解决方案。
papers.title_zh: AgriAuth:智能农场中传感器协作和数据可信度确证

papers.title: Cross-protocol attacks: weaponizing a smartphone by diverting its bluetooth controller
papers.authors: Romain Cayre, Géraldine Vache Marconato, Florent Galtier, Mohamed Kaâniche, Vincent Nicomette, Guillaume Auriol
papers.abstract: In this paper, we focus on a new type of wireless attacks, named cross-technology pivoting attacks. The main objective of these attacks is to divert the transceivers of compromised devices dedicated to a given protocol to allow them to communicate through another protocol, taking advantage of some similarities in their modulation schemes. The main contribution of this work consists in demonstrating the practical feasibility of pivoting attacks from off-the-shelf devices implementing the Bluetooth 5.0 specification. To our knowledge, this attack has not been explored so far in the state of the art.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们关注一种新型的无线攻击，称为跨技术旋转攻击。这些攻击的主要目的是转移专用于给定协议的受损设备的收发器，以允许它们通过另一协议进行通信，利用它们的调制方案中的一些相似性。这项工作的主要贡献在于证明了从实现蓝牙5.0规范的现成设备进行旋转攻击的实际可行性。据我们所知，这种攻击在现有技术中还没有被研究过
papers.title_zh: 跨协议攻击:通过转移智能手机的蓝牙控制器将智能手机武器化

papers.title: Detecting GNSS misbehaviour with high-precision clocks
papers.authors: Marco Spanghero, Panos Papadimitratos
papers.abstract: To mitigate spoofing attacks targeting global navigation satellite systems (GNSS) receivers, one promising method is to rely on alternative time sources, such as network-based synchronization, in order to detect clock offset discrepancies caused by GNSS attacks. However, in case of no network connectivity, such validation references would not be available. A viable option is to rely on a local time reference; in particular, precision hardware clock ensembles of chip-scale thermally stable oscillators with extended holdover capabilities. We present a preliminary design and results towards a custom device capable of providing a stable reference, with smaller footprint and cost compared to traditional precision clocks. The system is fully compatible with existing receiver architecture, making this solution feasible for most industrial scenarios. Further integration with network-based synchronization can provide a complete time assurance system, with high short- and long-term stability.
papers.abstract_zh: 为了减轻针对全球导航卫星系统(GNSS)接收器的欺骗攻击，一种有希望的方法是依靠替代时间源，例如基于网络的同步，以便检测由GNSS攻击引起的时钟偏移差异。然而，在没有网络连接的情况下，这样的验证参考将不可用。一个可行的选择是依靠本地时间基准；特别是具有扩展保持能力的芯片级热稳定振荡器的精密硬件时钟组合。我们给出了一个定制器件的初步设计和结果，该器件能够提供稳定的基准电压源，与传统精密时钟相比，尺寸更小，成本更低。该系统与现有接收器架构完全兼容，因此该解决方案适用于大多数工业场景。与基于网络的同步的进一步集成可以提供完整的时间保证系统，具有高的短期和长期稳定性。
papers.title_zh: 利用高精度时钟检测GNSS的不当行为

papers.title: Identifying device type from cross channel probe request behavior
papers.authors: Wyatt Praharenka, Ioanis Nikolaidis
papers.abstract: Across different Wi-Fi devices, there exist differences in the probing behavior during active scanning. We conjecture that the behavior is sufficiently distinct to identify individual device types. We propose a feature engineering strategy to training machine learning algorithms for determination of the device type. We propose a concurrent capture across multiple Wi-Fi channels, thus allowing the features to include attributes for the transitions happening between channels during active scanning. Small-scale proof-of-concept results provide encouraging results about the method's potential.
papers.abstract_zh: 不同的Wi-Fi设备在主动扫描过程中的探测行为存在差异。我们推测这种行为非常独特，足以识别不同的设备类型。我们提出了一种特征工程策略来训练用于确定设备类型的机器学习算法。我们提出跨多个Wi-Fi信道的并发捕获，从而允许特征包括在主动扫描期间信道之间发生的转换的属性。小规模的概念验证结果提供了关于该方法潜力的令人鼓舞的结果。
papers.title_zh: 从跨通道探测请求行为中识别设备类型

papers.title: Robust deep-learning-based radio fingerprinting with fine-tuning
papers.authors: Haipeng Li, Chenggang Wang, Nirnimesh Ghose, Boyang Wang
papers.abstract: Minute hardware imperfections in the radio-frequency circuitry of a wireless device can be leveraged as a unique fingerprint. Radio fingerprinting is a way of distinguishing a device from others of the same type at the physical layer by utilizing these hardware imperfections. Recent studies proposed to utilize deep learning over raw I/Q data for the purpose of radio fingerprinting and achieve high accuracy. Unfortunately, deep-learning-based radio finger-printing is not robust over I/Q data across different days due to significant changes in wireless channels. This study proposes to leverage fine-tuning to improve the robustness of radio fingerprinting in a cross-day scenario, where training and test I/Q data are from different days. Our experimental results suggest that transfer learning is a promising approach for robust deep-learning-based radio fingerprinting in practice.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线设备的射频电路中微小的硬件缺陷可以作为唯一的指纹。无线电指纹识别是一种通过利用这些硬件缺陷在物理层将设备与其他同类设备区分开的方法。最近的研究提出利用对原始I/Q数据的深度学习来进行无线电指纹识别，并实现高精度。不幸的是，由于无线信道的显著变化，基于深度学习的无线电指纹在不同天的I/Q数据上并不鲁棒。这项研究提出利用微调来提高跨日场景中无线电指纹识别的鲁棒性，其中训练和测试I/Q数据来自不同的日子。我们的实验结果表明，迁移学习是一种可行的基于深度学习的无线指纹识别方法。
papers.title_zh: 稳健的基于深度学习的无线电指纹识别和微调

papers.title: Robust Signal Classification Using Siamese Networks
papers.authors: Zachary L. Langford, Logan Eisenbeiser, Matthew Vondal
papers.abstract: We propose a noise-robust signal classification approach using siamese convolutional neural networks (CNNs), which employ a linked parallel structure to rank similarity between inputs. Siamese networks have powerful capabilities that include effective learning with few samples and noisy inputs. This paper focuses on the advantages that siamese CNNs exhibit for classification of quite similar wireless signal emitters across signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) and dataset size. Without any a priori information, candidate siamese and baseline CNNs were trained on compressed spectrogram images to distinguish modulated signal pulses with randomized symbols and identical signal parameters, save for slight frequency offsets commonly exhibited in commercial RF emitter reference oscillator uncertainty distributions. Compared with baseline CNN approaches the proposed methods demonstrate improved classification performance under poor SNR. Moreover, this advantage holds the potential for superior, low-SNR, semi-supervised classification using embeddings from within the networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种使用连体卷积神经网络(CNN)的抗噪声信号分类方法，该方法使用链接的并行结构来排列输入之间的相似性。暹罗网络具有强大的能力，包括利用少量样本和噪声输入进行有效学习。本文重点介绍了连体细胞神经网络在信噪比(SNR)和数据集大小方面对非常相似的无线信号发射器进行分类的优势。在没有任何先验信息的情况下，在压缩频谱图图像上训练候选连体和基线CNN，以区分具有随机化符号和相同信号参数的调制信号脉冲，除了商业RF发射器参考振荡器不确定性分布中通常表现出的轻微频率偏移。与基线CNN方法相比，所提出的方法在低信噪比下表现出改进的分类性能。此外，这一优势为使用网络内嵌入的高级、低SNR、半监督分类提供了潜力。
papers.title_zh: 使用暹罗网络的鲁棒信号分类

papers.title: Targeted Adversarial Examples Against RF Deep Classifiers
papers.authors: Silvija Kokalj-Filipovic, Rob Miller, Joshua Morman
papers.abstract: Adversarial examples (AdExs) in machine learning for classification of radio frequency (RF) signals can be created in a targeted manner such that they go beyond general misclassification and result in the detection of a specific targeted class. Moreover, these drastic, targeted misclassifications can be achieved with minimal waveform perturbations, resulting in catastrophic impact to deep learning based spectrum sensing applications (e.g. WiFi is mistaken for Bluetooth). This work addresses targeted deep learning AdExs, specifically those obtained using the Carlini-Wagner algorithm, and analyzes previously introduced defense mechanisms that performed successfully against non-targeted FGSM-based attacks. To analyze the effects of the Carlini-Wagner attack, and the defense mechanisms, we trained neural networks on two datasets. The first dataset is a subset of the DeepSig dataset, comprised of three synthetic modulations BPSK, QPSK, 8-PSK, which we use to train a simple network for Modulation Recognition. The second dataset contains real-world, well-labeled, curated data from the 2.4 GHz Industrial, Scientific and Medical (ISM) band, that we use to train a network for wireless technology (protocol) classification using three classes: WiFi 802.11n, Bluetooth (BT) and ZigBee. We show that for attacks of limited intensity the impact of the attack in terms of percentage of misclassifications is similar for both datasets, and that the proposed defense is effective in both cases. Finally, we use our ISM data to show that the targeted attack is effective against the deep learning classifier but not against a classical demodulator.
papers.abstract_zh: 用于射频(RF)信号分类的机器学习中的对立示例(AdExs)可以以有针对性的方式创建，使得它们超出一般的误分类，并导致特定目标类别的检测。此外，这些剧烈的、有针对性的错误分类可以通过最小的波形扰动来实现，从而对基于深度学习的频谱感知应用造成灾难性影响(例如，WiFi被误认为蓝牙)。这项工作解决了有针对性的深度学习AdExs，特别是那些使用Carlini-Wagner算法获得的AdExs，并分析了以前引入的防御机制，这些机制成功地抵御了非针对性的基于FGSM的攻击。为了分析Carlini-Wagner攻击的影响和防御机制，我们在两个数据集上训练了神经网络。第一个数据集是DeepSig数据集的子集，由三个合成调制BPSK、QPSK、8-PSK组成，我们用它来训练一个简单的网络进行调制识别。第二个数据集包含来自2.4 GHz工业、科学和医疗(ISM)频段的真实世界的、标记良好的、精选的数据，我们使用这些数据来训练网络，以使用三个类别进行无线技术(协议)分类:WiFi 802.11n、蓝牙(BT)和ZigBee。我们表明，对于有限强度的攻击，攻击的影响在两个数据集的误分类百分比方面是相似的，并且所提出的防御在两种情况下都是有效的。最后，我们使用我们的ISM数据表明，有针对性的攻击对深度学习分类器有效，但对经典解调器无效。
papers.title_zh: 针对RF深层分类器的有针对性的对抗示例

papers.title: Generative Adversarial Radio Spectrum Networks
papers.authors: Tamoghna Roy, Tim O'Shea, Nathan E. West
papers.abstract: Simulating and imitating RF communications signals and systems is a core function of jammers, spoofers, and other attacks in wireless radio environments which seek to confuse spectrum users as to what is occurring in the spectrum around them. Replay attacks and "DRFMs" have long been commonly used to deceive and probe radio systems, however generative models introduce an interesting new angle wherein generative replay can now produce examples of signals of similar structure and properties to arbitrary signals which are not verbatim replays and which may be varied in an infinite number of ways. Further, as GANs have demonstrated a strong ability to learn distributions from complex scenes and datasets, we consider the task of full-band spectral generation in addition to single signal generation to validate and demonstrate the feasibility of such an approach, to refine the algorithmic approach, and to quantify and illustrate the capabilities of such an approach on modern day signal sets.
papers.abstract_zh: 模拟和模仿RF通信信号和系统是无线电环境中的干扰器、欺骗器和其他攻击的核心功能，这些攻击试图混淆频谱用户，使其不知道他们周围的频谱中正在发生什么。重放攻击和“DRFMs”长期以来通常用于欺骗和探测无线电系统，然而生成模型引入了一个有趣的新角度，其中生成重放现在可以产生与任意信号具有相似结构和属性的信号的例子，这些信号不是逐字重放，并且可以以无限多种方式变化。此外，由于GANs已经展示了从复杂场景和数据集学习分布的强大能力，我们考虑了除单信号生成之外的全频带频谱生成任务，以验证和展示这种方法的可行性，改进算法方法，并量化和说明这种方法在现代信号集上的能力。
papers.title_zh: 生成式对抗无线电频谱网络

papers.title: Threat is in the Air: Machine Learning for Wireless Network Applications
papers.authors: Luca Pajola, Luca Pasa, Mauro Conti
papers.abstract: With the spread of wireless application, huge amount of data is generated every day. Thanks to its elasticity, machine learning is becoming a fundamental brick in this field, and many of applications are developed with the use of it and the several techniques that it offers. However, machine learning suffers on different problems and people that use it often are not aware of the possible threats. Often, an adversary tries to exploit these vulnerabilities in order to obtain benefits; because of this, adversarial machine learning is becoming wide studied in the scientific community. In this paper, we show state-of-the-art adversarial techniques and possible countermeasures, with the aim of warning people regarding sensible argument related to the machine learning.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着无线应用的普及，每天都会产生大量的数据。由于其灵活性，机器学习正在成为该领域的一块基石，许多应用程序都是使用它和它提供的几种技术开发的。然而，机器学习面临着不同的问题，使用它的人往往没有意识到可能的威胁。通常，对手试图利用这些漏洞来获取利益；正因为如此，对抗性机器学习正在科学界得到广泛研究。在本文中，我们展示了最先进的对抗技术和可能的对策，旨在警告人们有关机器学习的合理争论。
papers.title_zh: 威胁在空中:无线网络应用的机器学习

papers.title: Towards Adversarial and Unintentional Collisions Detection Using Deep Learning
papers.authors: Hai N. Nguyen, Tien Dang Vo-Huu, Triet Vo Huu, Guevara Noubir
papers.abstract: We introduce a set of techniques to achieve transfer learning from computer vision to RF spectrum analysis. In this paper, we demonstrate the usefulness of this approach to scale the learning, accuracy, and efficiency of detection of adversarial and unintentional communications collisions using VGG-16. We achieve high accuracy (94% collisions detected) on a DARPA Spectrum Collaboration Challenge (SC2) dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们介绍了一套技术来实现从计算机视觉到射频频谱分析的迁移学习。在本文中，我们证明了这种方法的有效性，以衡量学习，准确性和使用VGG-16检测敌对和无意的通信冲突的效率。我们在DARPA频谱合作挑战(SC2)数据集上实现了高精度(94%的碰撞检测)。
papers.title_zh: 使用深度学习进行敌对和非故意碰撞检测

papers.title: On the Limitations of Targeted Adversarial Evasion Attacks Against Deep Learning Enabled Modulation Recognition
papers.authors: Samuel Bair, Matthew DelVecchio, Bryse Flowers, Alan J. Michaels, William C. Headley
papers.abstract: Wireless communications has greatly benefited in recent years from advances in machine learning. A new subfield, commonly termed Radio Frequency Machine Learning (RFML), has emerged that has demonstrated the application of Deep Neural Networks to multiple spectrum sensing tasks such as modulation recognition and specific emitter identification. Yet, recent research in the RF domain has shown that these models are vulnerable to over-the-air adversarial evasion attacks, which seek to cause minimum harm to the underlying transmission to a cooperative receiver, while greatly lowering the performance of spectrum sensing tasks by an eavesdropper. While prior work has focused on untargeted evasion, which simply degrades classification accuracy, this paper focuses on targeted evasion attacks, which aim to masquerade as a specific signal of interest. The current work examines how a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) based Automatic Modulation Classification (AMC) model breaks down in the presence of an adversary with direct access to its inputs. Specifically, the current work uses the adversarial perturbation power needed to change the classification from a specific source modulation to a specific target modulation as a proxy for the model's estimation of their similarity and compares this with the known hierarchy of these human engineered modulations. The findings conclude that the reference model breaks down in an intuitive way, which can have implications on progress towards hardening RFML models.
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，无线通信极大地受益于机器学习的进步。一个新的子领域，通常称为射频机器学习(RFML)，已经出现，它展示了深度神经网络在多频谱感测任务中的应用，如调制识别和特定辐射源识别。然而，射频领域的最新研究表明，这些模型容易受到空中敌对规避攻击，这种攻击试图对合作接收机的底层传输造成最小的损害，同时大大降低窃听者的频谱感知任务的性能。虽然以前的工作集中在非目标规避上，这只会降低分类精度，但本文集中在目标规避攻击上，目标规避攻击旨在伪装成感兴趣的特定信号。当前的工作研究了基于卷积神经网络(CNN)的自动调制分类(AMC)模型如何在对手直接访问其输入的情况下崩溃。具体而言，当前工作使用将分类从特定源调制改变为特定目标调制所需的对抗扰动能力作为模型对其相似性的估计的代理，并将其与这些人类工程调制的已知层级进行比较。研究结果得出结论，参考模型以直观的方式分解，这可能对硬化RFML模型的进展有影响。
papers.title_zh: 针对深度学习调制识别的针对性对抗性规避攻击的局限性

papers.title: Machine Learning-based Prevention of Battery-oriented Illegitimate Task Injection in Mobile Crowdsensing
papers.authors: Yueqian Zhang, Murat Simsek, Burak Kantarci
papers.abstract: Mobile crowdsensing (MCS) is a cloud-inspired and non-dedicated sensing paradigm to enable ubiquitous sensing via built-in sensors of personalized devices. Due to disparate participants and sensing tasks, MCS is vulnerable to threats initiated by malicious participants, which can either be a participant providing sensory data or an end user injecting a fake task aiming at resource (e.g. battery, sensor, etc.) clogging at the participating devices. This paper builds on machine learning-based detection of illegitimate tasks, and investigates the impact of machine learning-based prevention of battery-oriented illegitimate task injection in MCS campaigns. To this end, we introduce two different attack strategies, and test the impact of ML-based detection and elimination of fake tasks on task completion rate, as well as the overall battery drain of participating devices. Simulation results confirm that up to 14% battery power can be saved at the expense of a slight decrease in the completion rate of legitimate tasks.
papers.abstract_zh: 移动众测(MCS)是一种受云启发的非专用传感范式，通过个性化设备的内置传感器实现无处不在的传感。由于不同的参与者和感测任务，MCS容易受到恶意参与者发起的威胁，这些恶意参与者可以是提供感测数据的参与者，也可以是针对资源(例如，电池、传感器等)注入虚假任务的终端用户。)参与设备的堵塞。本文以基于机器学习的非法任务检测为基础，研究了基于机器学习的预防MCS活动中面向电池的非法任务注入的影响。为此，我们引入了两种不同的攻击策略，并测试了基于ML的检测和消除虚假任务对任务完成率的影响，以及参与设备的整体电池消耗。模拟结果证实，以合法任务的完成率略微下降为代价，可以节省高达14%的电池功率。
papers.title_zh: 移动众测中基于机器学习的面向电池的非法任务注入预防

papers.title: Efficient Power Adaptation against Deep Learning Based Predictive Adversaries
papers.authors: Ertugrul N. Ciftcioglu, Mike Ricos
papers.abstract: Wireless communication networks are subject to various types of adversarial attacks, which might be passive in the form of eavesdropping, or active in the form of jamming. For the former category, even if the traffic is encrypted, an adversary performing analysis on observed traffic signatures may lead to leakage of the so called contextual information regarding the traffic. New advances in the field of machine learning also result in significantly more complex adversarial units, which may deduce different forms and uses of such contextual information. In this work, we are interested in power adaptation against an intelligent adversary which utilizes deep learning and attempts to perform predictions and time forecasting on the observed traffic traces to estimate the imminent traffic intensities. Based on its traffic predictions, the adversary might possibly activate its jamming mode and utilize its limited power more efficiently to inflict maximal damage. As a method of mitigation, the transmitter may want to increase transmitter power if it expects a higher probability of jamming, and it has a significant amount of upcoming data to transmit. We leverage Lyapunov optimization and virtual queues to meet a certain level of data transmission reliability while also minimizing power consumption.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线通信网络受到各种类型的敌对攻击，这些攻击可能是被动的窃听形式，也可能是主动的干扰形式。对于前一类，即使流量被加密，对手对观察到的流量签名执行分析也可能导致关于流量的所谓上下文信息的泄漏。机器学习领域的新进展也导致显著更复杂的对立单位，这可能会推导出此类上下文信息的不同形式和用途。在这项工作中，我们对智能对手的功率适应感兴趣，智能对手利用深度学习并试图对观察到的交通轨迹进行预测和时间预测，以估计即将到来的交通强度。根据其流量预测，对手可能会激活其干扰模式，并更有效地利用其有限的能量来造成最大的破坏。作为一种缓解方法，如果发射机预期有更高的干扰概率，并且有大量即将到来的数据要发送，则发射机可能想要增加发射机功率。我们利用李亚普诺夫优化和虚拟队列来满足一定程度的数据传输可靠性，同时最大限度地降低功耗。
papers.title_zh: 针对基于深度学习的预测对手的高效功率适应

papers.title: Jammer Detection based on Artificial Neural Networks: A Measurement Study
papers.authors: Selen Gecgel, Caner Goztepe, Gunes Karabulut Kurt
papers.abstract: Wireless networks are prone to jamming attacks due to the broadcast nature of the wireless transmission environment. The effect of jamming attacks can be further increased as the jammers can focus their signals on reference signals of the transmitters, to further deteriorate the transmission performance. In this paper, we aim to jointly determine the presence of the jammer, along with its attack characteristics by using neural networks. Two neural network architectures are implemented; deep convolutional neural networks and deep recurrent neural networks. The presence of jammer and the transmitter and the type of the jammer is determined through a diverse set of scenarios that are implemented on software defined radios using orthogonal frequency division multiplexing based signaling. To improve the detection performance, prepossessing techniques are applied. Test results show that the proposed approach can effectively detect and classify the jamming attacks with around 85% accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于无线传输环境的广播性质，无线网络容易受到干扰攻击。干扰攻击的影响会进一步增加，因为干扰机会将它们的信号集中在发射机的参考信号上，从而进一步恶化传输性能。在本文中，我们的目标是利用神经网络联合确定干扰机的存在及其攻击特征。实现了两种神经网络架构；深度卷积神经网络和深度递归神经网络。通过使用基于正交频分复用的信令在软件定义的无线电上实现的一组不同的场景，来确定干扰和发射机的存在以及干扰的类型。为了提高检测性能，采用了前置处理技术。测试结果表明，该方法能够有效地检测和分类干扰攻击，准确率达到85%左右。
papers.title_zh: 基于人工神经网络的干扰机检测:测量研究

papers.title: RAPID: Real-time Anomaly-based Preventive Intrusion Detection
papers.authors: Keval Doshi, Mahsa Mozaffari, Yasin Yilmaz
papers.abstract: Intrusion detection systems (IDSs) today face key limitations with respect to detection and prevention of challenging IoT-empowered attacks. We address these limitations by proposing a novel IDS called RAPID, which is based on an online scalable anomaly detection and localization approach. We show that the anomaly detection algorithm is asymptotically optimal under certain conditions, and comprehensively analyze its computational complexity. Considering a real dataset and an IoT testbed we demonstrate the use of RAPID in two different IoT-empowered cyber-attack scenarios, namely high-rate DDoS attacks and low-rate DDoS attacks. The experiment results show the quick and accurate detection and prevention performance of the proposed IDS.
papers.abstract_zh: 如今，入侵检测系统(IDSs)在检测和预防具有挑战性的物联网攻击方面面临关键限制。我们通过提出一种称为RAPID的新型IDS来解决这些限制，该IDS基于在线可扩展异常检测和定位方法。我们证明了异常检测算法在一定条件下是渐近最优的，并全面分析了其计算复杂度。考虑一个真实数据集和一个物联网测试床，我们展示了RAPID在两种不同的物联网支持的网络攻击场景中的使用，即高速率DDoS攻击和低速率DDoS攻击。实验结果表明，该入侵检测系统具有快速、准确的检测和防范性能。
papers.title_zh: 快速:基于实时异常的预防性入侵检测

papers.title: Generative Adversarial Network for Wireless Signal Spoofing
papers.authors: Yi Shi, Kemal Davaslioglu, Yalin E. Sagduyu
papers.abstract: The paper presents a novel approach of spoofing wireless signals by using a general adversarial network (GAN) to generate and transmit synthetic signals that cannot be reliably distinguished from intended signals. It is of paramount importance to authenticate wireless signals at the PHY layer before they proceed through the receiver chain. For that purpose, various waveform, channel, and radio hardware features that are inherent to original wireless signals need to be captured. In the meantime, adversaries become sophisticated with the cognitive radio capability to record, analyze, and manipulate signals before spoofing. Building upon deep learning techniques, this paper introduces a spoofing attack by an adversary pair of a transmitter and a receiver that assume the generator and discriminator roles in the GAN and play a minimax game to generate the best spoofing signals that aim to fool the best trained defense mechanism. The output of this approach is two-fold. From the attacker point of view, a deep learning-based spoofing mechanism is trained to potentially fool a defense mechanism such as RF ingerprinting. From the defender point of view, a deep learning-based defense mechanism is trained against potential spooing attacks when an adversary pair of a transmitter and a receiver cooperates. The probability that the spooing signal is misclassified as the intended signal is measured for random signal, replay, and GAN-based spoofing attacks. Results show that the GAN-based spooing attack provides a major increase in the success probability of wireless signal spoofing even when a deep learning classifier is used as the defense.
papers.abstract_zh: 该文提出了一种新的欺骗无线信号的方法，通过使用一个通用的对抗网络(GAN)来产生和发送无法可靠地区分目标信号的合成信号。在无线信号通过接收机链之前，在PHY层对其进行身份验证至关重要。为此，需要捕获原始无线信号固有的各种波形、信道和无线电硬件特征。与此同时，对手变得越来越老练，具有在欺骗之前记录、分析和操纵信号的认知无线电能力。基于深度学习技术，本文介绍了一种由发送器和接收器组成的对手对进行的欺骗攻击，发送器和接收器在GAN中扮演生成器和鉴别器的角色，并玩一个极大极小游戏来生成最佳欺骗信号，以欺骗训练有素的防御机制。这种方法的输出是双重的。从攻击者的角度来看，一种基于深度学习的欺骗机制被训练成可能欺骗防御机制，如RF指纹。从防御方的角度来看，当发送方和接收方的对手对合作时，基于深度学习的防御机制被训练来对抗潜在的spooing攻击。对于随机信号、重放和基于GAN的欺骗攻击，测量正在进行的信号被错误分类为预期信号的概率。结果表明，即使使用深度学习分类器作为防御，基于GAN的spooing攻击也大大增加了无线信号欺骗的成功概率。
papers.title_zh: 用于无线信号欺骗的生成式对抗网络

papers.title: Wireless Network Virtualization by Leveraging Blockchain Technology and Machine Learning
papers.authors: Ashish Adhikari, Danda B. Rawat, Min Song
papers.abstract: Wireless Virtualization (WiVi) is emerging as a new paradigm to provide high speed communications and meet Quality-of-Service (QoS) requirements of users while reducing the deployment cost of wireless infrastructure for future wireless networks. In WiVi, Wireless Infrastructure Providers (WIPs) sublease their RF channels through slicing to Mobile Virtual Network Operators (MVNOs) based on their Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and the MVNOs independently provide wireless services to their end users. This paper investigates the wireless network virtualization by leveraging both Blockchain technology and machine learning to optimally allocate wireless resources. To eliminate double spending (aka over-committing) of WIPs' wireless resources such as RF channels, Blockchain - a distributed ledger - technology is used where a reputation is used to penalize WIPs with past double spending habit. The proposed reputation based approach helps to minimize extra delay caused by double spending attempts and Blockchain operations. To optimally predict the QoS requirements of MVNOs for their users, linear regression - a machine learning approach - is used that helps to minimize the latency introduced due to (multiple wrong) negotiations for SLAs. The performance evaluation of the proposed approach is carried out by using numerical results obtained from simulations. Results have shown that the joint Blockchain and machine learning based approach outperforms the other approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 无线虚拟化(WiVi)正在成为一种新的范例，它提供高速通信并满足用户的服务质量(QoS)要求，同时降低未来无线网络的无线基础设施的部署成本。在WiVi中，无线基础设施提供商(WIP)根据其服务水平协议(SLA)通过分割向移动虚拟网络运营商(mvno)转租其RF信道，mvno独立地向其终端用户提供无线服务。本文通过利用区块链技术和机器学习来研究无线网络虚拟化，以优化无线资源的分配。为了消除WIP的无线资源(如RF信道)的重复支出(也称为过度承诺)，使用了区块链(一种分布式账本)技术，其中声誉用于惩罚过去有重复支出习惯的WIP。所提出的基于声誉的方法有助于最小化由双重支出尝试和区块链操作所导致的额外延迟。为了最佳地预测MVNOs对其用户的QoS要求，使用线性回归(一种机器学习方法)来帮助最小化由于SLA(多个错误)协商而引入的延迟。通过使用从仿真获得的数值结果，对所提出的方法进行了性能评估。结果表明，基于区块链和机器学习的联合方法优于其他方法。
papers.title_zh: 利用区块链技术和机器学习实现无线网络虚拟化

papers.title: Detecting Drones Status via Encrypted Traffic Analysis
papers.authors: Savio Sciancalepore, Omar Adel Ibrahim, Gabriele Oligeri, Roberto Di Pietro
papers.abstract: We propose a methodology to detect the current status of a powered-on drone (flying or at rest), leveraging just the communication traffic exchanged between the drone and its Remote Controller (RC). Our solution, other than being the first of its kind, does not require either any special hardware or to transmit any signal; it is built applying standard classification algorithms to the eavesdropped traffic, analyzing features such as packets inter-arrival time and size. Moreover, it is fully passive and it resorts to cheap and general purpose hardware. To evaluate the effectiveness of our solution, we collected real communication measurements from a drone running the widespread ArduCopter open-source firmware, mounted onboard on a wide range of commercial amateur drones. The results prove that our methodology can efficiently and effectively identify the current state of a powered-on drone, i.e., if it is flying or lying on the ground. In addition, we estimate a lower bound on the time required to identify the status of a drone with the requested level of assurance. The quality and viability of our solution do prove that network traffic analysis can be successfully adopted for drone status identification, and pave the way for future research in the area.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种方法来检测通电无人机的当前状态(飞行或静止)，只利用无人机与其遥控器(RC)之间交换的通信流量。我们的解决方案，除了是同类中的第一个，不需要任何特殊的硬件或传输任何信号；它将标准分类算法应用于窃听的流量，分析数据包到达间隔时间和大小等特征。此外，它是完全无源的，并且采用廉价的通用硬件。为了评估我们解决方案的有效性，我们从一架运行广泛的ArduCopter开源固件的无人机上收集了真实的通信测量结果，该固件安装在各种商业业余无人机上。结果证明，我们的方法可以高效和有效地识别通电无人机的当前状态，即，它是在飞行还是躺在地上。此外，我们估计了在要求的保证水平下识别无人机状态所需时间的下限。我们的解决方案的质量和可行性确实证明了网络流量分析可以成功地用于无人机状态识别，并为该领域的未来研究铺平了道路。
papers.title_zh: 通过加密流量分析检测无人机状态

papers.title: Insecure connection bootstrapping in cellular networks: the root of all evil
papers.authors: Syed Rafiul Hussain, Mitziu Echeverria, Ankush Singla, Omar Chowdhury, Elisa Bertino
papers.abstract: In the cellular ecosystem, base stations act as trusted intermediaries between cellular devices and the core network. During connection bootstrapping, devices currently, however, do not possess any mechanisms to authenticate a base station before connecting to it. This lack of authentication has been shown to be exploitable by adversaries to install fake base stations which can lure unsuspecting devices to connect to them and then launch sophisticated attacks. Despite being a well-known threat to the cellular ecosystem, this weakness is not addressed in the current protocol versions including 5G. The current paper sets out to fill this void by proposing a Public-key infrastructure (PKI) based authentication mechanism which builds on top of the asymmetric cryptography used in 5G and adheres to the relevant deployment constraints. Our proposed authentication scheme leverages precomputation-based digital signature generation algorithms and employs optimizations in three dimensions---PKI scheme-level, protocol-level, and cryptographic scheme-level---to address the trilemma of small signature size, efficient signature generation, and short verification time. Our evaluation on a real testbed indicates that the proposed scheme is not only readily deployable but also performs better than a symmetric key-based scheme (i.e., TESLA) in terms of security guarantee, overhead, and deployment constraints (e.g., backward compatibility).
papers.abstract_zh: 在蜂窝生态系统中，基站充当蜂窝设备和核心网络之间的可信中介。然而，在连接引导期间，设备当前不具备任何在连接到基站之前认证基站的机制。这种身份验证的缺乏已被证明可以被对手利用来安装假基站，这些假基站可以引诱不知情的设备连接到它们，然后发起复杂的攻击。尽管这是对蜂窝生态系统的一个众所周知的威胁，但这一弱点在包括5G在内的当前协议版本中没有得到解决。本文旨在通过提出一种基于公钥基础设施(PKI)的认证机制来填补这一空白，该机制建立在5G中使用的非对称加密技术之上，并遵守相关的部署限制。我们提出的认证方案利用基于预计算的数字签名生成算法，并采用三个维度的优化- PKI方案级、协议级和加密方案级-来解决小签名大小、高效签名生成和短验证时间的三难问题。我们在真实测试床上的评估表明，所提出的方案不仅易于部署，而且在安全性保证、开销和部署约束(例如，向后兼容性)方面比基于对称密钥的方案(即，TESLA)执行得更好。
papers.title_zh: 蜂窝网络中的不安全连接自举:万恶之源

papers.title: Drive me not: GPS spoofing detection via cellular network: (architectures, models, and experiments)
papers.authors: Gabriele Oligeri, Savio Sciancalepore, Omar Adel Ibrahim, Roberto Di Pietro
papers.abstract: The Global Positioning System (GPS) has been proved to be exposed to several cybersecurity attacks, due to its intrinsic insecure design. GPS spoofing is one of the most easiest, cheap, and dreadful attacks that can be delivered: fake GPS signals can be sent to a target device and make it moving according to a pre-computed path. Although some proposals exist to discriminate between legitimate and rogue GPS signals, those solutions are still difficult to deploy, since they resort to special hardware capable of identifying physical properties of original GPS signals. In this paper, we propose a brand new approach, exploiting the broadcast signals transmitted by the mobile cellular network infrastructure to validate the position received by the GPS infrastructure. In detail, we provide several contributions: (i) the architecture of our solution; (ii) the analytic models related to the GSM infrastructure, including the number of in-range base stations, the distance to the base stations, and the received signal strength; and, (iii) the results achieved via an extensive measurement campaign, carried out by first collecting GPS signals while driving for more than 158 Km, and then using these data to build an experimental model for the evaluation of the performance of our technique in the detection of a wide number of emulated spoofing attacks. Finally, we also tested our solution against a real GPS spoofing attack. We proved it being able to guarantee 0% false positive and 100% detection with an almost negligible delay---all the system parameters being finely tunable, allowing for a wide range of possible trade-offs.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于其固有的不安全设计，全球定位系统(GPS)已经被证明暴露于几次网络安全攻击。GPS欺骗是最容易、最廉价、最可怕的攻击之一:伪造的GPS信号可以被发送到目标设备，并使其按照预先计算好的路径移动。尽管存在一些区分合法和非法GPS信号的提议，但是这些解决方案仍然难以部署，因为它们求助于能够识别原始GPS信号的物理属性的特殊硬件。在本文中，我们提出了一种全新的方法，利用移动蜂窝网络基础设施发送的广播信号来验证GPS基础设施接收到的位置。详细地说，我们提供了几个贡献:(I)我们的解决方案的架构；(ii)与GSM基础设施有关的分析模型，包括范围内基站的数量、到基站的距离和接收信号强度；以及(iii)通过广泛的测量活动获得的结果，首先在行驶超过158 Km时收集GPS信号，然后使用这些数据建立实验模型，以评估我们的技术在检测大量仿真欺骗攻击中的性能。最后，我们还针对真实的GPS欺骗攻击测试了我们的解决方案。我们证明它能够保证0%的假阳性和100%的检测，延迟几乎可以忽略不计——所有的系统参数都可以微调，允许大范围的可能权衡。
papers.title_zh: 不要驱动我:通过蜂窝网络的GPS欺骗检测:(体系结构、模型和实验)

papers.title: Digital radio signal cancellation attacks: an experimental evaluation
papers.authors: Daniel Moser, Vincent Lenders, Srdjan Capkun
papers.abstract: Attacker models are the cornerstone of any security assessment. As attacker's capabilities evolve over time, it is key to re-evaluate periodically if attacker models that were deemed unrealistic in the past might not pose a possible threat today. In this work, we evaluate the threat of wireless radio signal cancellation attacks in the face of recent advancements in software-defined radio attacker capabilities. Unlike classical radio interference or jamming attacker models which add noise to the legitimate communication, signal cancellation attacks aim at interfering destructively with the legitimate signal in order to remove those signals from the spectrum. While signal cancellation attacks were deemed unrealistic in the analogue domain, we analyse the system requirements to perform such attacks digitally using SDRs and evaluate the feasibility to launch such attacks against wireless communication systems such as GPS. Our evaluation reveals that signal cancellation attacks that manage to attenuate up to 40 dB of the signal at the receiver are feasible over the air. We further show that even complex CDMA signals such as GPS can be attenuated by 30 dB, even below a receiver's noise floor. These results indicate that digital signal cancellation attacks - especially against systems like GPS - should not be considered impossible per se, but deserve consideration when assessing the threat of attacks on wireless communication systems.
papers.abstract_zh: 攻击者模型是任何安全评估的基础。由于攻击者的能力会随着时间的推移而不断发展，因此定期重新评估过去被认为不切实际的攻击者模型在今天是否会构成潜在威胁是非常关键的。在这项工作中，我们评估了无线无线电信号消除攻击的威胁，面对软件定义的无线电攻击者能力的最新进展。与向合法通信添加噪声的经典无线电干扰或干扰攻击者模型不同，信号消除攻击旨在破坏性地干扰合法信号，以便从频谱中移除这些信号。虽然信号抵消攻击在模拟领域被认为是不现实的，但我们分析了使用SDR以数字方式执行此类攻击的系统要求，并评估了针对GPS等无线通信系统发起此类攻击的可行性。我们的评估表明，设法在接收机处衰减高达40 dB信号的信号消除攻击在空中是可行的。我们进一步表明，即使是复杂的CDMA信号，如GPS，也可以衰减30 dB，甚至低于接收机的噪底。这些结果表明，数字信号抵消攻击——尤其是针对GPS等系统的攻击——本身不应被视为不可能，但在评估对无线通信系统的攻击威胁时值得考虑。
papers.title_zh: 数字无线电信号抵消攻击:实验评估

papers.title: Protecting mobile devices from physical memory attacks with targeted encryption
papers.authors: Le Guan, Chen Cao, Sencun Zhu, Jingqiang Lin, Peng Liu, Yubin Xia, Bo Luo
papers.abstract: Sensitive data in a process could be scattered over the memory of a computer system for a prolonged period of time. Unfortunately, DRAM chips were proven insecure in previous studies. The problem becomes worse in the mobile environment, in which users' smartphones are easily lost or stolen. The powered-on phones may contain sensitive data in the vulnerable DRAM chips. In this paper, we propose MemVault, a mechanism to protect sensitive data in Android devices against physical memory attacks. MemVault keeps track of the propagation of well-marked sensitive data sources, and selectively encrypts tainted sensitive memory contents in the DRAM chip. When a tainted object is accessed, MemVault redirects the access to the internal RAM (iRAM), where the cipher-text object is decrypted transparently. iRAM is a system-on-chip (SoC) component which is by nature immune to physical memory exploits. We have implemented a MemVault prototype system, and have evaluated it with extensive experiments. Our results validate that MemVault effectively eliminates the occurrences of clear-text sensitive objects in DRAM chips, and imposes acceptable overheads.
papers.abstract_zh: 进程中的敏感数据可能会长时间分散在计算机系统的内存中。不幸的是，DRAM芯片在以前的研究中被证明是不安全的。在移动环境中，这个问题变得更加严重，因为用户的智能手机很容易丢失或被盗。开机的手机可能在易受攻击的DRAM芯片中包含敏感数据。在本文中，我们提出了MemVault，这是一种保护Android设备中的敏感数据免受物理内存攻击的机制。MemVault跟踪标记良好的敏感数据源的传播，并选择性地加密DRAM芯片中受感染的敏感内存内容。当被感染的对象被访问时，MemVault将访问重定向到内部RAM (iRAM ),在那里密文对象被透明地解密。iRAM是片上系统(SoC)组件，其本质上不受物理存储器利用的影响。我们已经实现了一个MemVault原型系统，并通过大量实验对其进行了评估。我们的结果验证了MemVault有效地消除了DRAM芯片中明文敏感对象的出现，并施加了可接受的开销。
papers.title_zh: 通过有针对性的加密保护移动设备免受物理内存攻击

papers.title: Advancing remote attestation via computer-aided formal verification of designs and synthesis of executables: opinion
papers.authors: Karim Eldefrawy, Gene Tsudik
papers.abstract: Remote Attestation (RA) of embedded/smart/IoT devices is a very important issue on today's security landscape. RA enables a verifier to measures the current internal memory state of an untrusted remote device (prover). RA helps the verifier establish a static or dynamic root of trust in prover. Despite much prior work, state-of-the-art RA techniques unfortunately still lack any solid foundation and offer no ironclad security, safety or robustness guarantees. This paper argues that computer-aided formal verification, and synthesis of executables, of RA protocols and hybrid (software-hardware) architectures is required and currently unaddressed.
