We believe that this is achievable with current (computer-aided) formal methods frameworks and tools, and that this can help advance and mature RA research if used to establish more rigorous and clear security arguments. To support our opinion, we highlight several examples where subtle issues were missed in the design and security analysis of RA techniques. Despite deceptive simplicity of such protocols, manual analyses and ad hoc implementations often lead to over-simplification of (and subsequent glossing over) important details in the underlying processor and system architectures. Computer-aided formal verification forces a more scrupulous and disciplined consideration of such details, since, otherwise, verification simply fails. The key objective of the research direction we propose is to increase confidence in correctness and security guarantees of current and future RA techniques and their implementations.
papers.abstract_zh: 嵌入式/智能/物联网设备的远程认证(RA)是当今安全领域的一个非常重要的问题。RA使验证者能够测量不可信远程设备(证明者)的当前内部存储器状态。RA帮助验证者在证明者中建立静态或动态的信任根。尽管之前做了大量工作，但遗憾的是，最新的RA技术仍然缺乏任何坚实的基础，并且不提供绝对的安全性、安全性或健壮性保证。本文认为，RA协议和混合(软件-硬件)架构的计算机辅助形式验证和可执行文件的合成是必需的，但目前还没有解决。我们相信这是可以用当前的(计算机辅助的)正式方法框架和工具实现的，并且如果用于建立更严格和清晰的安全论证，这可以帮助推进和成熟RA研究。为了支持我们的观点，我们强调了几个在RA技术的设计和安全性分析中遗漏了微妙问题的例子。尽管此类协议简单得令人迷惑，但手动分析和特别实施通常会导致底层处理器和系统架构中重要细节的过度简化(以及随后的掩饰)。计算机辅助的形式验证迫使人们对这些细节进行更加细致和严格的考虑，否则验证就会失败。我们提出的研究方向的主要目标是增加对当前和未来RA技术及其实现的正确性和安全性保证的信心。
papers.title_zh: 通过设计的计算机辅助形式验证和可执行文件的合成推进远程证明:观点

papers.title: deWristified: handwriting inference using wrist-based motion sensors revisited
papers.authors: Raveen Wijewickrama, Anindya Maiti, Murtuza Jadliwala
papers.abstract: Several recent research efforts have shown that privacy of handwritten information is vulnerable to inference threats that employ zero-permission motion sensors commonly found on wrist-wearables (e.g., smart watches and fitness bands) as information side-channels. While the adversary model in these earlier efforts have been reasonable and the proposed inference (or threat) frameworks themselves are practical and have technical merit, the related empirical evaluations suffer from several significant shortcomings, such as, use of specialized sensor hardware and highly constrained or restrictive experimental procedures, to name a few. As a result, it is hard to estimate the practical feasibility of these threats from existing research results in the literature, and thus, the extent to which end-users must be concerned about the possibility of such attacks in real-life. To answer the above question, this paper replicates some of the well-known wrist motion-based handwriting inference frameworks in the literature in order to (re)evaluate their success or accuracy in natural, unrestricted handwriting scenarios and settings by employing commercially available wrist-wearables. The results of these extensive replication and (re)evaluation studies highlight several characteristics in motion data corresponding to natural handwriting scenarios, which were either not observed or ignored by earlier efforts, and contribute to poor inference accuracy of the corresponding frameworks. In summary, accurate and practical handwriting inference using motion data (side-channeled) from consumer-grade wrist-wearables is difficult primarily due to unique and/or inconsistent handwriting behavior observed in natural writing.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的几项研究表明，手写信息的隐私容易受到推理威胁，这些威胁采用通常在腕戴设备(如智能手表和健身带)上发现的零许可运动传感器作为信息侧信道。虽然在这些早期努力中的对手模型是合理的，并且所提出的推断(或威胁)框架本身是实用的并且具有技术价值，但是相关的经验评估遭受几个显著的缺点，例如，使用专门的传感器硬件和高度受限或限制性的实验程序，仅举几个例子。因此，很难从文献中的现有研究结果来估计这些威胁的实际可行性，因此，最终用户必须在多大程度上关注现实生活中这种攻击的可能性。为了回答上述问题，本文复制了文献中一些众所周知的基于手腕运动的手写推理框架，以便通过使用商业上可用的手腕可穿戴设备(重新)评估它们在自然、不受限制的手写场景和设置中的成功或准确性。这些广泛的复制和(重新)评估研究的结果突出了对应于自然手写场景的运动数据中的几个特征，这些特征或者没有被观察到或者被早期的努力所忽略，并且导致了相应框架的较差的推断准确性。总之，使用来自消费级手腕可穿戴设备的运动数据(侧通道)进行准确和实用的手写推断是困难的，这主要是由于在自然书写中观察到的独特和/或不一致的手写行为。
papers.title_zh: 启发:使用基于腕部的运动传感器的手写推理再探

papers.title: 2FA-PP: 2nd factor phishing prevention
papers.authors: Enis Ulqinaku, Daniele Lain, Srdjan Capkun
papers.abstract: Two factor authentication (2FA) schemes provide strong user authentication guarantees and increase the security of a wide range of web services. However, 2FA schemes still largely remain vulnerable to phishing attacks in which attackers also phish users' second factor (e.g., their OTP tokens). We propose 2FA-PP, a phishing detection scheme that protects users' 2nd authentication factor from phishing attacks. 2FA-PP uses novel browser APIs that support direct communication between browsers and external devices (e.g., mobile phones) and enables the user's phone to check the domain to which the user is connected. The second factor is then only made available to the user if he is accessing the correct domain. 2FA-PP can be combined with different 2FA schemes, both interactive, based on OTP, QR codes and non-interactive, based on device pairing or proximity.
papers.abstract_zh: 双因素身份验证(2FA)方案提供了强大的用户身份验证保证，并提高了各种web服务的安全性。然而，2FA方案在很大程度上仍然容易受到网络钓鱼攻击，其中攻击者还钓鱼用户的第二个因素(例如，他们的OTP令牌)。我们提出了2FA-PP，一种保护用户的第二认证因素免受网络钓鱼攻击的网络钓鱼检测方案。2FA-PP使用新颖的浏览器API，支持浏览器和外部设备(例如，移动电话)之间的直接通信，并使用户的电话能够检查用户连接到的域。如果用户正在访问正确的域，则第二个因素仅对用户可用。2FA-PP可以与不同的2FA方案相结合，既可以是基于OTP、QR码的交互式方案，也可以是基于设备配对或接近度的非交互式方案。
papers.title_zh: 2FA-PP:第二要素网络钓鱼防护

papers.title: Crowdsourced measurements for device fingerprinting
papers.authors: Seth Andrews, Ryan M. Gerdes, Ming Li
papers.abstract: Physical layer identification allows verifying a user's identity based on their transmitter hardware. In contrast with digital identifiers at higher protocol layers, physical layer identification or device fingerprinting can identify unique signal characteristics at the physical layer introduced by manufacturing variability specific to each device. Recently, dynamic spectrum access has been proposed to allow a larger number of devices to efficiently access wireless spectrum. In such a system many low-cost devices may be distributed over a large area with spectrum allocated and managed by a central authority. Traditional authentication methods may not be secure, or adequate to identify existing users in a backwards compatible way: Identifiers such as MAC addresses can be impersonated, and the number of devices and their distributed nature may make key distribution and revocation difficult. Consequently, physical layer identification can be used to augment other security measures. We consider a crowdsourced scenario where individual users observe a signal using their own receiver and report their measurements to an enforcement authority which then identifies malicious users. Three types of measurements that can be crowdsourced are considered: actual signal observations, feature values, and fingerprinter output. Several methods for combining these measurements are considered. Performance is demonstrated on data collected from three wireless channels, used to simulate multiple receivers, from a total of twelve transmitters. The methods are evaluated in terms of required computational resources, bandwidth to report measurements, and how they are affected by mismatch in receiver characteristics. It is found that the crowdsourcing measurements can provide an improvement over individual receivers, with the best method dependent on the features and receivers used.
papers.abstract_zh: 物理层识别允许根据用户的发射机硬件来验证用户的身份。与较高协议层的数字标识符相比，物理层识别或设备指纹识别可以在物理层识别由每个设备特定的制造可变性引入的独特信号特征。最近，已经提出了动态频谱接入，以允许大量设备有效地接入无线频谱。在这样的系统中，许多低成本设备可以分布在一个大的区域中，由中央机构分配和管理频谱。传统的认证方法可能不安全，或者不足以以向后兼容的方式识别现有用户:诸如MAC地址之类的标识符可以被模仿，并且设备的数量和它们的分布式特性可能使得密钥分发和撤销变得困难。因此，物理层识别可用于增强其他安全措施。我们考虑一个众包场景，其中个人用户使用他们自己的接收器观察信号，并向执行机构报告他们的测量结果，然后执行机构识别恶意用户。考虑三种可以众包的测量类型:实际信号观察、特征值和指纹输出。考虑了几种组合这些测量值的方法。在从三个无线信道收集的数据上展示了性能，用于模拟来自总共十二个发射机的多个接收机。根据所需的计算资源、报告测量的带宽以及它们如何受接收器特性的不匹配影响来评估这些方法。人们发现，众包测量可以提供对单个接收者的改进，最佳方法取决于所使用的特征和接收者。
papers.title_zh: 设备指纹的众包测量

papers.title: Physical layer plausibility checks for misbehavior detection in V2X networks
papers.authors: Steven So, Jonathan Petit, David Starobinski
papers.abstract: Location spoofing is a proven and powerful attack against Vehicle-to-everything (V2X) communication systems that can cause traffic congestion and other safety hazards. Recent work also demonstrates practical spoofing attacks that can circumvent application layer sanity checks. In this paper, we propose three novel physical layer plausibility checks that leverage the received signal strength indicator (RSSI) of basic safety messages (BSMs). These plausibility checks have multi-step mechanisms to improve not only the detection rate, but also to decrease false positives. These checks can be run independently by each vehicle and do not rely on the assumption that the majority of vehicles is honest. We comprehensively evaluate the performance of these plausibility checks using the VeReMi dataset (which we enhance along the way) for several types of attacks. We show that the best performing physical layer plausibility check among the three considered achieves an overall detection rate of 83.73% and a precision of 95.91%, far outperforming recently proposed machine learning-based misbehavior detection methods operating at the application layer.
papers.abstract_zh: 位置欺骗是针对车对物(V2X)通信系统的一种经过验证的强大攻击，它会导致交通拥堵和其他安全隐患。最近的工作还展示了可以规避应用层健全性检查的实际欺骗攻击。在本文中，我们提出了三种新颖的物理层真实性检查，它们利用基本安全消息(bsm)的接收信号强度指示符(RSSI)。这些真实性检查具有多步机制，不仅可以提高检测率，还可以减少假阳性。这些检查可以由每辆车独立运行，并且不依赖于大多数车辆是诚实的假设。我们使用VeReMi数据集(我们一直在增强该数据集)针对几种类型的攻击全面评估了这些真实性检查的性能。我们表明，在所考虑的三种方法中，性能最好的物理层似真性检查实现了83.73%的总体检测率和95.91%的精度，远远优于最近提出的在应用层运行的基于机器学习的不当行为检测方法。
papers.title_zh: V2X网络中针对不当行为检测的物理层合理性检查

papers.title: Characterizing security and privacy practices in emerging digital credit applications
papers.authors: Jasmine D. Bowers, Imani N. Sherman, Kevin R. B. Butler, Patrick Traynor
papers.abstract: Access to credit can provide capital crucial to both businesses and individuals. Unfortunately, for large parts of the developing world, access to credit is not available because customers often lack the traditional data used by lenders to make such decisions (e.g., verifiable payroll statements, property ownership documents). Emerging online credit services address this need through the use of non-traditional creditworthiness data, which many believe to include user geolocation and social network information. While such systems both potentially expand credit availability and improve usability through instant evaluation, their security and privacy practices remain opaque. In this paper, we perform the first comprehensive security analysis of the emerging online credit space. To provide improved transparency, we select 51 representative companies across the industry, analyze their privacy policies and compare them to the sensitive data types mobile applications actually gather. We then evaluate the configuration of connections between mobile apps and their supporting servers to determine whether they securely handle such data. Our analysis demonstrates significant security and privacy issues across this burgeoning industry, including the gathering of previously undisclosed data types and widespread mis-configuration of encryption. We conclude by discussing our efforts to work with partners in and around the industry to improve these issues.
papers.abstract_zh: 获得信贷可以提供对企业和个人都至关重要的资本。不幸的是，对于发展中世界的大部分地区来说，无法获得信贷，因为客户往往缺乏贷款人用来作出这种决定的传统数据(例如，可核实的工资单、财产所有权文件)。新兴的在线信贷服务通过使用非传统的信誉数据来满足这一需求，许多人认为这些数据包括用户地理位置和社交网络信息。虽然这种系统有可能通过即时评估扩大信用可用性并提高可用性，但它们的安全和隐私做法仍然不透明。在本文中，我们对新兴的在线信用空间进行了首次全面的安全性分析。为了提高透明度，我们选择了行业内51家有代表性的公司，分析它们的隐私政策，并将其与移动应用程序实际收集的敏感数据类型进行比较。然后，我们评估移动应用程序及其支持服务器之间的连接配置，以确定它们是否安全地处理这些数据。我们的分析表明，这一新兴行业存在严重的安全和隐私问题，包括收集以前未披露的数据类型和普遍的加密错误配置。最后，我们讨论了我们与行业内外的合作伙伴为改善这些问题所做的努力。
papers.title_zh: 新兴数字信贷应用中的安全和隐私实践特征

papers.title: Clicktok: click fraud detection using traffic analysis
papers.authors: Shishir Nagaraja, Ryan Shah
papers.abstract: Advertising is a primary means for revenue generation for millions of websites and smartphone apps. Naturally, a fraction abuse ad networks to systematically defraud advertisers of their money. Modern defences have matured to overcome some forms of click fraud but measurement studies have reported that a third of clicks supplied by ad networks could be clickspam. Our work develops novel inference techniques which can isolate click fraud attacks using their fundamental properties. We propose two defences, mimicry and bait-click, which provide clickspam detection with substantially improved results over current approaches. Mimicry leverages the observation that organic clickfraud involves the reuse of legitimate click traffic, and thus isolates clickspam by detecting patterns of click reuse within ad network clickstreams. The bait-click defence leverages the vantage point of an ad network to inject a pattern of bait clicks into a user's device. Any organic clickspam generated involving the bait clicks will be subsequently recognisable by the ad network. Our experiments show that the mimicry defence detects around 81% of fake clicks in stealthy (low rate) attacks, with a false-positive rate of 110 per hundred thousand clicks. Similarly, the bait-click defence enables further improvements in detection, with rates of 95% and a reduction in false-positive rates of between 0 and 30 clicks per million - a substantial improvement over current approaches.
papers.abstract_zh: 广告是数百万网站和智能手机应用创收的主要手段。自然，一小部分人滥用广告网络来系统地骗取广告商的钱。现代防御手段已经成熟，可以克服某些形式的点击欺诈，但测量研究报告称，广告网络提供的三分之一的点击可能是clickspam。我们的工作开发了新的推理技术，可以使用点击欺诈攻击的基本属性来隔离它们。我们提出了两种防御方法，模仿和诱饵点击，这两种方法为点击垃圾邮件检测提供了比当前方法显著改进的结果。模仿利用了对有机点击欺诈涉及合法点击流量重用的观察，从而通过检测广告网络点击流中的点击重用模式来隔离点击垃圾。诱饵点击防御利用广告网络的优势，将诱饵点击模式注入用户的设备。任何涉及诱饵点击的有机点击广告将随后被广告网络识别。我们的实验表明，模仿防御在秘密(低比率)攻击中检测到大约81%的虚假点击，每十万次点击中有110次的误报率。类似地，诱饵点击防御使检测能力进一步提高，准确率达到95%，假阳性率降低到每百万次点击0到30次，这是对当前方法的重大改进。
papers.title_zh: Clicktok:使用流量分析进行点击欺诈检测

papers.title: Indraj: digital certificate enrollment for battery-powered wireless devices
papers.authors: Zhitao He, Martin Furuhed, Shahid Raza
papers.abstract: A public key infrastructure (PKI) has been widely deployed and well tested on the Internet. However, this standard practice of delivering scalable security has not yet been extended to the rapidly growing Internet of Things (IoT). Thanks to vendor hardware support and standardization of resource-efficient communication protocols, asymmetric cryptography is no longer unfeasible on small devices. To migrate IoT from poorly scalable, pair-wise symmetric encryption to PKI, a major obstacle remains: how do we certify the public keys of billions of small devices without manual checks or complex logistics? The process of certifying a public key in form of a digital certificate is called enrollment. In this paper, we design an enrollment protocol, called Indraj, to automate enrollment of certificate-based digital identities on resource-constrained IoT devices. Reusing the semantics of the Enrollment over Secure Transport (EST) protocol designed for Internet hosts, Indraj optimizes resource usage by leveraging an IoT stack consisting of Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP), Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) and IPv6 over Low-Power Wireless Personal Area Networks (6LoWPAN). We evaluate our implementation on a low power 32-bit MCU, showing the feasibility of our protocol in terms of latency, power consumption and memory usage. Asymmetric cryptography enabled by automatic certificate enrollment will finally turn IoT devices into well behaved, first-class citizens on the Internet.
papers.abstract_zh: 公钥基础设施(PKI)已经在互联网上被广泛部署和测试。然而，这种提供可扩展安全性的标准实践尚未扩展到快速增长的物联网(IoT)。由于供应商硬件支持和资源高效通信协议的标准化，非对称加密在小型设备上不再不可行。要将物联网从扩展性差的成对对称加密迁移到PKI，一个主要障碍仍然存在:我们如何在没有人工检查或复杂物流的情况下认证数十亿台小型设备的公钥？以数字证书的形式证明公钥的过程称为注册。在本文中，我们设计了一个名为Indraj的注册协议，用于在资源受限的物联网设备上自动注册基于证书的数字身份。Indraj重新使用了为互联网主机设计的安全传输注册(EST)协议的语义，通过利用由受限应用协议(CoAP)、数据报传输层安全(DTLS)和低功耗无线个人区域网(6LoWPAN)上的IPv6组成的物联网堆栈来优化资源使用。我们在低功耗32位MCU上评估了我们的实现，显示了我们的协议在延迟、功耗和内存使用方面的可行性。通过自动证书注册实现的非对称加密技术将最终使物联网设备成为行为良好的互联网一等公民。
papers.title_zh: Indraj:电池供电无线设备的数字证书注册

papers.title: HomeSnitch: behavior transparency and control for smart home IoT devices
papers.authors: T. J. OConnor, Reham Mohamed, Markus Miettinen, William Enck, Bradley Reaves, Ahmad-Reza Sadeghi
papers.abstract: The widespread adoption of smart home IoT devices has led to a broad and heterogeneous market with flawed security designs and privacy concerns. While the quality of IoT device software is unlikely to be fixed soon, there is great potential for a network-based solution that helps protect and inform consumers. Unfortunately, the encrypted and proprietary protocols used by devices limit the value of traditional network-based monitoring techniques. In this paper, we present HomeSnitch, a building block for enhancing smart home transparency and control by classifying IoT device communication by semantic behavior (e.g., heartbeat, firmware check, motion detection). HomeSnitch ignores payload content (which is often encrypted) and instead identifies behaviors using features of connection-oriented application data unit exchanges, which represent application-layer dialog between clients and servers. We evaluate HomeSnitch against an independent labeled corpus of IoT device network flows and correctly detect over 99% of behaviors. We further deployed HomeSnitch in a home environment and empirically evaluated its ability to correctly classify known behaviors as well as discover new behaviors. Through these efforts, we demonstrate the utility of network-level services to classify behaviors of and enforce control on smart home devices.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能家居物联网设备的广泛采用导致了一个广泛而异构的市场，该市场存在安全设计缺陷和隐私问题。虽然物联网设备软件的质量不太可能很快得到解决，但基于网络的解决方案有很大的潜力来帮助保护和告知消费者。不幸的是，设备使用的加密和专有协议限制了传统的基于网络的监控技术的价值。在本文中，我们介绍了HomeSnitch，这是一个通过按语义行为(如心跳、固件检查、运动检测)对物联网设备通信进行分类来增强智能家居透明度和控制的构建模块。HomeSnitch忽略有效负载内容(通常是加密的)，而是使用面向连接的应用程序数据单元交换的功能来识别行为，这代表客户端和服务器之间的应用层对话。我们根据物联网设备网络流的独立标记语料库评估HomeSnitch，并正确检测超过99%的行为。我们进一步在家庭环境中部署了HomeSnitch，并根据经验评估了它正确分类已知行为以及发现新行为的能力。通过这些努力，我们展示了网络级服务对智能家居设备的行为进行分类和实施控制的效用。
papers.title_zh: HomeSnitch:智能家居物联网设备的行为透明和控制

papers.title: Blinded and confused: uncovering systemic flaws in device telemetry for smart-home internet of things
papers.authors: T. J. OConnor, William Enck, Bradley Reaves
papers.abstract: The always-on, always-connected nature of smart home devices complicates Internet-of-Things (IoT) security and privacy. Unlike traditional hosts, IoT devices constantly send sensor, state, and heartbeat data to cloud-based servers. These data channels require reliable, routine communication, which is often at odds with an IoT device's storage and power constraints. Although recent efforts such as pervasive encryption have addressed protecting data intransit, there remains little insight into designing mechanisms for protecting integrity and availability for always-connected devices. This paper seeks to better understand smart home device security by studying the vendor design decisions surrounding IoT telemetry messaging protocols, specifically, the behaviors taken when an IoT device loses connectivity. To understand this, we hypothesize and evaluate sensor blinding and state confusion attacks, measuring their effectiveness against an array of smart home IoT device types. Our analysis uncovers pervasive failure in designing telemetry that reports data to the cloud, and buffering that fails to properly cache undelivered data. We uncover that 22 of 24 studied devices suffer from critical design flaws that (1) enable attacks to transparently disrupt the reporting of device status alerts or (2) prevent the uploading of content integral to the device's core functionality. We conclude by considering the implications of these findings and offer directions for future defense. While the state of the art is rife with implementation flaws, there are several countermeasures IoT vendors could take to reduce their exposure to attacks of this nature.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能家居设备始终在线、始终连接的特性使物联网(IoT)的安全性和隐私变得更加复杂。与传统主机不同，物联网设备不断向基于云的服务器发送传感器、状态和心跳数据。这些数据通道需要可靠的常规通信，这通常与物联网设备的存储和电源限制相矛盾。虽然最近的努力，如普遍加密，已经解决了保护在途数据的问题，但对于设计保护始终连接的设备的完整性和可用性的机制，仍然缺乏深入的了解。本文旨在通过研究供应商围绕物联网遥测消息协议的设计决策，特别是当物联网设备失去连接时采取的行为，来更好地了解智能家居设备的安全性。为了理解这一点，我们假设并评估了传感器致盲和状态混淆攻击，测量了它们对一系列智能家居物联网设备类型的有效性。我们的分析揭示了向云报告数据的遥测设计中的普遍失败，以及未能正确缓存未交付数据的缓冲。我们发现，24个被研究的设备中有22个存在严重的设计缺陷，这些缺陷(1)使攻击能够透明地中断设备状态警报的报告，或者(2)阻止上传设备核心功能不可或缺的内容。我们通过考虑这些发现的含义得出结论，并为未来的防御提供方向。虽然目前的技术水平充满了实施缺陷，但物联网供应商可以采取一些对策来减少这种性质的攻击。
papers.title_zh: 盲目和困惑:揭示智能家居物联网设备遥测的系统性缺陷

papers.title: ARF: identifying re-delegation vulnerabilities in Android system services
papers.authors: Sigmund Albert Gorski III, William Enck
papers.abstract: Over the past decade, the security of the Android platform has undergone significant scrutiny by both academic and industrial researchers. This scrutiny has been largely directed towards third-party applications and a few critical system interfaces, leaving much of Android's middleware unstudied. Building upon recent efforts to more rigorously analyze authorization logic in Android's system services, we revisit the problem of permission re-delegation, but in the context of system service entry points. In this paper, we propose the Android Re-delegation Finder (ARF) analysis framework for helping security analysts identify permission re-delegation vulnerabilities within Android's system services. ARF analyzes an interconnected graph of entry points in system services, deriving calling dependencies, annotating permission checks, and identifying potentially vulnerable deputies that improperly expose information or functionality to third-party applications. We apply ARF to Android AOSP version 8.1.0 and find that it refines the set of 15,483 paths between entry points down to a manageable set of 490 paths. Upon manual inspection, we found that 170 paths improperly exposed information or functionality, consisting of 86 vulnerable deputies. Through this effort, we demonstrate the need for continued investigation of automated tools to analyze the authorization logic within the Android middleware.
papers.abstract_zh: 在过去的十年里，Android平台的安全性受到了学术界和工业界研究人员的密切关注。这种审查主要针对第三方应用程序和一些关键的系统界面，对Android的许多中间件没有进行研究。在最近更严格地分析Android系统服务中的授权逻辑的基础上，我们重新审视了权限再委托的问题，但是是在系统服务入口点的上下文中。在本文中，我们提出了Android再授权查找器(ARF)分析框架，用于帮助安全分析师识别Android系统服务中的权限再授权漏洞。ARF分析系统服务中入口点的互连图，导出调用依赖关系，注释权限检查，并识别不恰当地向第三方应用程序公开信息或功能的潜在易受攻击的代理。我们将ARF应用于Android AOSP版本8.1.0，发现它将入口点之间的15，483条路径精简为可管理的490条路径。通过手动检查，我们发现有170条路径不适当地公开了信息或功能，包括86个易受攻击的代理。通过这一努力，我们证明了继续研究自动化工具以分析Android中间件中的授权逻辑的必要性。
papers.title_zh: ARF:识别Android系统服务中的重新授权漏洞

papers.title: Fatal attraction: identifying mobile devices through electromagnetic emissions
papers.authors: Beatrice Perez, Mirco Musolesi, Gianluca Stringhini
papers.abstract: Smartphones are increasingly augmented with sensors for a variety of purposes. In this paper, we show how magnetic field emissions can be used to fingerprint smartphones. Previous work on identification rely on specific characteristics that vary with the settings and components available on a device. This limits the number of devices on which one approach is effective. By contrast, all electronic devices emit a magnetic field which is accessible either through the API or measured through an external device. We conducted an in-the-wild study over four months and collected mobile sensor data from 175 devices. In our experiments we observed that the electromagnetic field measured by the magnetometer identifies devices with an accuracy of 98.9%. Furthermore, we show that even if the sensor was removed from the device or access to it was discontinued, identification would still be possible from a secondary device in close proximity to the target. Our findings suggest that the magnetic field emitted by smartphones is unique and fingerprinting devices based on this feature can be performed without the knowledge or cooperation of users.
papers.abstract_zh: 智能手机越来越多地增加了用于各种目的的传感器。在本文中，我们展示了磁场辐射如何用于智能手机的指纹识别。以前的识别工作依赖于特定的特征，这些特征随着设备上可用的设置和组件而变化。这限制了一种方法有效的设备的数量。相比之下，所有电子设备都会发出磁场，该磁场可以通过API访问，也可以通过外部设备测量。我们进行了为期四个月的野外研究，并从175台设备上收集了移动传感器数据。在我们的实验中，我们观察到由磁力计测量的电磁场以98.9%的准确度识别设备。此外，我们表明，即使传感器从设备上移除或对其的访问被中断，仍然可以从靠近目标的辅助设备进行识别。我们的发现表明，智能手机发出的磁场是独特的，基于这一特征的指纹识别设备可以在用户不知情或不合作的情况下执行。
papers.title_zh: 致命吸引力:通过电磁辐射识别移动设备

papers.title: Scaling pseudonymous authentication for large mobile systems
papers.authors: Mohammad Khodaei, Hamid Noroozi, Panos Papadimitratos
papers.abstract: The central building block of secure and privacy-preserving Vehicular Communication (VC) systems is a Vehicular Public-Key Infrastructure (VPKI), which provides vehicles with multiple anonymized credentials, termed pseudonyms. These pseudonyms are used to ensure message authenticity and integrity while preserving vehicle (thus passenger) privacy. In the light of emerging large-scale multi-domain VC environments, the efficiency of the VPKI and, more broadly, its scalability are paramount. By the same token, preventing misuse of the credentials, in particular, Sybil-based misbehavior, and managing "honest-but-curious" insiders are other facets of a challenging problem. In this paper, we leverage the state-of-the-art VPKI system and enhance its functionality towards a highly-available, dynamically-scalable, and resilient design; this ensures that the system remains operational in the presence of benign failures or resource depletion attacks, and that it dynamically scales out, or possibly scales in, according to request arrival rates. Our full-blown implementation on the Google Cloud Platform shows that deploying large-scale and efficient VPKI can be cost-effective.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全和隐私保护的车辆通信(VC)系统的核心构件是车辆公钥基础设施(VPKI)，其为车辆提供多个匿名化的凭证，称为假名。这些假名用于确保消息的真实性和完整性，同时保护车辆(从而保护乘客)的隐私。鉴于新兴的大规模多域VC环境，VPKI的效率，更广泛地说，它的可伸缩性是至关重要的。出于同样的原因，防止滥用凭证，特别是基于Sybil的不当行为，以及管理“诚实但好奇”的内部人员是一个挑战性问题的其他方面。在本文中，我们利用最先进的VPKI系统，并增强其功能，以实现高可用性、动态可伸缩性和弹性设计；这确保了系统在出现良性故障或资源耗尽攻击时仍可运行，并且它可以根据请求到达率动态地向外扩展或可能向内扩展。我们在谷歌云平台上的全面实施表明，部署大规模、高效的VPKI可以节省成本。
papers.title_zh: 大型移动系统的扩展假名认证

papers.title: Inside job: diagnosing bluetooth lower layers using off-the-shelf devices
papers.authors: Jiska Classen, Matthias Hollick
papers.abstract: Bluetooth is among the dominant standards for wireless short-range communication with multi-billion Bluetooth devices shipped each year. Basic Bluetooth analysis inside consumer hardware such as smartphones can be accomplished observing the Host Controller Interface (HCI) between the operating system's driver and the Bluetooth chip. However, the HCI does not provide insights to tasks running inside a Bluetooth chip or Link Layer (LL) packets exchanged over the air. As of today, consumer hardware internal behavior can only be observed with external, and often expensive tools, that need to be present during initial device pairing. In this paper, we leverage standard smartphones for on-device Bluetooth analysis and reverse engineer a diagnostic protocol that resides inside Broadcom chips. Diagnostic features include sniffing lower layers such as LL for Classic Bluetooth and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), transmission and reception statistics, test mode, and memory peek and poke.
papers.abstract_zh: 蓝牙是无线短距离通信的主要标准之一，每年有数十亿台蓝牙设备出货。通过观察操作系统驱动程序和蓝牙芯片之间的主机控制器接口(HCI ),可以完成智能手机等消费类硬件内部的基本蓝牙分析。然而，HCI不提供对蓝牙芯片内部运行的任务或通过空中交换的链路层(LL)分组的洞察。到目前为止，消费类硬件的内部行为只能通过外部工具来观察，这些工具通常非常昂贵，需要在初始设备配对期间提供。在本文中，我们利用标准智能手机进行设备上蓝牙分析，并对Broadcom芯片中的诊断协议进行逆向工程。诊断功能包括嗅探低层，如经典蓝牙和蓝牙低能耗(BLE)的L1、传输和接收统计、测试模式以及内存窥视和窥探。
papers.title_zh: 内部工作:使用现成的设备诊断蓝牙低层

papers.title: Deployment optimization of IoT devices through attack graph analysis
papers.authors: Noga Agmon, Asaf Shabtai, Rami Puzis
papers.abstract: The Internet of things (IoT) has become an integral part of our life at both work and home. However, these IoT devices are prone to vulnerability exploits due to their low cost, low resources, the diversity of vendors, and proprietary firmware. Moreover, short range communication protocols (e.g., Bluetooth or ZigBee) open additional opportunities for the lateral movement of an attacker within an organization. Thus, the type and location of IoT devices may significantly change the level of network security of the organizational network. In this paper, we quantify the level of network security based on an augmented attack graph analysis that accounts for the physical location of IoT devices and their communication capabilities. We use the depth-first branch and bound (DFBnB) heuristic search algorithm to solve two optimization problems: Full Deployment with Minimal Risk (FDMR) and Maximal Utility without Risk Deterioration (MURD). An admissible heuristic is proposed to accelerate the search. The proposed method is evaluated using a real network with simulated deployment of IoT devices. The results demonstrate (1) the contribution of the augmented attack graphs to quantifying the impact of IoT devices deployed within the organization on security, and (2) the effectiveness of the optimized IoT deployment.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)已经成为我们工作和家庭生活中不可或缺的一部分。然而，由于这些物联网设备的低成本、低资源、供应商的多样性和专有固件，它们很容易被利用。此外，短程通信协议(例如蓝牙或ZigBee)为攻击者在组织内的横向移动提供了额外的机会。因此，物联网设备的类型和位置可能会显著改变组织网络的网络安全级别。在本文中，我们基于扩展攻击图分析来量化网络安全级别，该分析说明了物联网设备的物理位置及其通信能力。我们使用深度优先分支定界(DFBnB)启发式搜索算法来解决两个优化问题:风险最小的完全部署(FDMR)和风险不恶化的最大效用(MURD)。提出了一种可行的启发式算法来加速搜索。使用具有物联网设备模拟部署的真实网络来评估所提出的方法。结果证明了(1)增强攻击图对量化组织内部署的物联网设备对安全性的影响的贡献，以及(2)优化的物联网部署的有效性。
papers.title_zh: 基于攻击图分析的物联网设备部署优化

papers.title: Factors influencing users to use unsecured wi-fi networks: evidence in the wild
papers.authors: Nissy Sombatruang, Lucky Onwuzurike, M. Angela Sasse, Michelle Baddeley
papers.abstract: Security experts often question why some users take actions that could expose them to security and privacy risks. Using unsecured Wi-Fi networks is one common example. Even though mobile data is now a more secure means to connect to the Internet, and is becoming faster and more affordable, many users continue to use unsecured Wi-Fi. To identify risk mitigating strategies, the research community first needs to understand the underlying factors driving users' decisions. Previous studies examined stated preferences --- what people said they have done or think they would do --- but that may not truly reflect real-life behavior. This study is the first to examine revealed preferences --- what people actually do in naturalistic settings. Specifically, we investigated how users' desire to save mobile data and battery power influenced their decisions at the time when they connected to open unsecured Wi-Fi in the wild. We also examined whether the decision to use unsecured Wi-Fi networks could be driven by demographic factors and the user's perception of the risk associated with using these networks. We recruited 71 participants in the UK to install My Wi-Fi Choices, our own Android app, on their mobile device, and run it for three months in the background. The app captured details of mobile data allowance and battery power on participants' devices whenever they used open unsecured Wi-Fi networks. We found that depleting mobile data significantly drove participants to use these networks, especially when their remaining allowance reached approximately 30%. Battery level, however, did not play a significant role. The perceived risks of unsecured Wi-Fi did not affect the decision-making either. Age, education, and income level were also correlated with increased use of unsecured Wi-Fi.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全专家经常质疑为什么一些用户会采取可能使他们面临安全和隐私风险的行动。使用不安全的Wi-Fi网络是一个常见的例子。尽管移动数据现在是一种更安全的连接互联网的方式，并且变得更快、更实惠，但许多用户仍继续使用不安全的Wi-Fi。为了确定风险缓解策略，研究界首先需要了解驱动用户决策的潜在因素。之前的研究调查了陈述的偏好——人们说他们已经做了什么或者认为他们会做什么——但这可能并不真正反映现实生活中的行为。这项研究第一次调查了人们在自然环境中的真实偏好。具体来说，我们调查了当用户在野外连接到不安全的Wi-Fi时，他们节省移动数据和电池电量的愿望如何影响他们的决策。我们还研究了使用不安全Wi-Fi网络的决定是否会受到人口因素和用户对使用这些网络相关风险的认知的影响。我们在英国招募了71名参与者，在他们的移动设备上安装我的Wi-Fi Choices，我们自己的Android应用程序，并在后台运行三个月。每当参与者使用开放的不安全Wi-Fi网络时，该应用程序都会捕捉到他们设备上的移动数据限额和电池电量的详细信息。我们发现，耗尽移动数据极大地推动了参与者使用这些网络，尤其是当他们的剩余配额达到大约30%时。然而，电池电量并没有起到重要作用。感知到的不安全Wi-Fi的风险也没有影响决策。年龄、教育和收入水平也与不安全Wi-Fi使用的增加相关。
papers.title_zh: 影响用户使用不安全wi-fi网络的因素:野外证据

papers.title: Hestia: simple least privilege network policies for smart homes
papers.authors: Sanket Goutam, William Enck, Bradley Reaves
papers.abstract: The long-awaited smart home revolution has arrived, and with it comes the challenge of managing dozens of potentially vulnerable network devices by average users. While research has developed techniques to fingerprint these devices, and even provide for sophisticated network access control models, such techniques are too complex for end users to manage, require sophisticated systems or unavailable public device descriptions, and proposed network policies have not been tested against real device behaviors. As a result, none of these solutions are available to users today. In this paper, we present Hestia, a mechanism to enforce simple-but-effective network isolation policies. Hestia segments the network into just two device categories: controllers (e.g., Smart Hubs) and non-controllers (e.g., motion sensors and smart lightbulbs). The key insight (validated with a large IoT dataset) is that noncontrollers only connect to cloud endpoints and controller devices, and practically never to each other over IP networks. This means that non-controllers can be isolated from each other without preventing functionality. Perhaps more importantly, smart home owners need only specify which devices are controllers. We develop a prototype and show negligible performance overhead resulting from the increased isolation. Hestia drastically improves smart home security without complex, unwieldy policies or lengthy learning of device behaviors.
papers.abstract_zh: 期待已久的智能家居革命已经到来，随之而来的是普通用户管理数十个潜在易受攻击的网络设备的挑战。虽然研究已经开发了对这些设备进行指纹识别的技术，甚至提供了复杂的网络访问控制模型，但是这些技术对于最终用户来说太复杂而难以管理，需要复杂的系统或不可用的公共设备描述，并且所提出的网络策略还没有针对真实的设备行为进行测试。结果，这些解决方案中没有一个可供今天的用户使用。在本文中，我们提出了赫斯缇雅，一种简单而有效的网络隔离策略的实施机制。赫斯缇雅将网络分为两类设备:控制器(如智能集线器)和非控制器(如运动传感器和智能灯泡)。关键见解(通过大型物联网数据集验证)是，非控制者仅连接到云端点和控制器设备，几乎从不通过IP网络相互连接。这意味着非控制器可以在不妨碍功能的情况下相互隔离。也许更重要的是，智能家居的所有者只需要指定哪些设备是控制器。我们开发了一个原型，并展示了增加隔离所带来的可以忽略的性能开销。赫斯缇雅大大提高了智能家居的安全性，而无需复杂、笨拙的政策或冗长的设备行为学习。
papers.title_zh: 赫斯缇雅:智能家居的简单最小特权网络策略

papers.title: New vulnerabilities in 4G and 5G cellular access network protocols: exposing device capabilities
papers.authors: Altaf Shaik, Ravishankar Borgaonkar, Shinjo Park, Jean-Pierre Seifert
papers.abstract: Cellular devices support various technical features and services for 2G, 3G, 4G and upcoming 5G networks. For example, these technical features contain physical layer throughput categories, radio protocol information, security algorithm, carrier aggregation bands and type of services such as GSM-R, Voice over LTE etc. In the cellular security standardisation context, these technical features and network services termed as device capabilities and exchanged with the network during the device registration phase. In this paper, we study device capabilities information specified for 4G and 5G devices and their role in establishing security association between the device and network. Our research results reveal that device capabilities are exchanged with the network before the authentication stage without any protection and not verified by the network. Consequently, we present three novel classes of attacks exploiting unprotected device capabilities information in 4G and upcoming 5G networks - identification attacks, bidding down attacks, and battery drain attacks against cellular devices. We implement proof-of-concept attacks using low-cost hardware and software setup to evaluate their impact against commercially available 4G devices and networks. We reported identified vulnerabilities to the relevant standardisation bodies and provide countermeasure to mitigate device capabilities attacks in 4G and upcoming 5G networks.
papers.abstract_zh: 蜂窝设备支持2G、3G、4G和即将到来的5G网络的各种技术功能和服务。例如，这些技术特征包含物理层吞吐量类别、无线电协议信息、安全算法、载波聚合频带和服务类型，例如GSM-R、LTE语音等。在蜂窝安全标准化背景下，这些技术特征和网络服务被称为设备能力，并在设备注册阶段与网络交换。在本文中，我们研究了为4G和5G设备指定的设备能力信息，以及它们在设备和网络之间建立安全关联中的作用。我们的研究结果显示，在认证阶段之前，设备能力与网络交换，没有任何保护，也没有被网络验证。因此，我们提出了三种利用4G和即将到来的5G网络中未受保护的设备能力信息的新型攻击类别——针对蜂窝设备的身份识别攻击、竞价排名攻击和电池耗尽攻击。我们使用低成本的硬件和软件设置来实施概念验证攻击，以评估它们对商用4G设备和网络的影响。我们向相关标准化机构报告了已识别的漏洞，并提供了对策来减轻4G和即将到来的5G网络中的设备能力攻击。
papers.title_zh: 4G和5G蜂窝接入网络协议中的新漏洞:暴露设备能力

papers.title: Quantum distance bounding
papers.authors: Aysajan Abidin
papers.abstract: Mutual distance bounding (DB) protocols enable two distrusting parties to establish an upper-bound on the distance between them. DB has been so far mainly considered in classical settings and for classical applications, especially in wireless settings, e.g., to prevent relay attacks in wireless authentication and access control systems, and for secure localization. While recent research has started exploring DB in quantum settings, all current quantum DB (QDB) protocols employ quantum-bits (qubits) in the rapid-bit exchange phase and only perform one-way DB. Specifically, the latest QDB proposals improve the initial ones by adding resistance to photon number splitting attacks, and improving round complexity by avoiding communication from the prover to the verifier in the last authentication phase. This paper presents two new QDB protocols that differ from previously proposed protocols in several aspects: (1) to the best of our knowledge, our protocols are the first to utilize entangled qubits in the rapid-bit exchange phase, previous protocols relied on sending individual qubits, not those from a pair of entangled ones; (2) our second protocol can perform mutual QDB between two parties in one execution, previous QDB protocols had to be executed twice with the prover and verifier roles reversed in each execution; (3) the use of entangled qubits in our protocols thwarts attacks that previous QDB protocols were prone to; (4) and finally, our protocols also eliminate the need for communication from the prover to the verifier in the last authentication phase, which was necessary in some previous QDB protocols. Our work paves the way for several interesting research directions which we briefly discuss in detail in the appendix.
papers.abstract_zh: 相互距离限制(DB)协议使两个不信任方能够建立它们之间距离的上限。到目前为止，DB主要被考虑用于传统设置和传统应用，尤其是在无线设置中，例如，用于防止无线认证和访问控制系统中的中继攻击，以及用于安全定位。虽然最近的研究已经开始探索量子设置中的DB，但是所有当前的量子DB (QDB)协议都在快速比特交换阶段使用量子比特(量子比特),并且仅执行单向DB。具体来说，最新的QDB方案通过增加对光子数分裂攻击的抵抗来改进最初的方案，并通过避免在最后认证阶段从证明者到验证者的通信来改进轮复杂度。本文提出了两个新的QDB协议，它们在几个方面不同于以前提出的协议:(1)据我们所知，我们的协议是第一个在快速比特交换阶段利用纠缠量子位的协议，以前的协议依赖于发送单个量子位，而不是一对纠缠量子位；(2)我们的第二个协议可以在一次执行中完成两方之间的相互QDB，而以前的QDB协议需要执行两次，每次执行时证明者和验证者的角色都要互换；(3)在我们的协议中使用纠缠量子位，可以阻止以前的QDB协议容易受到的攻击；(4)最后，我们的协议还消除了在最后认证阶段从证明者到验证者的通信的需要，这在以前的一些QDB协议中是必要的。我们的工作为几个有趣的研究方向铺平了道路，我们将在附录中详细讨论这些方向。
papers.title_zh: 量子距离限制

papers.title: SurFi: detecting surveillance camera looping attacks with wi-fi channel state information
papers.authors: Nitya Lakshmanan, Inkyu Bang, Min Suk Kang, Jun Han, Jong Taek Lee
papers.abstract: The proliferation of surveillance cameras has greatly improved the physical security of many security-critical properties including buildings, stores, and homes. However, recent surveillance camera looping attacks demonstrate new security threats --- adversaries can replay a seemingly benign video feed of a place of interest while trespassing or stealing valuables without getting caught. Unfortunately, such attacks are extremely difficult to detect in real-time due to cost and implementation constraints. In this paper, we propose SurFi to detect these attacks in real-time by utilizing commonly available Wi-Fi signals. In particular, we leverage that channel state information (CSI) from Wi-Fi signals also perceives human activities in the place of interest in addition to surveillance cameras. SurFi processes and correlates the live video feeds and the Wi-Fi CSI signals to detect any mismatches that would identify the presence of the surveillance camera looping attacks. SurFi does not require the deployment of additional infrastructure because Wi-Fi transceivers are easily found in the urban indoor environment. We design and implement the SurFi system and evaluate its effectiveness in detecting surveillance camera looping attacks. Our evaluation demonstrates that SurFi effectively identifies attacks with up to an attack detection accuracy of 98.8% and 0.1% false positive rate.
papers.abstract_zh: 监控摄像机的普及极大地提高了许多安全关键属性的物理安全性，包括建筑物、商店和家庭。然而，最近的监控摄像头循环攻击展示了新的安全威胁——对手可以在侵入或偷窃贵重物品时重放感兴趣的地方的看似良性的视频，而不会被抓住。不幸的是，由于成本和实施的限制，这种攻击极难实时检测。在本文中，我们提出SurFi来利用常见的Wi-Fi信号实时检测这些攻击。特别是，我们利用来自Wi-Fi信号的信道状态信息(CSI ),除了监控摄像头之外，还可以感知目标地点的人类活动。SurFi处理并关联实时视频馈送和Wi-Fi CSI信号，以检测任何不匹配，从而识别监控摄像头环路攻击的存在。SurFi不需要部署额外的基础设施，因为在城市室内环境中很容易找到Wi-Fi收发器。我们设计并实现了SurFi系统，并评估了它在检测监控摄像头循环攻击方面的有效性。我们的评估表明，SurFi可以有效地识别攻击，攻击检测准确率高达98.8%，误报率为0.1%。
papers.title_zh: SurFi:利用wi-fi信道状态信息检测监控摄像头环路攻击

papers.title: Distance bounding under different assumptions: opinion
papers.authors: David Gérault, Ioana Boureanu
papers.abstract: Distance-bounding protocols were introduced in 1993 as a countermeasure to relay attacks, in which an adversary fraudulently forwards the communication between a verifier and a distant prover. In the more than 40 different protocols that followed, assumptions were taken on the structure of distance-bounding protocols and their threat models. In this paper, we survey works disrupting these assumptions, and discuss the remaining challenges.
papers.abstract_zh: 距离限制协议是在1993年引入的，作为对中继攻击的对策，在中继攻击中，对手欺骗性地转发验证者和远程证明者之间的通信。在随后的40多个不同的协议中，对距离限制协议的结构及其威胁模型进行了假设。在本文中，我们调查破坏这些假设的工作，并讨论剩余的挑战。
papers.title_zh: 不同假设下的距离边界:观点

papers.title: Lost traffic encryption: fingerprinting LTE/4G traffic on layer two
papers.authors: Katharina Kohls, David Rupprecht, Thorsten Holz, Christina Pöpper
papers.abstract: Long Term Evolution (LTE) provides the communication infrastructure for both professional and private use cases and has become an integral part of our everyday life. Even though LTE/4G overcomes many security issues of previous standards, recent work demonstrates several attack vectors on the physical and network layers of the LTE stack. We do, however, have only limited insights into the security and privacy aspects of the second layer. In this work, we investigate the impact of fingerprinting attacks on encrypted LTE/4G layer-two traffic. Traffic fingerprinting enables an adversary to exploit the metadata side-channel of transmissions---with severe consequences for the user's privacy. In multiple lab and commercial network experiments, we demonstrate the feasibility of passive and active fingerprinting attacks. First, passive website fingerprinting allows the attacker to learn a user's accessed website from encrypted transmissions. While being a well-known attack in other contexts, we provide an extensive performance baseline of state-of-the-art website fingerprinting attacks of encrypted LTE traffic in a lab setup and successfully repeat the experiments in a commercial network. Second, in an active identity-mapping attack, we inject watermarks and localize users within a radio cell. Our attacks succeed for the current LTE/4G specification and exploit features that also persist in the upcoming 5G standard.
papers.abstract_zh: 长期演进(LTE)为专业和私人应用提供了通信基础设施，已经成为我们日常生活中不可或缺的一部分。尽管LTE/4G克服了以前标准的许多安全问题，但最近的工作展示了LTE堆栈的物理层和网络层上的几种攻击媒介。然而，我们对第二层的安全和隐私方面的了解有限。在这项工作中，我们研究了指纹攻击对加密LTE/4G第二层流量的影响。流量指纹使对手能够利用传输的元数据侧信道——对用户的隐私造成严重后果。在多个实验室和商业网络实验中，我们证明了被动和主动指纹攻击的可行性。首先，被动网站指纹允许攻击者从加密传输中了解用户访问的网站。虽然在其他环境中这是一种众所周知的攻击，但我们在实验室设置中提供了加密LTE流量的最新网站指纹攻击的广泛性能基准，并在商业网络中成功重复了这些实验。第二，在主动身份映射攻击中，我们在无线电小区内注入水印并定位用户。我们的攻击针对当前的LTE/4G规范取得了成功，并利用了即将到来的5G标准中也存在的功能。
papers.title_zh: 丢失流量加密:在第二层对LTE/4G流量进行指纹识别

papers.title: LTE security disabled: misconfiguration in commercial networks
papers.authors: Merlin Chlosta, David Rupprecht, Thorsten Holz, Christina Pöpper
papers.abstract: Long Term Evolution (LTE) is the de-facto standard for mobile communication. It provides effective security features but leaves room for misunderstandings in its configuration and implementation. In particular, providers face difficulties when maintaining network configurations. In this paper, we analyze the security configuration of commercial LTE networks. We enhance the open baseband srsLTE with support for commercial networks and perform a subsequent analysis. In more detail, we test the security algorithm selection in a total of twelve LTE networks in five European countries. We expose four misconfigured networks and multiple cases of implementation issues. Three insecure networks fail to enforce integrity protection and encryption, which enables an adversary to impersonate victims towards the network. We provide a proof-of-concept attack in a live network, where the adversary obtains an IP address at the victim's cost. Our work is an appeal to security as a holistic state, which requires not only secure specifications but also secure configurations.
papers.abstract_zh: 长期演进(LTE)是移动通信事实上的标准。它提供了有效的安全特性，但也为其配置和实现中的误解留下了空间。特别是，提供商在维护网络配置时面临困难。本文分析了商用LTE网络的安全配置。我们利用对商用网络的支持来增强开放基带srsLTE，并执行后续分析。更详细地说，我们在五个欧洲国家的总共十二个LTE网络中测试了安全算法选择。我们揭露了四个错误配置的网络和多个实施问题的案例。三个不安全的网络无法实施完整性保护和加密，这使得对手能够向网络冒充受害者。我们提供了一个在真实网络中的概念验证攻击，其中对手以受害者为代价获得一个IP地址。我们的工作是呼吁将安全性作为一个整体状态，这不仅需要安全的规范，还需要安全的配置。
papers.title_zh: LTE安全禁用:商业网络中的错误配置

papers.title: Thermal covert channel in bluetooth low energy networks
papers.authors: Timothy Claeys, Franck Rousseau, Boris Simunovic, Bernard Tourancheau
papers.abstract: This paper investigates thermal covert channels in the context of the Internet-of-Things. More, precisely we demonstrate such a channel on BLE-enabled devices. We explain how the core design principles of BLE link-layer protocol, combined with well-timed intensive CPU calculations can be leveraged to mount a thermal covert channel between two devices. We implement the attack on three different hardware architectures, a Raspberry Pi 3B, a Motorola X 2014 and an iPhone 5s, and analyze the performance of the channel. We show that we have a similar throughput as previous comparable work, but we greatly improve the range of the channel.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文研究物联网背景下的热隐蔽通道。更准确地说，我们在支持BLE的设备上演示了这样一个通道。我们解释了如何利用BLE链路层协议的核心设计原则，结合适时的密集CPU计算，在两个设备之间建立热量隐蔽通道。我们在树莓派3B、摩托罗拉X 2014和iPhone 5s三种不同的硬件架构上实现了攻击，并分析了信道的性能。我们表明，我们有一个类似的吞吐量作为以前的可比工作，但我们大大提高了信道的范围。
papers.title_zh: 蓝牙低能耗网络中的热隐蔽信道

papers.title: Secrets in the sky: on privacy and infrastructure security in DVB-S satellite broadband
papers.authors: James Pavur, Daniel Moser, Vincent Lenders, Ivan Martinovic
papers.abstract: Demands for ubiquitous global connectivity have sparked a satellite broadband renaissance. Secure satellite broadband is vital to ensuring that this growth does not beget unanticipated harm. Motivated by this need, this paper presents an experimental security analysis of satellite broadband signals using the Digital Video Broadcasting for Satellite (DVB-S) protocol. This analysis comprises 14 geostationary platforms encompassing over 100 million square kilometers of combined coverage area. Using less than €300 of widely available equipment, we demonstrate the ability to identify individual satellite customers, often down to full name and address, and their web browsing activities. Moreover, we find that these vulnerabilities may enable damaging attacks against critical infrastructure, including power plants and SCADA systems. The paper concludes with a discussion of possible confidentiality protections in satellite broadband environments and notes a need for further cryptographic research on link-layer encryption for DVB-S broadband.
papers.abstract_zh: 对无处不在的全球连接的需求引发了卫星宽带复兴。安全的卫星宽带对于确保这种增长不会带来意想不到的伤害至关重要。基于这种需求，本文提出了一种利用卫星数字视频广播(DVB-S)协议对卫星宽带信号进行安全性分析的实验方案。该分析包括14个地球静止平台，涵盖超过1亿平方公里的综合覆盖区域。使用不到€300广泛可用的设备，我们证明了识别个人卫星客户的能力，往往下至全名和地址，以及他们的网络浏览活动。此外，我们发现这些漏洞可能导致对关键基础设施的破坏性攻击，包括发电厂和SCADA系统。本文最后讨论了卫星宽带环境中可能的保密性保护，并指出需要对DVB-S宽带的链路层加密进行进一步的加密研究。
papers.title_zh: 天空中的秘密:DVB-S卫星宽带中的隐私和基础设施安全

papers.title: Post-quantum cryptography and 5G security: tutorial
papers.authors: T. Charles Clancy, Robert W. McGwier, Lidong Chen
papers.abstract: The Fifth Generation (5G) mobile broadband standards make a fundamental shift in cryptography. Prior generations based their security and privacy principally on symmetric key cryptography. The Subscriber Identity Module (SIM) and its successors contain a shared key used to authenticate the User Equipment (UE) to the network, and vice versa. However 5G is shifting its core network over to a microservices, cloud-first architecture and is heavily leveraging protocols like TLS and OAuth2.0 to authenticate and authorize transactions. As a result, it is shifting to a PKI-based trust model. This shift is happening just as quantum computing threatens to unravel the security of traditional ciphers such as RSA and ECC. In this paper we highlight the need to advance the 3GPP 5G standards and NIST post-quantum cryptography standards in tandem, with the goal of launching a "quantum ready" 5G core network.
papers.abstract_zh: 第五代(5G)移动宽带标准使加密技术发生了根本性的转变。前代产品的安全性和保密性主要基于对称密钥加密技术。用户身份模块(SIM)及其后继模块包含用于向网络认证用户设备(UE)的共享密钥，反之亦然。然而，5G正在将其核心网络转移到微服务、云优先的架构，并大量利用TLS和OAuth2.0等协议来认证和授权交易。因此，它正在转向基于PKI的信任模型。这一转变的发生正值量子计算威胁到RSA和ECC等传统密码的安全性。在本文中，我们强调了协同推进3GPP 5G标准和NIST后量子密码标准的必要性，目标是推出“量子就绪”5G核心网络。
papers.title_zh: 后量子密码术和5G安全:教程

papers.title: A cost-effective anomaly detection system using in-DRAM working set of active flows table: poster
papers.authors: Rhongho Jang, Seongkwang Moon, Youngtae Noh, Aziz Mohaisen, DaeHun Nyang
papers.abstract: In the zettabyte era, per-flow measurement becomes more challenging owing to the growth of both traffic volumes and the number of flows. Also, swiftness of detection of anomalies becomes paramount. For fast and accurate anomaly detection, managing an accurate working set of active flows (WSAF) from massive volumes of packet influxes at line rates is a key challenge. WSAF is usually located in a very fast but expensive memory, such as TCAM or SRAM, and thus the number of entries to be stored is quite limited. To cope with the scalability issue of WSAF, we propose to use In-DRAM WSAF with scales, and put a compact data structure called FlowRegulator in front of WSAF to compensate for DRAM's slow access time by substantially reducing massive influxes to WSAF without compromising measurement accuracy. We evaluated our system in a large scale real-world experiment. As one key application, FlowRegulator detected heavy hitters with 99.8% accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 在zettabyte时代，由于交通流量和流量数量的增长，每个流量的测量变得更具挑战性。此外，异常检测的快速性变得至关重要。对于快速准确的异常检测，从以线路速率涌入的大量数据包中管理一组准确的工作活跃流(WSAF)是一项关键挑战。WSAF通常位于非常快速但昂贵的存储器中，例如TCAM或SRAM，因此要存储的条目数量非常有限。为了解决WSAF的可扩展性问题，我们建议使用带刻度的DRAM内WSAF，并在WSAF前放置一个名为FlowRegulator的紧凑数据结构，通过在不影响测量精度的情况下大幅减少大量流入WSAF的流量来补偿DRAM的缓慢访问时间。我们在大规模真实世界实验中评估了我们的系统。作为一个关键应用，FlowRegulator以99.8%的准确度检测重锤。
papers.title_zh: 使用动态随机存取存储器工作集的经济高效的异常检测系统

papers.title: Analyzing endpoints in the internet of things malware: poster
papers.authors: Jinchun Choi, Afsah Anwar, Hisham Alasmary, Jeffrey Spaulding, DaeHun Nyang, Aziz Mohaisen
papers.abstract: The lack of security measures in the Internet of Things (IoT) devices and their persistent online connectivity give adversaries an opportunity to target them or abuse them as intermediary targets for volumetric attacks such as Distributed Denial-of-Service (DDoS) campaigns. In this paper, we analyze IoT malware with a focus on endpoints to understand the affinity between the dropzones and their target IP addresses, and to understand the different patterns among them. Towards this goal, we reverse-engineer 2,423 IoT malware samples to obtain IP addresses. We further augment additional information about the endpoints from Internet-wide scanners, including Shodan and Censys. We then perform a deep data-driven analysis of the dropzones and their target IP addresses and further examine the attack surface of the target device space.
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)设备中缺乏安全措施以及它们持续的在线连接性给了对手一个机会来瞄准它们或滥用它们作为分布式拒绝服务(DDoS)活动等体积攻击的中间目标。在本文中，我们分析物联网恶意软件，重点关注端点，以了解拖放区与其目标IP地址之间的关联性，并了解它们之间的不同模式。为了实现这一目标，我们对2，423个物联网恶意软件样本进行了反向工程，以获取IP地址。我们从互联网范围的扫描器，包括Shodan和Censys，进一步扩充关于端点的附加信息。然后，我们对拖放区及其目标IP地址执行深入的数据驱动分析，并进一步检查目标设备空间的攻击面。
papers.title_zh: 分析物联网中的端点恶意软件:海报

papers.title: Breaking graph-based IoT malware detection systems using adversarial examples: poster
papers.authors: Ahmed Abusnaina, Aminollah Khormali, Hisham Alasmary, Jeman Park, Afsah Anwar, Ulku Meteriz, Aziz Mohaisen
papers.abstract: The main goal of this study is to investigate the robustness of graph-based Deep Learning (DL) models used for Internet of Things (IoT) malware classification against Adversarial Learning (AL). We designed two approaches to craft adversarial IoT software, including Off-the-Shelf Adversarial Attack (OSAA) methods, using six different AL attack approaches, and Graph Embedding and Augmentation (GEA). The GEA approach aims to preserve the functionality and practicality of the generated adversarial sample through a careful embedding of a benign sample to a malicious one. Our evaluations demonstrate that OSAAs are able to achieve a misclassification rate (MR) of 100%. Moreover, we observed that the GEA approach is able to misclassify all IoT malware samples as benign.
papers.abstract_zh: 该研究的主要目标是调查用于物联网恶意软件分类的基于图的深度学习(DL)模型对对抗学习(al)的鲁棒性。我们设计了两种方法来制作对抗性物联网软件，包括现成的对抗性攻击(OSAA)方法，使用六种不同的攻击方法，以及图形嵌入和增强(GEA)。GEA方法旨在通过将良性样本小心地嵌入到恶意样本中来保持所生成的敌对样本的功能性和实用性。我们的评估表明OSAAs能够达到100%的错误分类率(MR)。此外，我们观察到GEA方法能够将所有物联网恶意软件样本错误分类为良性。
papers.title_zh: 使用对抗示例破解基于图的物联网恶意软件检测系统:海报

papers.title: Himiko: A human interface for monitoring and inferring knowledge on bluetooth-low-energy objects: demo
papers.authors: Guillaume Celosia, Mathieu Cunche
papers.abstract: The Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) protocol is being included in a growing number of connected objects such as smartphones, fitness trackers, headphones and smartwatches. As part of the service discovery mechanism of BLE, devices announce themselves by broadcasting radio signals called advertisement packets that can be collected with off-the-shelf hardware and software. To avoid the risk of tracking based on those messages, BLE features an address randomization mechanism that substitutes the device MAC address with random temporary pseudonyms. However, the payload of the advertisement packet still contains fields that can hamper the randomization mechanism by exposing counters and static identifiers. In addition to defeating the randomization mechanism, some of these fields can leak sensitive attributes of the owner such as his medical condition. As a consequence, we implemented Himiko to raise awareness about the privacy issues that the BLE advertising mechanism can involve. This tool aims to show the information that a passive eavesdropper can infer by leveraging the contents of BLE advertisement packets. The advertising raw data are collected and processed from devices that have their Bluetooth interface enabled. The user is then shown the information that are leaking from his device.
papers.abstract_zh: 蓝牙低能耗(BLE)协议正被越来越多的联网设备所采用，如智能手机、健身追踪器、耳机和智能手表。作为BLE服务发现机制的一部分，设备通过广播称为广告包的无线电信号来宣布自己，这些信号可以用现成的硬件和软件来收集。为了避免根据这些消息进行跟踪的风险，BLE提供了一种地址随机化机制，用随机的临时假名替换设备MAC地址。但是，广告数据包的有效负载仍然包含一些字段，这些字段会因暴露计数器和静态标识符而妨碍随机化机制。除了破坏随机化机制之外，这些字段中的一些还会泄露所有者的敏感属性，例如他的医疗状况。因此，我们实施了卑弥呼，以提高对BLE广告机制可能涉及的隐私问题的认识。该工具旨在显示被动窃听者通过利用BLE广告数据包的内容可以推断出的信息。从启用了蓝牙接口的设备收集和处理广告原始数据。然后向用户显示从他的设备中泄露的信息。
papers.title_zh: 卑弥呼:监控和推断蓝牙低能量物体知识的人机界面:演示

papers.title: Wireless attacks on aircraft landing systems: demo
papers.authors: Harshad Sathaye, Domien Schepers, Aanjhan Ranganathan, Guevara Noubir
papers.abstract: Modern aircraft heavily rely on several wireless technologies for communications, control, and navigation. In this work, we demonstrate the vulnerability of aircraft instrument landing systems to wireless attacks. We show that it is possible to fully and in finegrain control the course deviation indicator, as displayed by the ILS receiver, in real-time, and demonstrate it on aviation-grade ILS receivers. We develop a tightly-controlled closed-loop ILS spoofer that autonomously adjusts the adversary's transmitted signals based on the aircraft's GPS location to cause an undetected off-runway landing. We demonstrate the integrated attack on an FAA certified flight-simulator (X-Plane)'s AI-based auto-land feature and show success rate with offset touchdowns of 18 meters to over 50 meters.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代飞机在通信、控制和导航方面严重依赖几种无线技术。在这项工作中，我们展示了飞机仪表着陆系统对无线攻击的脆弱性。我们证明了实时完全精细地控制ILS接收机显示的航向偏差指示器是可能的，并在航空级ILS接收机上进行了演示。我们开发了一种严格控制的闭环ILS欺骗器，它可以根据飞机的GPS位置自动调整对手发射的信号，从而导致不被发现的跑道外着陆。我们在FAA认证的飞行模拟器(X-Plane)的基于人工智能的自动着陆功能上演示了集成攻击，并展示了18米到50米以上的偏移触地成功率。
papers.title_zh: 飞机着陆系统的无线攻击:演示

papers.title: A deep learning method for fraud detection in financial systems: poster
papers.authors: Mahmut Ögrek, Eyüp Ögrek, Serif Bahtiyar
papers.abstract: Credit card fraud has been a significant challenge ever since forgers have been inventing new ways to steal money. Thus, adaptive fraud detection methods are required to counter the forgers. Deep learning methods have been attractive candidates because of their adaptive nature to detect emerging credit card frauds. In this paper, we propose a deep learning method to adaptively detect credit card frauds by using neural networks. We experimentally evaluated our model with Kaggle dataset. The analyses results show that our methods adaptively detect credit card frauds.
papers.abstract_zh: 自从伪造者发明新的偷钱方法以来，信用卡欺诈一直是一个重大挑战。因此，需要自适应欺诈检测方法来对抗伪造者。深度学习方法一直是有吸引力的候选方法，因为它们具有检测新兴信用卡欺诈的适应性。在本文中，我们提出了一种利用神经网络自适应检测信用卡欺诈的深度学习方法。我们用Kaggle数据集对我们的模型进行了实验评估。分析结果表明，我们的方法自适应检测信用卡欺诈。
papers.title_zh: 用于金融系统中欺诈检测的深度学习方法:海报

papers.title: RF based entropy sources for jamming resilience: poster
papers.authors: Jay Prakash, Chenxi Liu, Tony Q. S. Quek, Jemin Lee
papers.abstract: Wireless jamming is a critical challenge for sprawling and ubiquitous devices, which are connected using radio-frequency (RF) waves. Traditionally direct-sequence spread spectrum (DSSS) and its derivatives have been recognized as an effective jamming resilient technique. However, the effectiveness of DSSS relies on the use of either pre-shared secret code or a large bank of public codes, the generation, distribution, and management of which would be particularly difficult in future large-scale decentralized wireless networks. To tackle this problem, we present a framework which exploits the shared randomness inherent in wireless channels to generate and refresh secret seeds at each communicating node. We highlight why channel randomness cannot be used as it is and develop processing algorithms which ensure that RF based sources are suitable for entropy pooling and random seed generation.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于使用射频(RF)波连接的庞大且无处不在的设备来说，无线干扰是一个关键挑战。传统上，直接序列扩频(DSSS)及其衍生物被认为是一种有效的抗干扰技术。然而，DSSS的有效性依赖于预共享秘密代码或大量公共代码的使用，这些代码的生成、分发和管理在未来的大规模分散式无线网络中尤其困难。为了解决这个问题，我们提出了一个框架，利用无线信道固有的共享随机性在每个通信节点产生和更新秘密种子。我们强调为什么不能按原样使用信道随机性，并开发处理算法来确保基于RF的源适用于熵池和随机种子生成。
papers.title_zh: 干扰弹性的基于射频的熵源:海报

papers.title: Ensemble malware analysis for evaluating the integrity of mission critical devices poster: poster
papers.authors: Robert Heras, Alexander Perez-Pons
papers.abstract: The rapid evolution of technology in our sociality has brought great advantages, but at the same time it has increased the cybersecurity threats associated with a constantly expanded surface exposure. At the forefront of these threats is the proliferation of malware from traditional computing platforms to the rapidly expanding Internet-of-things. Our premise is that malware needs to be detected as soon as possible to prevent extensive consequence linked to the fulfillment of its malicious activity. Our proposed framework analyzes task structure features as well as the system calls and memory access patterns made by a process to determine its validity and integrity. The proposed scheme would use all three approaches applying an ensemble technique to detect malware.
papers.abstract_zh: 在我们的社会中，技术的快速发展带来了巨大的优势，但同时也增加了与不断扩大的表面暴露相关的网络安全威胁。处于这些威胁最前沿的是恶意软件从传统计算平台向快速扩张的物联网的扩散。我们的前提是，需要尽快检测到恶意软件，以防止与其恶意活动的实现相关的广泛后果。我们提出的框架分析了任务结构特征以及系统调用和内存访问模式，以确定其有效性和完整性。提议的方案将使用所有三种方法，应用集成技术来检测恶意软件。
papers.title_zh: 用于评估关键任务设备完整性的集成恶意软件分析海报:海报

papers.title: Biometric data transformation for cryptographic domains and its application: poster
papers.authors: Shoukat Ali, Koray Karabina, Emrah Karagoz
papers.abstract: A large class of biometric template protection algorithms assume that feature vectors are integer valued. However, biometric data is generally represented through real-valued feature vectors. Therefore, secure template constructions are not immediately applicable when feature vectors are composed of real numbers. We propose a generic transformation and extend the domain of biometric template protection algorithms from integer-valued feature vectors to real valued feature vectors. We show that our transformation is accuracy-preserving and verify our theoretical findings by reporting the implementation results using a public keystroke dynamics dataset.
papers.abstract_zh: 一大类生物模板保护算法假设特征向量是整数值。然而，生物特征数据通常通过实值特征向量来表示。因此，当特征向量由实数组成时，安全模板构造不能立即适用。我们提出了一种通用变换，并将生物模板保护算法的领域从整数值特征向量扩展到实数值特征向量。我们证明了我们的转换是保持准确性的，并通过使用公共击键动力学数据集报告实现结果来验证我们的理论发现。
papers.title_zh: 加密域的生物特征数据转换及其应用:海报

papers.title: Cardiac biometrics for continuous and non-contact mobile authentication: poster
papers.authors: Chen Song, Zhengxiong Li, Wenyao Xu
papers.abstract: Continuous authentication is superior to conventional one-pass authentication by maintaining the security level of a system throughout the entire login session. Leveraging the unique geometric and non-volitional credentials in the cardiac motion, we present a trustworthy, continuous, and non-contact user authentication system. Based on a pilot study with 78 subjects, we evaluate Cardiac Scan in terms of accuracy, authentication time, permanence, and vulnerability. The results show that Cardiac Scan is a robust and usable continuous authentication system.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过在整个登录会话期间保持系统的安全级别，连续身份验证优于传统的一次通过身份验证。利用心脏运动中独特的几何和非意志凭证，我们提出了一种可信的、连续的和非接触的用户认证系统。基于对78名受试者的初步研究，我们评估了心脏扫描的准确性、验证时间、持久性和脆弱性。结果表明，心脏扫描是一个稳健和可用的连续认证系统。
papers.title_zh: 用于连续和非接触式移动认证的心脏生物识别:海报

papers.title: Are you secure in your car?: poster
papers.authors: Giampaolo Bella, Pietro Biondi, Gianpiero Costantino, Ilaria Matteucci
papers.abstract: Modern vehicles abound with Electronic Control Units (ECUs) that need to speak with each other. They adopt a binary language and form an in-vehicle network that must be precisely regulated. This was the aim for the inception of "Controller Area Network" protocol, also known as CAN bus [1] and is widespread today. It is standardised in ISO 11898-1:2015 [4] as a simple protocol based on two bus lines. However, it is not meant to be secure. TOUCAN is our new communication protocol designed to be secure while at the same time both CAN and AUTOSAR compliant. It achieves security in terms of authenticity, integrity and confidentiality, yet without the need to upgrade existing ECUs or add components to the network.
papers.abstract_zh: 现代汽车上到处都是需要相互通信的电子控制单元(ECU)。它们采用二进制语言，形成一个必须精确调控的车载网络。这是“控制器局域网”协议(也称为CAN总线[1])诞生的目的，如今已广为流传。它在ISO 11898-1:2015被标准化为基于两条总线的简单协议。然而，这并不意味着它是安全的。TOUCAN是我们新的通信协议，旨在确保安全，同时兼容CAN和AUTOSAR。它实现了真实性、完整性和保密性方面的安全性，而无需升级现有ECU或向网络添加组件。
papers.title_zh: 你在车里安全吗？:海报

papers.title: Secure THz communication with multiplexed orbital angular momentum beams: poster
papers.authors: Shubhendu Bhardwaj
papers.abstract: In this poster, we will present methods for generation of Bessel-Gaussian beams with higher order orbital angular momentum (OAM) for secure point to point links at terahertz frequencies. We investigate the methods for generating the spiral and radially phased excitations and their relation to the far-field beams generated using the method. The work describes the typical aperture sizes, methods of beam control and beam width related features that can be achieved.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们将介绍产生具有高阶轨道角动量(OAM)的贝塞尔-高斯光束的方法，用于太赫兹频率的安全点对点链路。我们研究了产生螺旋和径向相位激励的方法以及它们与用这种方法产生的远场光束的关系。该工作描述了典型的孔径尺寸、光束控制方法以及可以实现的光束宽度相关特征。
papers.title_zh: 利用多路轨道角动量光束进行安全的太赫兹通信:海报

papers.title: Enclave-based privacy-preserving localization: poster
papers.authors: Joseph I. Choi, Dave (Jing) Tian, Tyler Ward, Kevin R. B. Butler, Patrick Traynor, John M. Shea, Tan F. Wong
papers.abstract: In cooperative spectrum sensing, multiple sensors work together to perform tasks such as localizing a target transmitter. However, the exchange of spectrum measurements leads to exposure of the physical location of participating sensors. Furthermore, in some cases, the sensitive characteristics of all participants can be revealed through the compromise of any one sensor. Accordingly, without guarantees about how data will be handled, there is little reason for such devices to work together. In this work, we protect the location of sensors cooperating in spectrum sensing by processing measurements within attestable containers, or enclaves. We use the enclave as a building block for new privacy-preserving particle filter protocols. We instantiate this enclave using Intel Software Guard Extensions (SGX) and investigate how the inclusion of enclaves impacts sensor privacy, carefully enumerating the different threats present in centralized and decentralized architectures. We show that enclave-based particle filter protocols incur minimal overhead (adding 16 milliseconds of processing to the measurement processing function versus unprotected computation), whereas cryptographically-based approaches suffer from multiple orders of magnitude greater costs. Our work demonstrates that enclaves can be effectively deployed in a decentralized architecture while dramatically improving current data handling techniques.
papers.abstract_zh: 在协作频谱感知中，多个传感器协同工作来执行任务，例如定位目标发射机。然而，光谱测量的交换导致参与传感器的物理位置的暴露。此外，在某些情况下，所有参与者的敏感特征都可以通过任何一个传感器的妥协而暴露出来。因此，如果不能保证如何处理数据，这些设备就没有理由协同工作。在这项工作中，我们通过在可证明的容器或飞地内处理测量来保护在频谱感知中合作的传感器的位置。我们使用enclave作为新的隐私保护粒子过滤器协议的构建模块。我们使用英特尔软件防护扩展(SGX)来实例化这个飞地，并调查飞地的包含如何影响传感器隐私，仔细列举集中式和分散式架构中存在的不同威胁。我们表明，基于enclave的粒子滤波协议产生的开销最小(与无保护的计算相比，测量处理功能增加了16毫秒的处理时间)，而基于密码的方法的成本要高几个数量级。我们的工作表明，enclaves可以有效地部署在一个分散的架构中，同时极大地改善了当前的数据处理技术。
papers.title_zh: 基于Enclave的隐私保护本地化:海报

papers.title: Deep learning approach to detect malicious attacks at system level: poster
papers.authors: Jayesh Soni, Nagarajan Prabakar, Himanshu Upadhyay
papers.abstract: Host based intrusion detection systems monitor operations for significant deviations from normal and healthy behavior. Anomalies are patterns in data that do not conform to the expected normal behavior. System call analysis has been conclusively established as the best method to reveal details about the program behavior. Therefore, attackers create new exploits that makes major impact at the system call level. In this research, we developed an enhanced and optimized deep learning LSTM (Long Short Term Memory) network, for anomaly detection, trained on sequences of system calls. Our model detects any anomalous behavior in the system calls with 80% accuracy.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于主机的入侵检测系统监控操作是否明显偏离正常和健康的行为。异常是数据中不符合预期正常行为的模式。系统调用分析已经被确定为揭示程序行为细节的最佳方法。因此，攻击者会创建新的漏洞，在系统调用级别产生重大影响。在这项研究中，我们开发了一个增强和优化的深度学习LSTM(长短期记忆)网络，用于异常检测，在系统调用序列上进行训练。我们的模型以80%的准确率检测系统调用中的任何异常行为。
papers.title_zh: 深度学习方法检测系统级恶意攻击:海报

papers.title: Privacy preserving distributed matching for device-to-device IoT communications: poster
papers.authors: Eyuphan Bulut, Ismail Güvenç, Kemal Akkaya
papers.abstract: Device-to-device (D2D) communication enables machine-type devices (MTD) in Internet-of-Things (IoT) network communicate directly with each other and offload the cellular network. However, it may introduce interference as they share the same spectrum with the other devices that are directly connected to the base station. In this study, we look at the problem of assigning D2D communicating IoT pairs to the IoT devices that are directly connected to the base station such that the overall system throughput is not only maximized but also a stable matching is obtained. Different than previous work, we study many-to-one matching and propose a distributed privacy preserving stable matching process for efficient resource allocation without releasing location information.
papers.abstract_zh: 设备到设备(D2D)通信使物联网(IoT)网络中的机器类型设备(MTD)能够直接相互通信，并卸载蜂窝网络。但是，这可能会引入干扰，因为它们与直接连接到基站的其他设备共享相同的频谱。在这项研究中，我们研究了将D2D通信物联网对分配给直接连接到基站的物联网设备的问题，这样不仅可以最大化整个系统的吞吐量，还可以获得稳定的匹配。与以往的工作不同，我们研究了多对一匹配，并提出了一个分布式隐私保护稳定匹配过程，在不释放位置信息的情况下有效地分配资源。
papers.title_zh: 面向设备到设备物联网通信的隐私保护分布式匹配:海报

papers.title: Basebads: Automated security analysis of baseband firmware: poster
papers.authors: Grant Hernandez, Kevin R. B. Butler
papers.abstract: Mobile devices are more connected than ever before through the use of multiple wireless protocols, including the 2G, 3G, and 4G cellular standards. To manage and interact with cellular networks, phones use dedicated and highly proprietary baseband processors running custom, closed-source firmware. Despite the increasing complexity of modern cellular standards, there is no reference implementation, leading individual baseband manufacturers to create their own in-house versions. The proprietary nature of baseband firmware combined with the complexity of standards has created a barrier for researchers to comprehensively audit the security of these implementations. To address this, we present SpikerXG, an extensible, baseband testing platform that employs firmware instrumentation to intelligently target protocol messages.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过使用多种无线协议，包括2G、3G和4G蜂窝标准，移动设备的连接比以往任何时候都更加紧密。为了管理蜂窝网络并与之交互，手机使用专用且高度专有的基带处理器，运行定制的闭源固件。尽管现代蜂窝标准越来越复杂，但没有参考实施方案，导致各基带制造商自行开发自己的版本。基带固件的专有性质与标准的复杂性相结合，为研究人员全面审核这些实施的安全性设置了障碍。为了解决这一问题，我们推出了SpikerXG，这是一个可扩展的基带测试平台，采用固件工具来智能定位协议消息。
papers.title_zh: Basebads:基带固件的自动安全性分析:海报

papers.title: Deep-evasion: Turn deep neural network into evasive self-contained cyber-physical malware: poster
papers.authors: Tao Liu, Wujie Wen
papers.abstract: Deep Neural Network (DNN) based intelligent Cyber-Physical Systems (CPS) are becoming more and more popular across all aspects of our lives. Unfortunately, such a promising trend implies a dangerous feature that allows code to be mixed with data in DNN models and triggered by a targeted physical object without harming the DNN inference accuracy. In this work, we investigate such an emerging attack, namely "Deep-Evasion", turning DNN into evasive self-contained malware on CPS. We prototype "Deep-Evasion" on Nvidia Jetson TX2 embedded device and demonstrate a Denial-of-Service (DoS) attack as our proof of concept. Experimental results show "Deep-Evasion" is feasible, reliable and scalable on CPS.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于深度神经网络(DNN)的智能信息物理系统(CPS)在我们生活的各个方面变得越来越流行。不幸的是，这种充满希望的趋势意味着一个危险的特征，即允许代码与DNN模型中的数据混合，并由目标物理对象触发，而不会损害DNN推理的准确性。在这项工作中，我们研究了这样一种新兴的攻击，即“深度规避”，将DNN变成CPS上的规避自包含恶意软件。我们在Nvidia Jetson TX2嵌入式设备上构建了“深度规避”原型，并演示了拒绝服务(DoS)攻击作为我们的概念证明。实验结果表明“深度规避”在CPS上是可行的、可靠的和可扩展的。
papers.title_zh: 深度规避:将深度神经网络变成规避的独立网络物理恶意软件:海报

papers.title: Security, privacy, and ethical concerns on human radio-frequency identification (RFID) implants: poster
papers.authors: Zhanel Tucker, Chutima Boonthum-Denecke
papers.abstract: This report discusses the security, privacy, and ethical concerns on human RFID-implants. Emerging technologies are being developed to help with convenience for everyday people, but these conveniences can pose security and privacy threats. The uses of technology being implanted in humans without the proper assessment could cause a new wave of security flaws. This study will review how human RFID microchip implants will impact and effect security, privacy, and ethical concerns associated with the new initiative for RFID implants to be used on human beings in everyday activities.
papers.abstract_zh: 这份报告讨论了人体RFID植入物的安全、隐私和伦理问题。正在开发的新兴技术有助于为日常生活提供便利，但这些便利可能会带来安全和隐私威胁。未经适当评估就将技术植入人体可能会引发新一轮的安全漏洞。本研究将回顾人体RFID微芯片植入将如何影响和作用于安全性、隐私以及与RFID植入在日常活动中用于人体的新计划相关的伦理问题。
papers.title_zh: 人体射频识别(RFID)植入物的安全、隐私和伦理问题:海报

papers.title: Exposing the location of anonymous solar-powered homes: poster
papers.authors: Qi Li, Dong Chen
papers.abstract: Due to the decline of solar module prices, more and more people install solar panel energy systems. To better analyze the solar performance, solar generation data are transmitted on the Internet, stored in the cloud, even making the data available to the public. These data can leak privacy information, such as, the occupancy. However, people believe this information is not useful as the solar energy are "anonymous", which means the data cannot be associated to any identification information, such as account number or address, thus these solar-powered home energy data is often not treated as sensitive. Our key insight is solar energy data is not anonymous: since every location on the earth has unique solar and weather signature. We design a system to localize the "anonymous" solar-powered homes. We first localize the source home to a small region of interest by inferring the latitude and longitude from the information inherently embedded in the solar data. We then identify solar-powered homes within this region using satellite image processing by extracting and detecting rooftop solar deployment using a hybrid convolution neural networks (CNN) approach to identify a specific home without extra cost.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于太阳能组件价格的下降，越来越多的人安装太阳能电池板能源系统。为了更好地分析太阳能性能，太阳能发电数据在互联网上传输，存储在云中，甚至向公众提供数据。这些数据可能会泄露隐私信息，如入住情况。然而，人们认为这些信息是无用的，因为太阳能是“匿名的”，这意味着这些数据不能与任何身份信息相关联，如账号或地址，因此这些太阳能供电的家庭能源数据通常不被视为敏感数据。我们的关键见解是太阳能数据不是匿名的:因为地球上的每个位置都有独特的太阳能和天气特征。我们设计了一个系统来定位“匿名”太阳能住宅。我们首先通过从太阳数据中固有的信息推断纬度和经度，将源定位到一个感兴趣的小区域。然后，我们通过使用混合卷积神经网络(CNN)方法提取和检测屋顶太阳能部署，使用卫星图像处理来识别该区域内的太阳能供电住宅，从而在不增加额外成本的情况下识别特定住宅。
papers.title_zh: 曝光匿名太阳能住宅的位置:海报

papers.title: Attacking HDMI distribution networks: poster
papers.authors: Luis Puche Rondon, Leonardo Babun, Kemal Akkaya, A. Selcuk Uluagac
papers.abstract: The High Definition Multimedia Interface or HDMI is the core and primary standard for Audio/Video communication in various media devices. HDMI allows flexible interaction between devices within HDMI distribution networks. Existing security standards and mechanism only protect traditional networking components. A user may mistakenly believe that a device is secure and an adversary may prove them otherwise. In this ongoing work, we show that by leveraging CEC to an attackers advantage. It is feasible for an attacker to reach devices which were formerly unreachable, and gain arbitrary control of HDMI devices. Specifically, we demonstrate it is possible to execute malicious device analysis, eavesdrop, and perform targeted Denial-of-Service attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 高清多媒体接口(HDMI)是各种媒体设备中音频/视频通信的核心和主要标准。HDMI允许HDMI分配网络中的设备之间进行灵活的交互。现有的安全标准和机制只保护传统的网络组件。用户可能错误地认为设备是安全的，而对手可能证明他们并非如此。在这项正在进行的工作中，我们展示了利用CEC对攻击者有利。攻击者可以到达以前无法到达的设备，并获得对HDMI设备的任意控制。具体来说，我们证明了执行恶意设备分析、窃听和执行有针对性的拒绝服务攻击是可能的。
papers.title_zh: 攻击HDMI分发网络:海报

papers.title: Dynamically detecting USB attacks in hardware: poster
papers.authors: Kyle Denney, Enes Erdin, Leonardo Babun, A. Selcuk Uluagac
papers.abstract: Malicious USB devices can disguise themselves as benign devices (e.g., keyboard, mouse, etc.) to insert malicious commands on end devices. Advanced software-based detection schemes (deeper operating system level) are used to identify the malicious nature of such mimic devices. However, a powerful adversary (e.g., as rootkits or advanced persistent threats) can subvert those software-based detection schemes. To address these concerns, we present our ongoing work to dynamically detect these threats in hardware. Specifically, we utilize a novel hardware-assistance mechanism to collect unaltered USB data at the physical layer which is fed into a machine learning-based classifier to determine the true nature of the USB device.
papers.abstract_zh: 恶意USB设备可以将自己伪装成良性设备(例如，键盘、鼠标等)。)在终端设备上插入恶意命令。基于高级软件的检测方案(更深的操作系统级别)用于识别此类模拟设备的恶意性质。然而，强大的对手(例如，rootkits或高级持久威胁)可以破坏那些基于软件的检测方案。为了解决这些问题，我们提出了我们正在进行的工作，以动态检测硬件中的这些威胁。具体来说，我们利用一种新颖的硬件辅助机制来收集物理层未更改的USB数据，这些数据被输入到基于机器学习的分类器中，以确定USB设备的真实性质。
papers.title_zh: 在硬件中动态检测USB攻击:海报

papers.title: Investigation of cookie vulnerabilities: poster
papers.authors: Marjani Peterson, Chutima Boonthum-Denecke
papers.abstract: Cookies have emerged as one of the most convenient solutions to keep track of browsers. They continue to raise both security and privacy concerns due to their continuous evolution. There is limited support for confidentiality, integrity and authentication in the way cookies are used. In this respect, the possibilities for misusing cookies are very real and are being exploited. This paper will first discuss the pros and cons of cookies. Also, discuss the step by step process of how cookies work. This paper will discuss the preferences of users based on survey results. This paper will discuss cookie vulnerabilities, ways to exploit them, and ways to mitigate them.
papers.abstract_zh: Cookies已经成为跟踪浏览器的最方便的解决方案之一。由于它们的持续发展，它们继续引发安全和隐私问题。cookies的使用方式对机密性、完整性和身份验证的支持有限。在这方面，误用cookies的可能性是非常真实的，并且正在被利用。本文将首先讨论cookies的利与弊。此外，讨论cookies工作的一步一步的过程。本文将根据调查结果讨论用户的偏好。本文将讨论cookie漏洞、利用它们的方法以及缓解它们的方法。
papers.title_zh: cookie漏洞调查:海报

papers.title: A digital forensics framework for smart settings: poster
papers.authors: Leonardo Babun, Amit Kumar Sikder, Abbas Acar, A. Selcuk Uluagac
papers.abstract: Users utilize IoT devices and sensors in a co-operative manner to enable the concept of a smart environment. This integration generate data with high forensic value. Nonetheless, current smart app programming platforms do not provide any digital forensics capability to identify, trace, store, and analyze the data produced in these settings. To overcome these limitations, in this poster, we present our ongoing work to introduce a novel digital forensic framework for a smart environment.
papers.abstract_zh: 用户以合作的方式利用物联网设备和传感器来实现智能环境的概念。这种集成产生了具有高取证价值数据。尽管如此，当前的智能应用程序编程平台不提供任何数字取证功能来识别、跟踪、存储和分析在这些设置中产生的数据。为了克服这些限制，在这张海报中，我们展示了我们正在进行的工作，以介绍一种用于智能环境的新型数字取证框架。
papers.title_zh: 智能设置的数字取证框架:海报

papers.title: Performance evaluation of key management schemes for wireless legacy smart grid environments: poster
papers.authors: Mumin Cebe, Kemal Akkaya
papers.abstract: With the increasing digitization of different components of Smart Grid, there is an ongoing effort to design secure protocols and deploy them for different applications. A major need along with these efforts is to deal with key management for a large number of devices. While key management can be easily addressed by transferring the existing protocols to Smart Grid domain, this is not an easy task as one needs to deal with the limitations of the current communication infrastructures and resource-constrained devices. As the utilities rightly requests to build the new systems on top of the legacy systems with limited investment, the research community needs to re-think the adaptation of the existing security approaches to such non-traditional environments. This poster aims to tackle one of these problems, namely, symmetric key management in a severely constrained wireless communication environment. Assuming a legacy radio communication infrastructure with bandwidths in the order of kilobits, the objective is to evaluate the feasibility and performance of the existing sophisticated key management protocols. We developed a realistic ns-3 environment and analyze the delay overhead via simulations.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着智能电网不同组件的日益数字化，人们正在努力设计安全协议并将其部署到不同的应用中。伴随这些努力的一个主要需求是处理大量设备的密钥管理。虽然密钥管理可以通过将现有协议转移到智能电网领域来轻松解决，但这并不是一项容易的任务，因为需要应对当前通信基础设施和资源受限设备的限制。由于电力公司理所当然地要求以有限的投资在遗留系统的基础上构建新系统，研究界需要重新考虑现有安全方法对这种非传统环境的适应性。本文旨在解决其中一个问题，即在严格受限的无线通信环境中的对称密钥管理。假设带宽为千比特量级的传统无线电通信基础设施，目标是评估现有复杂密钥管理协议的可行性和性能。我们开发了一个真实的ns-3环境，并通过仿真分析了延迟开销。
papers.title_zh: 无线传统智能电网环境密钥管理方案的性能评估:海报

papers.title: Preserving privacy of drone videos using proxy re-encryption technique: poster
papers.authors: Vashish Baboolal, Kemal Akkaya, Nico Saputro, Khaled Rabieh
