In this paper, we propose practical schemes to employ cryptography at the PHY layer combined with a time-bound technique to detect and mitigate such attacks in enterprise and 802.1X-based public networks. Our backward-compatible schemes embed a digital signature of the AP (or a message authentication code) in frame preamble signals and add only a negligible delay to the connection establishment process and achieve a 98.9% true positive rate in detecting an attacker who tries to relay valid preambles. Furthermore, we conduct a formal security analysis of our scheme using a model checker and a cryptographic protocol verifier and evaluate its performance in a commercial AP-and-USRP~testbed.
papers.title_zh: 在Wi-Fi系统连接建立阶段对抗中继和欺骗攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 为了建立安全的Wi-Fi连接，工作站首先与接入点(AP)交换几个未受保护的管理帧，最终相互验证并安装成对密钥。因此，对手有可能在物理层(PHY)或MAC层欺骗那些未受保护的帧的元素，从而促成额外的攻击(例如，中间人攻击和饥饿攻击)。尽管做出了一些临时努力，但仍然没有切实可行的办法来共同应对这些攻击。在本文中，我们提出了一些实用的方案，在phy层使用加密技术，并结合一种有时限的技术来检测和减轻企业和基于802.1X的公共网络中的这种攻击。我们的后向兼容方案将AP的数字签名(或消息认证码)嵌入到帧前同步信号中，并且仅向连接建立过程添加可忽略的延迟，并且在检测试图中继有效前同步的攻击者时实现了98.9%的正确率。此外，我们使用一个模型检测器和一个密码协议验证器对我们的方案进行了形式化的安全性分析，并在一个商用的AP-and-USRP实验床上评估了它的性能。

papers.title: Testing and Improving the Correctness of Wi-Fi Frame Injection
papers.authors: Mathy Vanhoef, Xianjun Jiao, Wei Liu, Ingrid Moerman
papers.abstract: Investigating the security of Wi-Fi devices often requires writing scripts that send unexpected or malformed frames, to subsequently monitor how the devices respond. Such tests generally use Linux and off-the-self Wi-Fi dongles. Typically, the dongle is put into monitor mode to get access to the raw content of received Wi-Fi frames and to inject, i.e., transmit, customized frames. In this paper, we demonstrate that monitor mode on Linux may, unbeknownst to the user, mistakenly inject Wi-Fi frames or even drop selected frames instead of sending them. We discuss cases where this causes security testing tools to misbehave, making users to believe that a device under test is secure while in reality it is vulnerable to an attack. To remedy this problem, we create a script to test raw frame injection, and we extend the Radiotap standard to gain more control over frame injection. Our extension is now part of the Radiotap standard and has been implemented in Linux. We tested it using commercial Wi-Fi dongles and using openwifi, which is an open implementation of Wi-Fi on top of software-defined radios. With our improved setup, we reproduced tests for the KRACK and FragAttack vulnerabilities, and discovered previously unknown vulnerabilities in three smartphones.
papers.title_zh: 测试和改进Wi-Fi帧注入的正确性
papers.abstract_zh: 调查Wi-Fi设备的安全性通常需要编写发送意外或畸形帧的脚本，以便随后监控设备如何响应。这种测试通常使用Linux和离线Wi-Fi加密狗。通常，加密狗被置于监控模式，以访问接收到的Wi-Fi帧的原始内容，并插入(即传输)定制的帧。在本文中，我们证明了Linux上的监控模式可能会在用户不知道的情况下，错误地注入Wi-Fi帧，甚至丢弃选定的帧，而不是发送它们。我们讨论了导致安全测试工具行为不当的案例，让用户相信被测设备是安全的，而实际上它很容易受到攻击。为了解决这个问题，我们创建了一个脚本来测试原始帧注入，并且我们扩展了Radiotap标准来获得对帧注入的更多控制。我们的扩展现在是Radiotap标准的一部分，并且已经在Linux中实现。我们使用商业Wi-Fi加密狗和openwifi对其进行了测试，open wifi是在软件定义的无线电之上的Wi-Fi的开放式实现。通过我们改进的设置，我们重现了对KRACK和FragAttack漏洞的测试，并在三款智能手机中发现了以前未知的漏洞。

papers.title: JaX: Detecting and Cancelling High-power Jammers Using Convolutional Neural Network
papers.authors: Hai N. Nguyen, Guevara Noubir
papers.abstract: In this paper, we present JaX, a novel approach for detecting and cancelling high-power jammers in the scenarios when the traditional spread spectrum techniques and other jammer avoidance approaches are not sufficient. JaX does not require explicit probes, sounding, training sequences, channel estimation, or the cooperation of the transmitter. We identify and address multiple challenges, resulting in a convolutional neural network for a multi-antenna system to infer the existence of interference, the number of interfering emissions and their respective phases. This information is continuously fed into an algorithm that cancels the interfering signal. We develop a two-antenna prototype system and evaluate our approach in various environment settings and modulation schemes using SDR platforms. We demonstrate that the receiving node equipped with our approach can detect a jammer with over 99% of accuracy and achieve a Bit Error Rate as low as 10^6 even when the jammer power is nearly two orders of magnitude (19 dB) higher than the legitimate signal, and without modifying the link modulation. JaX is resilient against various jammers with different characteristics of jamming signals, jamming power, and timing pattern.
papers.title_zh: JaX:使用卷积神经网络检测和消除高功率干扰
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们提出了JaX，一种在传统扩频技术和其他干扰避免方法不足以解决问题的情况下检测和消除高功率干扰的新方法。JaX不需要显式探测、探测、训练序列、信道估计或发射机的合作。我们识别并解决了多个挑战，从而为多天线系统构建了一个卷积神经网络，用于推断干扰的存在、干扰发射的数量及其各自的相位。该信息被连续地输入到消除干扰信号的算法中。我们开发了一个双天线原型系统，并使用SDR平台在各种环境设置和调制方案中评估了我们的方法。我们证明，配备有我们的方法的接收节点可以以超过99%的准确度检测到干扰，并且即使当干扰功率比合法信号高近两个数量级(19 dB)时，也可以实现低至10^6的误码率，并且不修改链路调制。JaX可以抵御各种具有不同干扰信号、干扰功率和定时模式特征的干扰。

papers.title: Mag-Auth: Authenticating Wireless Transmitters and Receivers on the Receiver Side via Magnetic Emissions
papers.authors: Omar Adel Ibrahim, Roberto Di Pietro
papers.abstract: Device authentication over the wireless channel is still an open issue. This is especially true for low-end devices like the IoT ones, where the overhead required by traditional asymmetric cryptographic techniques can be overwhelming, or-more in general-when the crypto material might have been compromised. A robust solution for the above scenarios is Physical-Layer Authentication (PLA), which exploits the inherent intrinsic unique features of the wireless devices to achieve low-cost, crypto-less authentication. In this paper, we present Mag-Auth, a novel and lightweight authentication scheme that leverages the Electro-Magnetic (EM) emissions released at the joint connection between the wireless device and its antenna in response to an excitation signal. Specifically, Mag-Auth trains, on the collected EM emissions, an autoencoder and a Neural Network (NN). The autoencoder is employed to reject wireless devices that do not belong to the set the autoencoder and the NN have been trained over, while the NN is applied to uniquely identify the different classes of wireless transmitter-receiver pairs. Mag-Auth enjoys some unique features: it is privacy-preserving as it does not require to have access to the radio board (unlike, for instance, in-phase/quadrature (IQ)-based PLA methods); it caters to both wireless transmitter and receiver authentication scenarios; and, it sports striking performance. Indeed, our extensive experimental campaign involving 600 combinations of various wireless devices and antennas (including SDRs and IoTs) unveiled a minimum average F1-Score of 0.94 when classifying samples collected over a maximum length of 1s, proving the effectiveness and viability of using EM emissions as a lightweight, efficient, and robust authentication mechanism. Finally, we also released the collected EM emissions raw data to foster further investigations and development by Academia, Industry, and practitioners.
papers.title_zh: Mag-Auth:通过磁发射在接收器侧认证无线发射器和接收器
papers.abstract_zh: 无线信道上的设备认证仍然是一个公开的问题。对于像物联网设备这样的低端设备来说尤其如此，在这些设备中，传统的非对称加密技术所需的开销可能会非常大，或者更一般地说，当加密材料可能已经被泄露时。针对上述情况的健壮解决方案是物理层认证(PLA ),它利用无线设备固有的独特功能来实现低成本、无加密的认证。在本文中，我们提出了Mag-Auth，这是一种新颖的轻量级认证方案，它利用无线设备与其天线之间的连接处释放的电磁(EM)辐射来响应激励信号。具体来说，Mag-Auth根据收集的电磁辐射训练自动编码器和神经网络(NN)。自动编码器用于拒绝不属于自动编码器和神经网络已被训练过的集合的无线设备，而神经网络用于唯一地识别不同类别的无线发射机-接收机对。Mag-Auth享有一些独特的特征:它是隐私保护的，因为它不需要访问无线电板(不像例如基于同相/正交(IQ)的PLA方法)；它满足无线发射机和接收机认证两种情况；而且，它的运动性能惊人。事实上，我们广泛的实验活动涉及各种无线设备和天线(包括SDR和IOT)的600种组合，在对最大长度为1s的样本进行分类时，发现最低平均F1得分为0.94，证明了使用电磁辐射作为轻量级、高效和稳健的身份验证机制的有效性和可行性。最后，我们还发布了收集的电磁辐射原始数据，以促进学术界、工业界和从业者的进一步研究和开发。

papers.title: Wavefront Manipulation Attack via Programmable mmWave Metasurfaces: from Theory to Experiments
papers.authors: Haoze Chen, Hooman Saeidi, Suresh Venkatesh, Kaushik Sengupta, Yasaman Ghasempour
papers.abstract: Reconfigurable surfaces enable on-demand manipulation of electromagnetic wave properties in a controllable manner. These surfaces have been shown to enhance mmWave wireless networks in many ways, including blockage recovery. In this paper, we investigate the security vulnerabilities associated with the deployment of reconfigurable surfaces, i.e., an adversary may deploy new rogue surfaces or tamper with already-deployed surfaces to maliciously engineer the reflection pattern. In particular, we introduceMetasurface-enabled Sideband Steering (MeSS), a new metasurface-in-the-middle attack in which the spectral-spatial properties of the reflected wavefront are manipulated such that a concealed sideband channel is created in the spectral domain and steered toward the eavesdropper location, while maintaining the legitimate link toward the victim intact. We fabricate a custom reconfigurable surface prototype and evaluate MeSS through theoretical analysis as well as over-the-air experiments at the 60 GHz band. Our results indicate that MeSS significantly reduces empirical secrecy capacity (up to 81.7%) while leaving a small power penalty at the victim that can be masked under normal channel fluctuations.
papers.title_zh: 通过可编程毫米波元表面的波前操纵攻击:从理论到实验
papers.abstract_zh: 可重新配置的表面使得能够以可控的方式按需操纵电磁波属性。这些表面已被证明在许多方面增强毫米波无线网络，包括阻塞恢复。在本文中，我们研究了与可重构表面部署相关的安全漏洞，即，对手可能部署新的流氓表面或篡改已部署的表面来恶意设计反射模式。特别是，我们引入了支持超表面的边带转向(MeSS)，这是一种新的中间超表面攻击，其中反射波前的光谱空间属性被操纵，以便在光谱域中创建隐藏的边带信道，并将其转向窃听者位置，同时保持与受害者的合法链接完好无损。我们制作了一个定制的可重构表面原型，并通过理论分析和60 GHz波段的空中实验评估了MeSS。我们的结果表明，MeSS显著降低了经验保密容量(高达81.7%)，同时在受害者处留下了可以在正常信道波动下被掩盖的小功率损失。

papers.title: EMI-LiDAR: Uncovering Vulnerabilities of LiDAR Sensors in Autonomous Driving Setting using Electromagnetic Interference
papers.authors: Sri Hrushikesh Varma Bhupathiraju, Jennifer Sheldon, Luke A. Bauer, Vincent Bindschaedler, Takeshi Sugawara, Sara Rampazzi
papers.abstract: Autonomous Vehicles (AVs) using LiDAR-based object detection systems are rapidly improving and becoming an increasingly viable method of transportation. While effective at perceiving the surrounding environment, these detection systems are shown to be vulnerable to attacks using lasers which can cause obstacle misclassifications or removal. These laser attacks, however, are challenging to perform, requiring precise aiming and accuracy. Our research exposes a new threat in the form of Intentional Electro-Magnetic-Interference (IEMI), which affects the time-of-flight (TOF) circuits that make up modern LiDARs. We show that these vulnerabilities can be exploited to force the AV Perception system to misdetect, misclassify objects, and perceive non-existent obstacles. We evaluate the vulnerability in three AV perception modules (PointPillars, PointRCNN, and Apollo) and show how the classification rate drops below 50%. We also analyze the impact of the IEMI injection on two fusion models (AVOD and Frustum-ConvNet) and in real-world scenarios. Finally, we discuss potential countermeasures and propose two strategies to detect signal injection.
papers.title_zh: 电磁干扰-激光雷达:利用电磁干扰揭示自动驾驶环境中激光雷达传感器的弱点
papers.abstract_zh: 使用基于激光雷达的物体检测系统的自动驾驶汽车(AVs)正在快速改进，并成为越来越可行的交通方式。虽然在感知周围环境方面是有效的，但这些检测系统显示出易受使用激光的攻击，这可能导致障碍的错误分类或移除。然而，这些激光攻击很难执行，需要精确的瞄准和准确性。我们的研究揭示了一种新的威胁，即故意电磁干扰(IEMI)，它影响了构成现代激光雷达的飞行时间(TOF)电路。我们表明，这些漏洞可以被利用来迫使AV感知系统错误地检测、错误地分类对象，并感知不存在的障碍。我们评估了三个AV感知模块(PointPillars、PointRCNN和Apollo)中的漏洞，并展示了分类率如何降至50%以下。我们还分析了IEMI注入对两个融合模型(AVOD和平截头体-ConvNet)和真实场景的影响。最后，我们讨论了潜在的对策，并提出了两种检测信号注入的策略。

papers.title: Satellite Spoofing from A to Z: On the Requirements of Satellite Downlink Overshadowing Attacks
papers.authors: Edd Salkield, Marcell Szakály, Joshua Smailes, Sebastian Köhler, Simon Birnbach, Martin Strohmeier, Ivan Martinovic
papers.abstract: Satellite communications are increasingly crucial for telecommunications, navigation, and Earth observation. However, many widely used satellites do not cryptographically secure the downlink, opening the door for radio spoofing attacks. Recent developments in software-defined radio hardware have enabled attacks on wireless systems including GNSS, which can be effectively spoofed using only cheap hardware available off the shelf. However, these conclusions do not generalize well to other satellite systems such as high data rate backhauls or satellite-to-customer connections, where the spoofing requirements are currently unknown. In this paper, we present a systematic review of spoofing attacks against satellite downlink communications systems. We establish a threat model linking attack feasibility and impact to required budget through real-world experiments and channel simulations. Our results show that nearly all evaluated satellite systems were overshadowable at a distance of 1 km in the worst case, for a budget of ~2000 USD or less. We evaluate how key challenges surrounding modulation schemes, antenna directionality, and legitimate satellite signal strength can be overcome in practice through antenna sidelobe targeting, overshadowing, and automatic gain control takeover. We also show that, surprisingly, protocols designed to be more robust against channel noise are significantly less robust against an overshadowing attacker. We conclude with a discussion of physical-layer countermeasures specifically applicable to satellite systems which can not be cryptographically upgraded.
papers.title_zh: 从A到Z的卫星欺骗:关于卫星下行遮蔽攻击的要求
papers.abstract_zh: 卫星通信对于电信、导航和地球观测越来越重要。然而，许多广泛使用的卫星没有对下行链路进行加密保护，这为无线电欺骗攻击打开了大门。软件定义无线电硬件的最新发展使得对包括GNSS在内的无线系统的攻击成为可能，仅使用现成的廉价硬件就可以有效地欺骗GNSS。然而，这些结论不能很好地推广到其他卫星系统，如高数据速率回程或卫星到用户的连接，在这些系统中欺骗要求目前是未知的。在本文中，我们提出了一个系统的审查欺骗攻击卫星下行链路通信系统。我们通过真实世界的实验和渠道模拟建立了一个威胁模型，将攻击可行性和影响与所需预算联系起来。我们的结果表明，几乎所有被评估的卫星系统在最坏的情况下都在1公里的距离内被遮蔽，预算约为2000美元或更少。我们评估了如何通过天线旁瓣瞄准、遮蔽和自动增益控制接管，在实践中克服围绕调制方案、天线方向性和合法卫星信号强度的关键挑战。我们还发现，令人惊讶的是，设计为对信道噪声更鲁棒的协议对隐蔽攻击者的鲁棒性明显较低。我们最后讨论了专门适用于不能加密升级的卫星系统的物理层对策。

papers.title: Malicious Relay Detection and Legitimate Channel Recovery
papers.authors: Xingya Zhao, Wei-Han Chen, Kannan Srinivasan
papers.abstract: Full-duplex devices can compromise the integrity of wireless channel measurements through signal relaying and several attacks have been proposed based on this vulnerability. Existing source authentication methods relying on previously-collected signatures face significant challenges in detecting these attacks because a relay attacker can gradually inject the channels so that the manipulated channels will fall within the tolerance range of the authentication methods and are mistaken as new signatures. In this paper, we propose RelayShield, a system for detecting malicious relays and recovering the legitimate transmitter-receiver channels from the manipulated channels. RelayShield requires only one channel measurement at the receiver. It analyzes signal path information resolved from input channels to detect relays and recover channels. RelayShield achieves over 95% detection accuracy with channels collected in two typical indoor environments. The recovered channels can support a wide range of applications, including secret generation protocols and sensing systems.
papers.title_zh: 恶意中继检测和合法信道恢复
papers.abstract_zh: 全双工设备可以通过信号中继损害无线信道测量的完整性，并且基于这一弱点已经提出了几种攻击。依赖于先前收集的签名的现有源认证方法在检测这些攻击时面临重大挑战，因为中继攻击者可以逐渐注入信道，使得被操纵的信道将落入认证方法的容许范围内，并被误认为新的签名。在本文中，我们提出了RelayShield，一个用于检测恶意中继并从被操纵的信道中恢复合法收发信道的系统。RelayShield只需要在接收机处进行一次信道测量。它分析从输入通道解析的信号路径信息，以检测中继和恢复通道。RelayShield利用在两种典型室内环境中采集的通道实现了超过95%的检测准确率。恢复的信道可以支持广泛的应用，包括秘密生成协议和传感系统。

papers.title: Location-independent GNSS Relay Attacks: A Lazy Attacker's Guide to Bypassing Navigation Message Authentication
papers.authors: Maryam Motallebighomi, Harshad Sathaye, Mridula Singh, Aanjhan Ranganathan
papers.abstract: In this work, we demonstrate the possibility of spoofing a GNSS receiver to arbitrary locations without modifying the navigation messages. Due to increasing spoofing threats, Galileo and GPS are evaluating broadcast authentication techniques to validate the integrity of navigation messages. Prior work required an adversary to record the GNSS signals at the intended spoofed location and relay them to the victim receiver. Our attack demonstrates the ability of an adversary to receive signals close to the victim receiver and in real-time generate spoofing signals for an arbitrary location without modifying the navigation message contents. We exploit the essential common reception and transmission time method used to estimate pseudorange in GNSS receivers, thereby potentially rendering any cryptographic authentication useless. We build a proof-of-concept real-time spoofer capable of receiving authenticated GNSS signals and generating spoofing signals for any arbitrary location and motion without requiring any high-speed communication networks or modifying the message contents. Our evaluations show that it is possible to spoof a victim receiver to locations as far as 4000~km away from the actual location and with any dynamic motion path. This work further highlights the fundamental limitations in securing a broadcast signaling-based localization system even if all communications are cryptographically protected.
papers.title_zh: 独立于位置的GNSS中继攻击:懒惰攻击者绕过导航消息认证指南
papers.abstract_zh: 在这项工作中，我们展示了在不修改导航信息的情况下将GNSS接收机欺骗到任意位置的可能性。由于日益增加的欺骗威胁，伽利略和GPS正在评估广播认证技术，以验证导航消息的完整性。先前的工作需要对手在预期的欺骗位置记录GNSS信号，并将它们转发给受害者接收机。我们的攻击证明了对手有能力在受害者接收器附近接收信号，并在不修改导航消息内容的情况下为任意位置实时生成欺骗信号。我们利用用于估计GNSS接收机中的伪距的基本公共接收和传输时间方法，从而潜在地使得任何加密认证无用。我们构建了一个概念验证的实时欺骗器，能够接收经过认证的GNSS信号，并为任意位置和运动生成欺骗信号，而无需任何高速通信网络或修改消息内容。我们的评估表明，欺骗受害者接收机到距离实际位置4000公里远的位置，并且具有任何动态运动路径是可能的。这项工作进一步强调了保护基于广播信令的定位系统的基本限制，即使所有的通信都受到密码保护。

papers.title: Circumventing the Defense against Modulation Classification Attacks
papers.authors: Naureen Hoque, Hanif Rahbari
papers.abstract: Modulation classification (MC) has a wide range of applications in spectrum sharing, management, and enforcement and can also be used by an adversary to launch traffic analysis or selective jamming. While recent modulation obfuscation techniques show promising results in mitigating MC attacks, in this paper we develop a novel convolution neural network (CNN)-based model to attack those defenses and successfully identify the true modulation scheme. Our extensive simulation and over-the-air experiments using show that our classification technique achieves around 85-99% accuracy for SNR levels 0 dB and above. Furthermore, our results demonstrate that the proposed model can effectively differentiate between obfuscated and non-obfuscated symbols, even when a transmitter switches between them as a new defense mechanism, achieving an accuracy of 95%.
papers.title_zh: 规避对调制分类攻击的防御
papers.abstract_zh: 调制分类(MC)在频谱共享、管理和实施方面有着广泛的应用，也可以被对手用来进行流量分析或选择性干扰。虽然最近的调制混淆技术在减轻MC攻击方面显示出有希望的结果，但在本文中，我们开发了一种新的基于卷积神经网络(CNN)的模型来攻击这些防御，并成功地识别真正的调制方案。我们使用的大量模拟和空中实验表明，我们的分类技术对于0 dB和以上的SNR水平实现了大约85-99%的准确度。此外，我们的结果表明，所提出的模型可以有效地区分混淆和非混淆符号，即使当发送者在它们之间切换作为一种新的防御机制时，也可以达到95%的准确率。

papers.title: Fortifying Your Defenses: Techniques to Thwart Adversarial Attacks and Boost Performance of Machine Learning-Based Intrusion Detection Systems
papers.authors: Wenjing Lou
papers.abstract: Machine learning has seen significant advancements in recent years and has proven to be highly effective in a wide range of applications, including intrusion detection systems (IDS). However, while working in adversarial environments, machine learning-based systems are known to be vulnerable to a range of attacks. In this talk, we will discuss techniques aimed at strengthening machine learning-based IDS. On the one hand, we explore techniques for enhancing the performance and robustness of IDS in adversarial environments, where we propose a contrastive learning-based approach that builds highly differentiating IDS. On the other hand, we develop efficient security mechanisms to thwart common attacks, including an adversarial example (AE) detector that filters out suspicious inputs at the model testing time, and a robust model evaluation method that leverages latent space representations to build resiliency in model aggregation against model poisoning attacks in federated learning. This talk will report our research results along this line of research.
papers.title_zh: 加强防御:挫败恶意攻击和提高基于机器学习的入侵检测系统性能的技术
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，机器学习取得了重大进展，并已被证明在包括入侵检测系统(IDS)在内的广泛应用中非常有效。然而，当在敌对环境中工作时，基于机器学习的系统容易受到一系列攻击。在本次演讲中，我们将讨论旨在加强基于机器学习的入侵检测系统的技术。一方面，我们探索了在敌对环境中增强入侵检测系统的性能和健壮性的技术，其中我们提出了一种基于对比学习的方法来构建高度差异化的入侵检测系统。另一方面，我们开发了有效的安全机制来阻止常见的攻击，包括在模型测试时过滤掉可疑输入的敌对示例(AE)检测器，以及利用潜在空间表示来建立模型聚合的弹性以对抗联合学习中的模型中毒攻击的健壮模型评估方法。本次讲座将沿着这条研究路线报告我们的研究成果。

papers.title: Increasing the Robustness of a Machine Learning-based IoT Malware Detection Method with Adversarial Training
papers.authors: József Sándor, Roland Nagy, Levente Buttyán
papers.abstract: We study the robustness of SIMBIoTA-ML, a recently proposed machine learning-based IoT malware detection solution against adversarial samples. First, we propose two adversarial sample creation strategies that modify existing malware binaries by appending extra bytes to them such that those extra bytes are never executed, but they make the modified samples dissimilar to the original ones. We show that SIMBIoTA-ML is robust against the first strategy, but it can be misled by the second one. To overcome this problem, we propose to use adversarial training, i.e., to extend the training set of SIMBIoTA-ML with samples that are crafted by using the adversarial evasion strategies. We measure the detection accuracy of SIMBIoTA-ML trained on such an extended training set and show that it remains high both for the original malware samples and for the adversarial samples.
papers.title_zh: 利用对抗训练提高基于机器学习的物联网恶意软件检测方法的鲁棒性
papers.abstract_zh: 我们研究了SIMBIoTA-ML的鲁棒性，这是一种最近提出的基于机器学习的物联网恶意软件检测解决方案。首先，我们提出了两种对立的样本创建策略，通过向现有的恶意软件二进制文件添加额外的字节来修改它们，使得这些额外的字节永远不会被执行，但是它们使得修改后的样本与原始样本不同。我们证明SIMBIoTA-ML对第一种策略是稳健的，但它可能会被第二种策略误导。为了克服这个问题，我们建议使用对抗性训练，即使用通过使用对抗性回避策略制作的样本来扩展SIMBIoTA-ML的训练集。我们测量了在这样一个扩展的训练集上训练的SIMBIoTA-ML的检测精度，并显示它对于原始恶意软件样本和敌对样本都保持很高的检测精度。

papers.title: How Can the Adversary Effectively Identify Cellular IoT Devices Using LSTM Networks?
papers.authors: Zhengping Jay Luo, Will A. Pitera, Shangqing Zhao, Zhuo Lu, Yalin E. Sagduyu
papers.abstract: The Internet of Things (IoT) has become a key enabler for connecting edge devices with each other and the internet. Massive IoT services provided by cellular networks offer various applications such as smart metering and smart cities. Security of the massive IoT devices working alongside traditional devices such as smartphones and laptops has become a major concern. Protecting these IoT devices from being identified by malicious attackers is often the first line of defense for cellular IoT devices. In this paper, we provide an effective attacking method for identifying cellular IoT devices from cellular networks. Inspired by the characteristics of Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks, we have developed a method that can not only capture context information but also adapt to the dynamic changes of the environment over time. Experimental validation shows a high detection rate with less than 10 epochs of training on public datasets.
papers.title_zh: 对手如何利用LSTM网络有效识别蜂窝物联网设备？
papers.abstract_zh: 物联网(IoT)已经成为连接边缘设备和互联网的关键因素。蜂窝网络提供的大量物联网服务提供了各种应用，如智能计量和智能城市。与智能手机和笔记本电脑等传统设备一起工作的大规模物联网设备的安全性已成为一个主要问题。保护这些物联网设备不被恶意攻击者识别往往是蜂窝物联网设备的第一道防线。在本文中，我们提供了一种从蜂窝网络中识别蜂窝物联网设备的有效攻击方法。受长短期记忆(LSTM)网络特性的启发，我们开发了一种方法，不仅可以捕获上下文信息，还可以适应环境随时间的动态变化。实验验证表明，在公共数据集上，少于10个历元的训练具有较高的检测率。

papers.title: Exploring Adversarial Attacks on Learning-based Localization
papers.authors: Frost Mitchell, Phillip Smith, Aditya Bhaskara, Sneha Kumar Kasera
papers.abstract: We investigate the robustness of a convolutional neural network (CNN) RF transmitter localization model in the face of adversarial actors which may poison or spoof sensor data to disrupt or defeat the algorithm. We train the CNN to estimate transmitter locations based on sensor coordinates and received signal strength (RSS) measurements from a real-world dataset. We consider attacks from adversaries with varying capabilities to include naive, random attacks and omniscient, worst-case attacks. We apply countermeasures based on statistical outlier approaches and train the CNN against adversarial attacks to improve performance. Adversarial training is shown to completely neutralize some attacks and improve accuracy by up to 65% in other cases. Our evaluation of countermeasures indicates that a combination of statistical techniques and adversarial training can provide more robust defense against adversarial attacks.
papers.title_zh: 探索对基于学习的本地化的对抗性攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 我们研究了卷积神经网络(CNN)射频发射器定位模型在面对敌对行动者时的鲁棒性，这些敌对行动者可能毒害或欺骗传感器数据以破坏或击败算法。我们训练CNN基于传感器坐标和来自真实世界数据集的接收信号强度(RSS)测量来估计发射器位置。我们认为来自具有不同能力的对手的攻击包括天真的随机攻击和无所不知的最坏情况攻击。我们应用基于统计异常值方法的对策，并训练CNN对抗敌对攻击以提高性能。对抗性训练被证明可以完全抵消一些攻击，并在其他情况下提高高达65%的准确性。我们对对策的评估表明，统计技术和对抗性训练的结合可以为对抗性攻击提供更强大的防御。

papers.title: Approximate Wireless Communication for Federated Learning
papers.authors: Xiang Ma, Haijian Sun, Rose Qingyang Hu, Yi Qian
papers.abstract: This paper presents an approximate wireless communication scheme for federated learning (FL) model aggregation in the uplink transmission. We consider a realistic channel that reveals bit errors during FL model exchange in wireless networks. Our study demonstrates that random bit errors during model transmission can significantly affect FL performance. To overcome this challenge, we propose an approximate communication scheme based on the mathematical and statistical proof that machine learning (ML) model gradients are bounded under certain constraints. This bound enables us to introduce a novel encoding scheme for float-to-binary representation of gradient values and their QAM constellation mapping. Besides, since FL gradients are error-resilient, the proposed scheme simply delivers gradients with errors when the channel quality is satisfactory, eliminating extensive error-correcting codes and/or retransmission. The direct benefits include less overhead and lower latency. The proposed scheme is well-suited for resource-constrained devices in wireless networks. Through simulations, we show that the proposed scheme is effective in reducing the impact of bit errors on FL performance and saves at least half the time than transmission with error correction and retransmission to achieve the same learning performance. In addition, we investigated the effectiveness of bit protection mechanisms in high-order modulation when gray coding is employed and found that this approach considerably enhances learning performance.
papers.title_zh: 用于联邦学习的近似无线通信
papers.abstract_zh: 提出了一种近似的无线通信方案，用于上行链路传输中的联邦学习(FL)模型聚合。我们考虑一个真实的信道，它揭示了无线网络中FL模型交换期间的误码。我们的研究表明，模型传输过程中的随机比特错误会显著影响FL性能。为了克服这一挑战，我们基于机器学习(ML)模型梯度在某些约束下有界的数学和统计证明，提出了一种近似通信方案。这个界限使我们能够引入一种新颖的编码方案，用于梯度值的浮点到二进制表示及其QAM星座映射。此外，由于FL梯度是错误弹性的，所以当信道质量令人满意时，所提出的方案简单地传递有错误的梯度，消除了大量的纠错码和/或重传。直接的好处包括更少的开销和更低的延迟。所提出的方案非常适合于无线网络中资源受限的设备。通过仿真，我们证明了所提出的方案在减少比特错误对FL性能的影响方面是有效的，并且在达到相同的学习性能的情况下，比具有纠错和重传的传输节省至少一半的时间。此外，我们研究了高阶调制中使用格雷码时比特保护机制的有效性，发现这种方法大大提高了学习性能。

papers.title: A Key Generation Scheme for IoV Communication Based on Neural Network Autoencoders
papers.authors: Liquan Chen, Han Wang, Tianyu Lu, Zeyu Xu
papers.abstract: In recent years, the Internet of Vehicles (IoV) has become more and more widely used. Due to the high dynamic and point-to-point characteristics of IoV communication, IoV needs a secure and effective key generation mechanism. Physical layer key generation has become a promising technology, known for its lightweight and information theory security. IoV communication is usually realized using Wi-Fi, ZigBee, LoRa and other technologies. Based on ESP32 device, this paper explores the use of WiFi communication in the vehicle-to-everything (V2X) scenario of IoV. Focusing on the V2X scenario, we conduct channel modeling based on line of sight (LoS) and multipath fading and present Secure-Vehicle-Key, which is an environment-adaptive key generation scheme using neural network autoencoders. This scheme can realize the dynamic balance of reliability and confidentiality to meet the requirements of different vehicle network situations. Compared with the reconciliation scheme implemented by Slepian-Wolf low-density parity check (LDPC) codes, the method in this paper reduces the bit disagreement rate (BDR) of key generation by 30%-40% and passes the NIST randomness test with excellent results.
papers.title_zh: 基于神经网络自动编码器的IoV通信密钥生成方案
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，车联网(IoV)的应用越来越广泛。由于IoV通信的高动态性和点对点特性，IoV需要一种安全有效的密钥生成机制。物理层密钥生成已经成为一种很有前途的技术，以轻量级和信息论安全著称。IoV通信通常使用Wi-Fi、ZigBee、LoRa等技术实现。基于ESP32设备，探讨了WiFi通信在物联网车对物(V2X)场景中的应用。针对V2X场景，我们基于视线(LoS)和多径衰落进行信道建模，并提出Secure-Vehicle-Key，这是一种使用神经网络自动编码器的环境自适应密钥生成方案。该方案可以实现可靠性和保密性的动态平衡，以满足不同车联网场景的需求。与Slepian-Wolf低密度奇偶校验(LDPC)码实现的协调方案相比，该方法将密钥生成的比特不一致率(BDR)降低了30%-40%，并以优异的结果通过了NIST随机性测试。

papers.title: Analysis of Lossy Generative Data Compression for Robust Remote Deep Inference
papers.authors: Mathew Williams, Silvija Kokalj-Filipovic, Armani Rodriguez
papers.abstract: Networks of wireless sensors, including Internet of Things (IoT), motivate the use of lossy compression of the sensor data to match the available network bandwidth (BW). Hence, sensor data intended for inference by a remote deep learning (RDL) model is likely to be reconstructed with distortion, from a compressed representation received by the remote user over a wireless channel. Our focus is a particular type of lossy compression algorithm based on DL models, and known as learned compression (LC). The link between the information loss and compression rate in LCs has not been studied yet in the framework of information theory, nor practically associated with any meta-data which could describe the type and level of information loss to downstream users. This may make this compression undetectable yet potentially harmful. We study the robustness of a RDL classification model against the lossy compression of the input, including the robustness under an adversarial attack. We apply different compression methods of MNIST images, such as JPEG and a hierarchical LC, all with different compression ratios. For any lossy reconstruction and its uncompressed original, several techniques for topological feature characterization based on persistent homology are used to highlight the important differences amongst compression approaches that may affect the robust accuracy of a DL classifier trained on the original data. We conclude that LC is preferred in the described context, because we achieve the same accuracy as with the originals (with and without an adversarial attack) on a trained DL MNIST classifier, while using only 1/4 of the BW. We show that calculated topological features differ between JPEG and the comparable LC reconstructions, which are closer to the features of the original. We show that there is a distribution shift in those features due to the attack. Finally, most LC models are generative, meaning that we can generate multiple statistically independent compressed representations of a data point, which opens the possibility for the inference error correction at the RDL model. Due to space limitations, we leave this aspect for future work.
papers.title_zh: 面向鲁棒远程深度推理的有损生成数据压缩分析
papers.abstract_zh: 包括物联网(IoT)在内的无线传感器网络鼓励使用传感器数据的有损压缩来匹配可用的网络带宽(BW)。因此，旨在由远程深度学习(RDL)模型进行推断的传感器数据很可能从远程用户通过无线信道接收的压缩表示中失真地重建。我们的重点是一种基于DL模型的特殊类型的有损压缩算法，称为学习压缩(LC)。LCs中的信息损失和压缩率之间的联系还没有在信息论的框架中被研究，也没有实际上与任何可以向下游用户描述信息损失的类型和水平的元数据相关联。这可能会使这种压缩不可检测，但有潜在的危害。我们研究了RDL分类模型对输入的有损压缩的鲁棒性，包括在敌对攻击下的鲁棒性。我们采用不同的MNIST图像压缩方法，如JPEG和分级LC，所有方法都有不同的压缩比。对于任何有损重建及其未压缩的原始数据，基于持久同源性的拓扑特征表征的几种技术被用于强调压缩方法之间的重要差异，这些差异可能影响在原始数据上训练的DL分类器的稳健精度。我们得出结论，LC在所描述的上下文中是优选的，因为我们在训练的DL MNIST分类器上实现了与原始分类器(有和没有敌对攻击)相同的准确性，而仅使用1/4的BW。我们表明，计算的拓扑特征在JPEG和可比的LC重建之间有所不同，后者更接近原始的特征。我们表明，由于攻击，这些特征的分布发生了变化。最后，大多数LC模型是生成性的，这意味着我们可以生成一个数据点的多个统计独立的压缩表示，这为RDL模型的推理误差校正提供了可能性。由于篇幅所限，我们把这方面的工作留待以后做。

papers.title: Machine Learning-Based Jamming Detection and Classification in Wireless Networks
papers.authors: Enrico Testi, Luca Arcangeloni, Andrea Giorgetti
papers.abstract: The development of novel tools to detect, classify and counteract the new generation of smart jammers in Internet of Things (IoT) is of paramount importance. Detection and classification have to be performed in a short time, with high reliability, and preserving the privacy of network users. In this work, we propose a novel machine learning (ML)-based jamming detection and classification algorithm which can be implemented in the network gateway (GW). The proposed method is based on energy detector (ED), the extraction of specific problem-tailored features, dimensionality reduction, and multi-class classification. Extensive numerical results have been carried out to evaluate the performance of detection and classification, varying the number of principal components selected through dimensionality reduction, the observation window length, the shadowing intensity, and the signal-to-jammer ratio (SJR). Our solution reaches remarkably high accuracy, i.e., up to 99%, outperforming a state-of-the-art solution. That is a very promising result considering that the approach does not need to inspect the decoded information, thus preserving the privacy of the network users.
papers.title_zh: 无线网络中基于机器学习的干扰检测和分类
papers.abstract_zh: 开发新的工具来检测、分类和对抗物联网中的新一代智能干扰器至关重要。检测和分类必须在短时间内以高可靠性执行，并保护网络用户的隐私。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一种新的基于机器学习的干扰检测和分类算法，该算法可以在网关中实现。所提出的方法是基于能量检测器(ed)，提取特定问题定制的特征，降维，和多类分类。已经进行了大量的数值结果来评估检测和分类的性能，改变了通过降维、观察窗长度、阴影强度和信号干扰比(SJR)选择的主分量的数量。我们的解决方案达到了非常高的精度，即高达99%，超过了最先进的解决方案。考虑到该方法不需要检查解码的信息，因此保护了网络用户的隐私，这是一个非常有希望的结果。

papers.title: Machine Learning Assisted Physical Layer Secret Key Generation in the One-Time-Pad Encryption Scheme
papers.authors: Liquan Chen, Yufan Song, Tianyu Lu, Peng Zhang
papers.abstract: The one-time-pad (OTP) technique is widely used in the encryption to achieve the information-theoretic security, and the physical-layer secret key generation (SKG) technique can provide the random keys for OTP. However, the keys are susceptible to eavesdroppers in the correlated channel scenarios. To address this issue, this paper proposes a machine learning (ML) assisted SKG in the OTP encryption scheme. We make a complete and rigorous analysis of the information leakage under the influence of space-time correlation. The derivation based on information theory proves the security of the key generation scheme. To simplify the computational complexity, we generate the initial key based on ML. The simulation results show that the probability of information being leaked in the next frame increases if information is leaked in the current frame. Meanwhile, the simulation results verify that our ML assisted SKG scheme can generate keys securely for OTP under different space-time correlation.
papers.title_zh: 一次一密加密方案中机器学习辅助的物理层密钥生成
papers.abstract_zh: 一次一密(OTP)技术被广泛应用于加密中以实现信息理论安全，而物理层密钥生成(SKG)技术可以为OTP提供随机密钥。然而，在相关信道场景中，密钥容易受到窃听者的攻击。针对这一问题，提出一种机器学习(ML)辅助SKG的OTP加密方案。我们对时空关联影响下的信息泄漏进行了完整而严谨的分析。基于信息论的推导证明了密钥生成方案的安全性。为了简化计算复杂度，我们基于ML生成初始密钥。仿真结果表明，如果当前帧有信息泄漏，则下一帧信息泄漏的概率增加。同时，仿真结果验证了我们的最大似然辅助SKG方案能够在不同的时空相关性下为OTP安全地生成密钥。

papers.title: Hierarchical Over-the-Air Federated Learning with Differential Privacy
papers.authors: Zixi Wang, Arick Grootveld, Mustafa Cenk Gursoy
papers.abstract: Federated learning (FL) is a burgeoning field that examines the cooperative interaction of machine learning (ML) models with users, enabling the training of a global model while each user retains its data locally. With differential privacy (DP), FL also becomes an enabler for training ML models in a more private manner. While there has been a growing body of work exploring various aspects of FL, most studies, especially in the context of hierarchical federated learning (HFL), treat different levels of the hierarchy as a composition of two DP mechanisms. In this paper, we introduce a DP based privacy preserving method with hierarchical over-the-air FL and address both communication and privacy aspects in an end-to-end fashion.
papers.title_zh: 具有差分隐私的分层空中联邦学习
papers.abstract_zh: 联合学习(FL)是一个新兴的领域，它研究机器学习(ML)模型与用户的合作交互，在每个用户本地保留其数据的同时，实现全局模型的训练。有了差分隐私(DP)，FL也成为以更隐私的方式训练ML模型的使能器。虽然有越来越多的工作探索外语的各个方面，但大多数研究，特别是在分层联邦学习(HFL)的背景下，将层次的不同层次视为两种DP机制的组合。在本文中，我们介绍了一种基于DP的隐私保护方法，该方法采用分层的无线FL，以端到端的方式解决通信和隐私两方面的问题。
